GP12garup2_u:5: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayamudīrayet // GarP_2,1.Mang //
GP12garup2_u:11: tena naḥ sandihānānāṃ sandehaṃ chettumarhasi // GarP_2,1.3 //
GP12garup2_u:17: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahābhāgāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ bhavatāṃ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:18: sandeho nopapadyeta lokārthaṃ kila pṛcchatām // GarP_2,1.6 //
GP12garup2_u:21: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya munaye ya enaṃ samupāśritāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:24: babhūva so 'tha babhrāma teṣu nāma harergṛṇan // GarP_2,1.9 //
GP12garup2_u:27: na rajo na tamaścaiva sattvaṃ tābhyāṃ ca miśritam /
GP12garup2_u:28: yatra pravartate naiva sattvameva pravartate // GarP_2,1.11 //
GP12garup2_u:29: na yatra māyā nāśaśca na cai rāgādayo malāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:38: dadarśa śrīhariṃ tatra śrīpatiṃ sātvatāṃ patim // GarP_2,1.16 //
GP12garup2_u:42: kirīṭinaṃ kuṇḍalinaṃ śriyā vakṣasi lakṣitam // GarP_2,1.18 //
GP12garup2_u:55: bhūrlokātsatyaparyantaṃ puraṃ yāmyaṃ vinā prabho // GarP_2,1.24 //
GP12garup2_u:58: ataḥ sukṛtināṃ loko na bhūto na bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,1.26 //
GP12garup2_u:59: gāyanti devāḥ kila gītakāni dhanyāstu ye bhāratabhūmibhāge /
GP12garup2_u:60: svargāpavargasya phalārjanāya bhavanti bhūyaḥ puruṣāḥ suratvāt // GarP_2,1.27 //
GP12garup2_u:62: adhastāccālitā darbhāḥ pādau yāmyāṃ vyavasthitau // GarP_2,1.28 //
GP12garup2_u:64: kimarthaṃ dīyate dānaṃ godānamapi keśava // GarP_2,1.29 //
GP12garup2_u:66: tilālohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,1.30 //
GP12garup2_u:68: kathaṃ hi mriyate janturmṛto vai kutra gacchati // GarP_2,1.31 //
GP12garup2_u:69: ativāhaśarīraṃ ca kathaṃ hi śrayate tadā /
GP12garup2_u:70: śavaṃ skandhe vahetputro agnidātā ca pautrakaḥ // GarP_2,1.32 //
GP12garup2_u:72: vasundharā kimarthaṃ ca kutaḥ strīśabdakīrtanam // GarP_2,1.33 //
GP12garup2_u:76: vastraṃ naraśca nārī ca vidadhyādadharottaram // GarP_2,1.35 //
GP12garup2_u:77: annādyaṃ gṛhamāgatya na bhoktavyaṃ janaiḥ saha /
GP12garup2_u:78: navakāṃścaiva piṇḍāṃśca kimarthaṃ dadate sutāḥ // GarP_2,1.36 //
GP12garup2_u:79: kimarthaṃ catvare dugdhaṃ yātre pakve ca mṛnmaye /
GP12garup2_u:80: kāṣṭhatrayaṃ gaṇābaddhaṃ kṛtvā rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,1.37 //
GP12garup2_u:82: dāhodakaṃ kimarthaṃ ca kimarthaṃ ca janaiḥ saha // GarP_2,1.38 //
GP12garup2_u:84: kathaṃ deyaṃ pitṛbhyaśca vāhasyāvāhanaṃ katham // GarP_2,1.39 //
GP12garup2_u:88: dvitīye 'hni kutaḥ snānaṃ caturthe sāgnike dvije // GarP_2,1.41 //
GP12garup2_u:89: daśame kiṃ malasnānaṃ kāryaṃ sarvajanaiḥ saha /
GP12garup2_u:92: daśame 'hani yatpiṇḍaṃ taddadyā dāmiṣeṇa tu // GarP_2,1.43 //
GP12garup2_u:96: śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśaitāni abdaṃ yāvatkuto ghaṭaḥ // GarP_2,1.45 //
GP12garup2_u:98: dinedine ca dātavyaṃ ghaṭānnaṃ pretatṛptaye // GarP_2,1.46 //
GP12garup2_u:99: prāpte kāle vai mriyate anityā mānavāḥ prabho // GarP_2,1.47 //
GP12garup2_u:100: chidraṃ tu naiva paśyāmi kuto jīvaḥ sa nirgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:102: tejo vadasva me nātha vāyurākāśameva ca // GarP_2,1.48 //
GP12garup2_u:104: vāyavaścaiva pañcaite kathaṃ gacchanti cātyayam // GarP_2,1.49 //
GP12garup2_u:106: tṛṣṇā kāmo hyahaṅkāraḥ kuto yānti janārdanā // GarP_2,1.50 //
GP12garup2_u:108: naṣṭe dehe kuto yānti dānāni vividhāni ca // GarP_2,1.51 //
GP12garup2_u:109: sapiṇḍanaṃ kimarthaṃ ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:110: pretasya melanaṃ keṣāṃ kiṃvidhaṃ tatra kārayet // GarP_2,1.52 //
GP12garup2_u:112: ye dagdhā ye tvadagdhāśca patitā ye narā bhuvi // GarP_2,1.53 //
GP12garup2_u:113: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni teṣāmante bhavecca kim /
GP12garup2_u:114: pāpino ye durācārā ye cānye gatabuddhayaḥ // GarP_2,1.54 //
GP12garup2_u:118: śūdrasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā saṃgṛhītā yadā bhavet // GarP_2,1.56 //
GP12garup2_u:120: anyacca śṛṇu viśvātmanmayā kautukinā rayāt // GarP_2,1.57 //
GP12garup2_u:122: tatrājani janāndṛṣṭvā duḥ kheṣveva nimajjataḥ // GarP_2,1.58 //
GP12garup2_u:123: svānte me durdharā pīḍā tatpīḍāto garīyasī /
GP12garup2_u:126: evaṃ na nirbhayaṃ sthānamanyadīśa bhavatpadāt // GarP_2,1.60 //
GP12garup2_u:128: tatrāpi bhārate varṣe bahuduḥ khasya bhāginaḥ // GarP_2,1.61 //
GP12garup2_u:131: khañjāḥ kāṇāśca badhirā mūkāḥ kuṣṭhāśca lomaśāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:134: dṛṣṭvā prasumanāḥ prāptaḥ ko mṛtyuścitratā katham // GarP_2,1.64 //
GP12garup2_u:136: vidhinābdakriyā yasya na sa durgatimāpnuyāt // GarP_2,1.65 //
GP12garup2_u:139: mriyamāṇasya kiṃ kṛtyaṃ kiṃ dānaṃ vāsavānuja /
GP12garup2_u:141: sadyo vilambato vā kiṃ dehamanyaṃ prapadyate /
GP12garup2_u:144: prasādaṃ kuru me mohaṃ chettumarhasyaśeṣataḥ // GarP_2,1.69 //
GP12garup2_u:145: sarvamantemayā pṛṣṭaṃ brūhi lokahitāya vai // GarP_2,1.70 //
GP12garup2_u:146: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe (pretakhaṇḍe)
GP12garup2_u:150: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:155: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābhāga vainateyaṃ bravīmi te // GarP_2,2.3 //
GP12garup2_u:156: aputrasya gatirnāstu svargo naiva ca naiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:157: yena kenāpyupāyena kāryaṃ janma sutasya hi // GarP_2,2.4 //
GP12garup2_u:159: skandhaḥ putreṇa kartavyo hyagnidātā ca pautrakaḥ // GarP_2,2.5 //
GP12garup2_u:160: tiladarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī ṛtumatī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:161: pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,2.6 //
GP12garup2_u:162: yadā puṣpaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ hi kva tadā garbhadhāraṇam /
GP12garup2_u:163: ādarācca tato bhūmau yena garbhaṃ pradhāryate // GarP_2,2.7 //
GP12garup2_u:165: tasyāmevāturo muktaḥ sarvaṃ dahati kilbiṣam // GarP_2,2.8 //
GP12garup2_u:168: sarvatra vasudhāpūtā yatra lepo na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:169: yatra lepaḥ sthitastatra punarlepena śudhyati // GarP_2,2.10 //
GP12garup2_u:171: alepaṃ hyāturaṃ muktaṃ viśantyete viyonayaḥ // GarP_2,2.11 //
GP12garup2_u:173: maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyāmāturo mucyate na hi // GarP_2,2.12 //
GP12garup2_u:177: yonyantaraṃ na gacchetsa krīḍate vāyunā saha // GarP_2,2.14 //
GP12garup2_u:179: tasyaiva vāyubhūtasya na śrāddhaṃ nodakakriyā // GarP_2,2.15 //
GP12garup2_u:181: asurā dānavā daityā vidravanti tilaistathā // GarP_2,2.16 //
GP12garup2_u:183: dahantu te me pāpāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni vai // GarP_2,2.17 //
GP12garup2_u:184: eka eva tilo datto hemadroṇatilaiḥ samaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:185: tarpaṇe dānahomeṣu datto bhavati cākṣayaḥ // GarP_2,2.18 //
GP12garup2_u:190: tena te pitarastṛptā apasavye kṛte sati /
GP12garup2_u:191: darbhamūle sthito brahmā madhye devo janārdanaḥ // GarP_2,2.21 //
GP12garup2_u:192: darbhāgre śaṅkaraṃ vidyāttrayo devāḥ kuśe smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:193: viprā mantrāḥ kaśā vahnistulasī ca khageśvara // GarP_2,2.22 //
GP12garup2_u:194: naite nirmālyatāṃ yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:195: tulasī brāhmaṇā gāvo viṣṇurekādaśī khaga // GarP_2,2.23 //
GP12garup2_u:203: darbhaistu kṣipyate yo 'sau darbhaistu pariveṣṭitaḥ // GarP_2,2.27 //
GP12garup2_u:204: viṣṇuloke sa vai yāti mantrahīno 'pi mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:205: tūlīṃ kṛtvā kṛtau pādau saṃsthitau kṣitipṛṣṭhataḥ // GarP_2,2.28 //
GP12garup2_u:208: yane dattena dānena sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati /
GP12garup2_u:209: lavaṇaṃ tadrasaṃ divyaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ nṛṇām // GarP_2,2.30 //
GP12garup2_u:211: pitṝṇāṃ ca priyaṃ bhavyaṃ tasmātsvargapradaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,2.31 //
GP12garup2_u:213: etatsalavaṇaṃ dānaṃ tena śaṃsanti yoginaḥ // GarP_2,2.32 //
GP12garup2_u:215: āturasya yadā prāṇā na yānti vasudhātale // GarP_2,2.33 //
GP12garup2_u:216: lavaṇaṃ tu tadā deyaṃ dvārasyodvāṭanaṃ divaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:217: anyacca śṛṇu pakṣīndra mṛtyo rūpaṃ prapañcataḥ // GarP_2,2.34 //
GP12garup2_u:222: sāttvikā rājasāścaiva tāmasā ye ca kecana /
GP12garup2_u:223: bhāvāḥ kālātmakāḥ sarve pravartante hi jantuṣu // GarP_2,2.37 //
GP12garup2_u:225: agniḥ khaṃ pṛthivī mitra oṣadhyo vasavastathā // GarP_2,2.38 //
GP12garup2_u:227: sarve kālena sṛjyante saṃkṣipyante yathā punaḥ // GarP_2,2.39 //
GP12garup2_u:233: tataḥ kṣaṇena caitanye vikale jaḍatāṃ gate // GarP_2,2.42 //
GP12garup2_u:235: bībhatsaṃ tu tadā rūpaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairbhavet // GarP_2,2.43 //
GP12garup2_u:239: bhūya eva hite tāta mṛtyukāladaśāmimām // GarP_2,2.45 //
GP12garup2_u:244: yairnānṛtāni coktāni prītibhedaḥ kṛto na ca /
GP12garup2_u:245: āstikaḥ śraddadhānaśca sa sukhaṃ mṛtyumṛcchati // GarP_2,2.48 //
GP12garup2_u:247: yathoktakārī saumyaśca sa sukhaṃ mṛtyumṛcchati // GarP_2,2.49 //
GP12garup2_u:249: kūṭasākṣī mṛṣāvādī ye ca viśvāsaghātakāḥ // GarP_2,2.50 //
GP12garup2_u:250: te mohaṃ mṛtyumṛcchanti tathā ye vedanindakāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:253: prāpte tvīdṛkpathe ghore jāyate tasya vepathuḥ // GarP_2,2.52 //
GP12garup2_u:259: uktaṃ mṛtyoḥ svarūpaṃ tu prasaṅgādanyadapyatha // GarP_2,2.55 //
GP12garup2_u:261: karmaṇāṃ prāktanānāṃ tu tadasattvenaṃ bhadetaḥ // GarP_2,2.56 //
GP12garup2_u:275: hemahārī tu kunakhī duścarmā gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_2,2.63 //
GP12garup2_u:281: araṇye nirjane deśe jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ // GarP_2,2.66 //
GP12garup2_u:283: patraṃ ca śākhino hṛtvā gandhāṃśchucchundarī pumān // GarP_2,2.67 //
GP12garup2_u:286: madhudaṃśaḥ phalaṃ gṛdhro gāṃ godhāgniṃ bakastathā /
GP12garup2_u:288: kāṃsyahārī tu haṃsaḥ syātparasvasya ca hārakaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:293: nyāsāpahārī kāṇaḥ syāstrījīvaḥ khañjako bhavet // GarP_2,2.72 //
GP12garup2_u:295: vātagulmī viprayoṣidgāmī vā jambuko bhavet // GarP_2,2.73 //
GP12garup2_u:301: syādvātha vṛṣalaḥ so 'yaṃ catvare vai viṇmūtrakṛt // GarP_2,2.76 //
GP12garup2_u:305: kṛmiḥ paryuṣitādaḥ syānmatsarī bhramaro bhavet // GarP_2,2.78 //
GP12garup2_u:309: annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vipre pradadatkubjatāṃ vrajet // GarP_2,2.80 //
GP12garup2_u:313: cātako jalahartā syājjanmāndhaḥ puṃstakaṃ haran // GarP_2,2.82 //
GP12garup2_u:319: hareḥ kathāṃ na śṛṇvanti ye na sādhujanastavam // GarP_2,2.85 //
GP12garup2_u:321: parasyānanasaṃsthaṃ yo grāsaṃ hari mandadhīḥ // GarP_2,2.86 //
GP12garup2_u:323: dambhenācarate dharmaṃ gajacarmā bhavettu saḥ // GarP_2,2.87 //
GP12garup2_u:325: liṅgapīḍī śivasvaṃ ca śivanirmālyameva ca // GarP_2,2.88 //
GP12garup2_u:330: dravyaprakārā hi yathā tathaiva prāṇijātayaḥ // GarP_2,2.90 //
GP12garup2_u:331: evaṃ vicitrairnijakarmabhirnṛṇāṃ sukhasya duḥ khasya ca janmanāmapi /
GP12garup2_u:334: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pratakā(kha)
GP12garup2_u:341: narakāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ me vada yeṣu vikarmiṇaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:342: pātyante duḥ khabhūyiṣṭhāsteṣāṃ bhedāṃśca kīrtaya // GarP_2,3.2 //
GP12garup2_u:345: śakyaṃ vistarato naiva vaktuṃ prādhānyato bruve // GarP_2,3.3 //
GP12garup2_u:346: rauravaṃ nāma narakaṃ mukhyaṃ tadvainibodha me /
GP12garup2_u:347: raurave kūṭasākṣī tu yāti yaścānṛtī naraḥ // GarP_2,3.4 //
GP12garup2_u:348: yojanānāṃ sahasre dve rauravo hi pramāṇataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:349: jānumātrapramāṇaṃ tu tatra gartaṃ sudustaram // GarP_2,3.5 //
GP12garup2_u:354: padepade ca pādo 'sya sphuṭyate śīryate punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:359: mahārauravasaṃjñaṃ tu śṛṇuṣva narakaṃ khaga // GarP_2,3.10 //
GP12garup2_u:364: tasyāṃ baddhakarābhyāṃ ca padbhyāṃ caiva yamānugaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:365: mucyate pāpakṛnmadhye luṇṭhamānaḥ sa gacchati // GarP_2,3.13 //
GP12garup2_u:371: varṣāyutāyutaiḥ pāpaṃ yaiḥ kṛtaṃ duṣṭabuddhibhiḥ // GarP_2,3.16 //
GP12garup2_u:387: na caiṣāṃ jīvitabhraṃśo jāyate pakṣisattama // GarP_2,3.24 //
GP12garup2_u:388: chinnāni teṣāṃ śataśaḥ khaṇḍānyaikyaṃ vrajanti hi /
GP12garup2_u:391: aprātaṣṭhaṃ ca narakaṃ śṛṇuṣva gadato mama // GarP_2,3.26 //
GP12garup2_u:393: tānyeva tatra cakrāṇi ghaṭīyantrāṇi cānyataḥ // GarP_2,3.27 //
GP12garup2_u:397: ghaṭīyantreṣu badvā ye baddhā toyavaṭī yathā // GarP_2,3.29 //
GP12garup2_u:401: asipatravanaṃ nāma narakaṃ śṛṇu cāparam // GarP_2,3.31 //
GP12garup2_u:411: mātarbhrātastāta iti krandamānāḥ suduḥ khitāḥ // GarP_2,3.36 //
GP12garup2_u:413: teṣāṃ gatānāṃ tatrāpi ati śītiḥ samīraṇaḥ // GarP_2,3.37 //
GP12garup2_u:415: chinnāḥ patanti te bhūmau jvalatpāvakasaṃcaye // GarP_2,3.38 //
GP12garup2_u:417: sārameyāśca te śīghraṃ śātayanti śarīrataḥ // GarP_2,3.39 //
GP12garup2_u:420: ataḥ paraṃ bhīmataraṃ taptakuṃbhaṃ nibodha me /
GP12garup2_u:423: eṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇo yāmyaiḥ kṣiptā hyadhomukhāḥ // GarP_2,3.42 //
GP12garup2_u:431: eṣa te vistareṇoktastaptakumbho mayā khaga // GarP_2,3.46 //
GP12garup2_u:437: karmaṇāṃ tāratamyena teṣuteṣu patanti hi // GarP_2,3.49 //
GP12garup2_u:438: tathā hi narako rodhaḥ śūkarastāla eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:441: adhaḥ śirāḥ pūyavaho rudhirāndhaśca viḍrabhujaḥ // GarP_2,3.51 //
GP12garup2_u:447: tāmasā narakāḥ sarve yamasya viṣaye sthitāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:448: yeṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇaḥ patanti hi pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_2,3.54 //
GP12garup2_u:450: rogho goghno bhrūṇahā ca agnidātā naraḥ patet // GarP_2,3.55 //
GP12garup2_u:452: tāle patetkṣattrahantā hatvā vaiśyaṃ ca durgatiḥ // GarP_2,3.56 //
GP12garup2_u:456: mādhvī vikrayakartāṃ ca yastu bhaktaṃ parityajet // GarP_2,3.58 //
GP12garup2_u:457: mahājvālī duhitaraṃ snuṣāṃ gacchati yastu vai /
GP12garup2_u:458: vedo vikrīyate yaiśca vedaṃ dūṣayate tu yaḥ // GarP_2,3.59 //
GP12garup2_u:460: agamyāgāmī ca naro narakaṃ śabalaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,3.60 //
GP12garup2_u:461: vimohe patate śūre maryādāṃ yo bhinatti vai /
GP12garup2_u:462: duriṣṭaṃ kurute yastu kṛmibhakṣaṃ prapadyate // GarP_2,3.61 //
GP12garup2_u:468: kṣīraṃ surāṃ ca māsaṃ lākṣāṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ tilān // GarP_2,3.64 //
GP12garup2_u:471: pakṣiṇaśca mṛgāṃśchā gānso 'pyevaṃ narakaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,3.65 //
GP12garup2_u:472: ājāviko māhiṣikastathā cakrī dhvajī ca yaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:475: surāpo māṃsabhakṣī ca tathā ca paśughātakaḥ // GarP_2,3.67 //
GP12garup2_u:478: patanti niraye ghore viḍbhuje nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:481: agnijvālāṃ mṛgavyādho bhojyate yatra vāyasaiḥ // GarP_2,3.70 //
GP12garup2_u:483: skandante yadi vā svapne yatino brahmacāriṇaḥ // GarP_2,3.71 //
GP12garup2_u:485: te sarve narakaṃ yānti nirayaṃ cāpyabhojanam // GarP_2,3.72 //
GP12garup2_u:487: karmāṇi ye tu kurvanti sarve nirayavāsinaḥ // GarP_2,3.73 //
GP12garup2_u:489: sudāruṇaḥ suśītātmā tasyā dhastāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,3.74 //
GP12garup2_u:491: duḥ khotkarṣaśca sarveṣu karmasvapi nimittataḥ // GarP_2,3.75 //
GP12garup2_u:499: ekaṃ dinaṃ varṣaśatapramāṇaṃ narake bhavet // GarP_2,3.79 //
GP12garup2_u:504: ete caikaśaphāḥ ṣaṭ ca śṛṇu pañcanakhānataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:505: anyāsu bahupāpāsu duḥ khadāsu ca yo niṣu // GarP_2,3.82 //
GP12garup2_u:506: mānuṣyaṃ prāpyate kubjo kutsito vāmano 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:509: avaśiṣṭena pāpena puṇyena ca samanvitaḥ // GarP_2,3.84 //
GP12garup2_u:513: yathā puṇyakṛto yānti tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu // GarP_2,3.86 //
GP12garup2_u:514: te yamena vinirdiṣṭāṃ yoniṃ puṇyagatiṃ narāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:519: jāyante nīrujāṃ gehe sa dvṛttipīrapālakāḥ // GarP_2,3.89 //
GP12garup2_u:522: jātasya mṛtyuloke vai prāṇino maraṇaṃ dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:524: pṛthivyāṃ līyate pṛthvī āpaścaiva tathāpsu ca /
GP12garup2_u:525: tejastejasi līyate samīre ca samīraṇaḥ // GarP_2,3.92 //
GP12garup2_u:527: tatra kāmastathā krodhaḥ kāye pañcendriyāṇi ca // GarP_2,3.93 //
GP12garup2_u:528: ete tārkṣya samākhyātā dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:529: kāmaḥ krodho hyahaṅkāro manastatraiva nāyakaḥ // GarP_2,3.94 //
GP12garup2_u:532: praviśetsa nave dehe pṛhe daradhe guhī yathā /
GP12garup2_u:533: śarīre ye samāsīnāḥ sarve vai sapta dhātavaḥ // GarP_2,3.96 //
GP12garup2_u:534: ṣāṭkauśiko hyayaṃ kāyaḥ sarve vātāśca dehinām /
GP12garup2_u:535: mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ tadyogādye cānye vyādhayastathā // GarP_2,3.97 //
GP12garup2_u:536: pittaṃ śleṣmā tathā majjā māṃsaṃ vai meda eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:537: asthi śukraṃ tathā snāyurdehena saha dahyati // GarP_2,3.98 //
GP12garup2_u:539: kathayāmi punasteṣāṃ śarīraṃ ca yathā bhavet // GarP_2,3.99 //
GP12garup2_u:547: ātmānaṃ ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_2,3.103 //
GP12garup2_u:552: athayāmi kramaprāptaṃ praṣṭu vā vartate spṛhā // GarP_2,3.106 //
GP12garup2_u:553: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dharmakāṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde narakatatpraveśanirgamanādivarṇanaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:557: tasya pāpasya śuddhyarthaṃ vidheyā niṣkṛtirnaraiḥ // GarP_2,4.1 //
GP12garup2_u:560: tadardhaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā tadardhārdhamathāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:561: yathāśaktyā tataḥ kuryāddaśa dānāni vai śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.3 //
GP12garup2_u:563: rajataṃ lavaṇaṃ caiva dānāni daśa vai viduḥ // GarP_2,4.4 //
GP12garup2_u:564: prāyaścitte tvāgatā ye tebhyo dadyānnaro daśa /
GP12garup2_u:566: nadīṃ vaitaraṇīṃ tartuṃ dadyādvaitaraṇīṃ ca gām /
GP12garup2_u:567: kṛṣṇastanī sakṛṣṇāṅgī sā vai vaitaraṇī smṛtā // GarP_2,4.6 //
GP12garup2_u:568: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:569: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,4.7 //
GP12garup2_u:571: ātureṇa tu deyāni padarūpāṇi me śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.8 //
GP12garup2_u:573: āsanaṃ bhājanaṃ padaṃ cāṣṭavidhaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,4.9 //
GP12garup2_u:574: tilāpātraṃ sarpiḥ pātraṃ śayyā sopaskarā tathā /
GP12garup2_u:575: etatsarvaṃ pradātavyaṃ yadiṣṭaṃ cātmano 'pi tat // GarP_2,4.10 //
GP12garup2_u:576: aśvo rathaśca mahīṣī vyañjanaṃ vastrameva ca /
GP12garup2_u:579: prāyāścittaṃ kṛtaṃ yena daśa dānānyapi kṣitau // GarP_2,4.12 //
GP12garup2_u:581: tilapātraṃ sarpiḥ pātraṃ śayyādānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,4.13 //
GP12garup2_u:585: āturasya yadā prāṇā na yānti vasudhātale // GarP_2,4.15 //
GP12garup2_u:586: lavaṇaṃ ca tadā deyaṃ dvārasyodvāṭanaṃ divaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:587: yānikāni ca dānāni svayaṃ dattāni mānavaiḥ // GarP_2,4.16 //
GP12garup2_u:589: prāyaścittaṃ kṛtaṃ yena sāṅgaṃ khaga sa vai pumān // GarP_2,4.17 //
GP12garup2_u:591: amṛtaṃ tu gavāṃ kṣīraṃ yataḥ patagasattam // GarP_2,4.18 //
GP12garup2_u:593: dānānyaṣṭau tu dattvā vai gandharvanilaye vaset // GarP_2,4.19 //
GP12garup2_u:594: ālayastatra raudre hi dahyate yena mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:595: chatradānena succhāyā jāyate pathi tuṣṭidā // GarP_2,4.20 //
GP12garup2_u:599: pradeśe nirjale dātā sukhī syādvai kamaṇḍaloḥ // GarP_2,4.22 //
GP12garup2_u:602: tilapātraṃ tu viprāya dattaṃ patraratha dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:610: yo 'śvaṃ dadāti viprāya svargaloke ca tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup2_u:611: yāvanti romāṇi haye bhavanti hi khageśvara // GarP_2,4.28 //
GP12garup2_u:614: rathaṃ dvijātaye dattvā rājasūyaphalaṃ labht // GarP_2,4.30 //
GP12garup2_u:615: dugdhādhikāṃ ca mahiṣīṃ navameghavarṇāṃ santuṣṭatarṇakavalīṃ jaghanābhirāmām /
GP12garup2_u:616: dattvā suvarṇatilakāṃ dvijapuṅgavāya lokodayaṃ sa jayatīti kimatra citram // GarP_2,4.31 //
GP12garup2_u:620: na hīyate tasya vaṃśaḥ svargaṃ prāpnotyanuttamam // GarP_2,4.33 //
GP12garup2_u:626: so 'pi tṛptimavāpnoti vināpyannena vai tadā // GarP_2,4.36 //
GP12garup2_u:631: padepade kratusamaṃ bhavettasya na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,4.38 //
GP12garup2_u:633: mṛtyau na so 'pi saṃsāre bhūyaḥ paryaṭati dvija // GarP_2,4.39 //
GP12garup2_u:636: gataprāṇaṃ tato jñātvā snātvā putrādirāśu tam /
GP12garup2_u:639: tato mṛtasya sthāne vai ekoddiṣṭaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,4.42 //
GP12garup2_u:641: āṃsanaṃ prākṣaṇa ca syānna syādetaccatuṣṭayam // GarP_2,4.43 //
GP12garup2_u:648: piṇḍasya cālanaṃ proktaṃ naiva proktamidaṃ trikam /
GP12garup2_u:650: eṣu ṣaṭsu vidhiḥ proktaḥ śrāddheṣu malineṣu te /
GP12garup2_u:651: ṣaḍeva maraṇasthāne dvāri cātvarike tathā // GarP_2,4.48 //
GP12garup2_u:653: mṛtisthāne śavo nāma bhūmistuṣyati devatā // GarP_2,4.49 //
GP12garup2_u:657: citāyāṃ sādhaka iti sañcitau preta ucyate // GarP_2,4.51 //
GP12garup2_u:659: gāthāṃ yamasya sūktaṃ vāpyadhīyānā vrajanti hi // GarP_2,4.52 //
GP12garup2_u:661: vaivasvato na tṛpyeta surayā tviva durmatiḥ // GarP_2,4.53 //
GP12garup2_u:662: imāṃ gāthamapeteti sūktaṃ vā pathi saṃpaṭhet /
GP12garup2_u:665: tataḥ śanairbhūtale vai dakṣiṇāśirasaṃ śavam // GarP_2,4.55 //
GP12garup2_u:668: śūdrānītaiḥ kṛtaṃ karma sarvaṃ bhavati niṣphalam /
GP12garup2_u:671: pratevastraṃ dvidhā kṛtvārdhena taṃ chādayettataḥ // GarP_2,4.58 //
GP12garup2_u:673: tataḥ pūrvoktavidhinā piṇḍaṃ pretakare nyaset // GarP_2,4.59 //
GP12garup2_u:675: dāhamṛtyorantarāle vidhiḥ piṇḍasya taṃ śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.60 //
GP12garup2_u:677: anyathā copaghātācca rākṣasādyā bhavanti hi // GarP_2,4.61 //
GP12garup2_u:681: śrautena tu vidhānena hyāhitāgniṃ dahedvudhaḥ // GarP_2,4.63 //
GP12garup2_u:688: asau svargāya lokāya svāhetyuktvā tu nāmataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:690: roditavyaṃ tato gāḍhamevaṃ tasya sukhaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:695: tato jālasamīpe tu gatvā prakṣālya cāṃśukam // GarP_2,4.70 //
GP12garup2_u:697: udakaṃ tu kariṣyāmaḥ sacailaṃ puruṣāstataḥ // GarP_2,4.71 //
GP12garup2_u:699: putrādyā vṛddhapūrvāste ekavastrāḥ śikhāṃ vinā // GarP_2,4.72 //
GP12garup2_u:703: tatastaṭe samāgatya śikhāṃ baddhvā ṛjūn kuśān // GarP_2,4.74 //
GP12garup2_u:705: ādāyāñjalinā yāmyāṃ duḥ khī paitṛkatīrthataḥ // GarP_2,4.75 //
GP12garup2_u:707: bhūmāvaśmani vā sarve kṣipeyurvāgyatāḥ khaga // GarP_2,4.76 //
GP12garup2_u:711: tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa // GarP_2,4.78 //
GP12garup2_u:715: śleṣmāśru bāndhavairmuktaṃ preto bhuṅkte yato 'vaśaḥ // GarP_2,4.80 //
GP12garup2_u:716: ato na roditavyaṃ hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ svaśaktitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:721: pañcadhā saṃbhṛtaḥ kāyo yadi pañcatvamāgataḥ // GarP_2,4.83 //
GP12garup2_u:724: phenaprakhyaḥ kathaṃ nāśaṃ martyaloko na yāsyati /
GP12garup2_u:727: vidaśya rnibapatrāṇi niyatā dvāri veśmanaḥ // GarP_2,4.86 //
GP12garup2_u:731: śrautena tu vidhānena āhitāgniṃ dehadvadhaḥ // GarP_2,4.88 //
GP12garup2_u:735: citibhraṣṭā tu yā mohātsā prājāpatyamācaret // GarP_2,4.90 //
GP12garup2_u:736: tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭī ya yāni lomāni mānuṣe /
GP12garup2_u:739: tadvaduddhṛtya sā nārī tenaiva saha modate // GarP_2,4.92 //
GP12garup2_u:742: brahmaghno vā kṛghno vā mittrighno vā bhavetpatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:743: punātyavidhavā nārī tamādāya mṛtā tu yā // GarP_2,4.94 //
GP12garup2_u:746: yāvaccāgnau mṛte patyau strī nātmānaṃ pradāhayet /
GP12garup2_u:747: tāvanna mucyate sā hi strīśarīrātkathañcana // GarP_2,4.96 //
GP12garup2_u:748: mātṛkaṃ paitṛkaṃ caiva yatra caiva pradīyate /
GP12garup2_u:750: ārtārte mudite hṛṣṭā proṣite malinā kṛśā /
GP12garup2_u:751: mṛte mriyeta yā patyau sā strī jñeyā pativratā // GarP_2,4.98 //
GP12garup2_u:752: pṛthak citāṃ samāruhya na priyā gantumarhati /
GP12garup2_u:756: dahanasya vidhiḥ proktaḥ sāmānyena mayā khaga /
GP12garup2_u:760: kathaṃ dāhaḥ prakartavyastanme vada jagatpate // GarP_2,4.102 //
GP12garup2_u:762: asthīni cenna labhyante proṣitasya narasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:763: teṣāñca hi gatisthānaṃ vidhānaṃ kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,4.103 //
GP12garup2_u:764: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ gopyaṃ patyurdurmaraṇeṣu yat /
GP12garup2_u:776: tattu durmaraṇaṃ jñeyaṃ yacca jātaṃ vidhaiṃ vinā /
GP12garup2_u:777: tena pāpena narakān bhuktvā pretatvabhāginaḥ // GarP_2,4.110 //
GP12garup2_u:779: na vidhānaṃ mṛtādyañca na kuryā daurdhvadaihikam // GarP_2,4.111 //
GP12garup2_u:787: nārāyaṇabaliṃ samyak tīrthe sarvaṃ prakpayet // GarP_2,4.115 //
GP12garup2_u:789: pūrvantu tarpaṇaṃ kāryaṃ vipraiḥ paurāṇavaidikaiḥ // GarP_2,4.116 //
GP12garup2_u:797: bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta śrāddhānyekādaśaiva tu // GarP_2,4.120 //
GP12garup2_u:800: haviṣyānnaṃ śubhaṃ mudrāṃ chatroṣṇīṣe ca dāpayet /
GP12garup2_u:806: śaṅkhe khaḍge 'tha vā tāmre tarpaṇañca pṛthakpṛthak /
GP12garup2_u:809: brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca yamaḥ pretaśca pañcamaḥ // GarP_2,4.126 //
GP12garup2_u:814: śaṅkhe vā tāmrapātre vā alābhe mṛnmaye pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:819: evaṃ viṣṇubaliṃ dattvā yathāśaktyā vidhānataḥ // GarP_2,4.131 //
GP12garup2_u:820: samuddharati tatkṣipraṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇa nāgadaṃśānmṛto yastu viśeṣastantu me śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.132 //
GP12garup2_u:825: palāśasya ca vṛntānāṃ vibhāgaṃ śṛṇu kāśyapa /
GP12garup2_u:828: vinyasya tāni vṛntāni aṅgeṣveṣu pṛthak pṛthak // GarP_2,4.136 //
GP12garup2_u:835: nārikelaṃ śiraḥ sthāneṃ tumbaṃ dadyācca tāluke /
GP12garup2_u:839: pāradaṃ retasaḥ sthāne purīṣe pittalaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:840: manaḥ śilā tathā gātre tilapakvantu sandhiṣu // GarP_2,4.142 //
GP12garup2_u:841: yavapiṣṭaṃ yathā māṃse madhu śoṇitameva ca /
GP12garup2_u:842: keśeṣu ca jaṭājūṭaṃ tvacāyāñca mṛgatvacam // GarP_2,4.143 //
GP12garup2_u:846: ghṛtaṃ nābhyāṃ pradeyaṃ syātkau pīne ca trapusmṛtam // GarP_2,4.145 //
GP12garup2_u:850: ṛddhivṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣurbhyāñca kapardakam // GarP_2,4.147 //
GP12garup2_u:854: sāgnike cāpi vidhinā yajñapātraṃ nyasyetkramāt // GarP_2,4.149 //
GP12garup2_u:855: striyaḥ punantu ma śira imaṃ me varuṇena ca /
GP12garup2_u:858: tilā lauhaṃ hiraṇyañca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,4.151 //
GP12garup2_u:860: tilapātraṃ tato dadyātpadadānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,4.152 //
GP12garup2_u:862: pretamokṣaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhṛdi viṣṇuṃ prakalpyaca // GarP_2,4.153 //
GP12garup2_u:864: tacchruddhaye tu saṃskartā putrādirniṣkṛtiṃ caret // GarP_2,4.154 //
GP12garup2_u:872: akṛtvā niṣkṛtiṃ yastu kurute dahanādikam // GarP_2,4.158 //
GP12garup2_u:874: kṛtvāgnimudakaṃ snānaṃ sparśanaṃ vahanaṃ kathām // GarP_2,4.159 //
GP12garup2_u:876: eṣāmanyatamaṃ pretaṃ yo vahettu dehata vā // GarP_2,4.160 //
GP12garup2_u:878: nimitte laghuni svalpaṃ mahanmahati kalpayet // GarP_2,4.161 //
GP12garup2_u:881: lakṣaṇaṃ brūhi me svāmiṃstrayāṇāmapi suvrata // GarP_2,4.162 //
GP12garup2_u:887: gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam /
GP12garup2_u:889: mayā te 'yaṃ samākhyāto durmṛtasya vidhiḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:893: evaṃ vidhiṃ tataḥ kuryāttataḥ pretaśca muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:894: mṛtabhrāntyā pratikṛteḥ kṛte dāhe sa vai yadi // GarP_2,4.168 //
GP12garup2_u:898: varṣe pañcadaśe pakṣin dvādaśe vā gate sati // GarP_2,4.170 //
GP12garup2_u:902: kumbhe salilamādāya pañcagavyaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,4.172 //
GP12garup2_u:906: pañcabhiḥ snāpayitvā tu gavyaiḥ pretāṃ rajasvalām // GarP_2,4.174 //
GP12garup2_u:908: mṛtasya pañcake dāhavidhiṃ vacmi śṛṇuṣva me // GarP_2,4.175 //
GP12garup2_u:910: revatyantaṃ sadā dūṣyamaśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,4.176 //
GP12garup2_u:912: na jalaṃ dīyate teṣu aśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,4.177 //
GP12garup2_u:916: atha vā ṛkṣamadye ca dāhastu vidhipūrvakaḥ // GarP_2,4.179 //
GP12garup2_u:922: sūtakānte tadā puttraiḥ kāryaṃ śāntikapauṣṭikam // GarP_2,4.182 //
GP12garup2_u:923: pañcakeṣu mṛto yo 'sau na satiṃ labhate naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:924: tilān gāñca suvarṇañca tamuddiśya ghṛtaṃ dadet // GarP_2,4.183 //
GP12garup2_u:930: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dahanavidhikṛcchralakṣaṇadagdhāgamanarajasvalāmaraṇavidhipañcakamaraṇaprāyaścittanirūpaṇaṃ
GP12garup2_u:934: evaṃ dagdhvā naraṃ pretaṃ snātvā kṛtvā tilodakam /
GP12garup2_u:935: agrataḥ strījano gacchedvrajeyuḥ pṛṣṭhato narāḥ // GarP_2,5.1 //
GP12garup2_u:938: te praviśya gṛhaṃ sarve sutādyāśca sapiṇḍakāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:939: bhaveyurdaśarātraṃ vai yata āśaucakaṃ khaga // GarP_2,5.3 //
GP12garup2_u:946: mṛnmaye patraje vāpi bhuñjīraṃste ca bhājane /
GP12garup2_u:947: uvāsantu te kuryurekāhamatha vā tryaham // GarP_2,5.7 //
GP12garup2_u:949: āśaucina iti proktamāśaucasya ca vai prabho /
GP12garup2_u:950: lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ kiyatkālaṃ bhāvyaṃ vā tadyutairnaraiḥ // GarP_2,5.8 //
GP12garup2_u:961: jalaṃ tridivamākāśe sthāpyaṃ kṣīrañca mṛnmaye // GarP_2,5.13 //
GP12garup2_u:963: kāṣṭhatraye guṇairbaddhe prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,5.14 //
GP12garup2_u:964: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā saptame navame tathā /
GP12garup2_u:965: asthisaṃcayanaṃ kāryaṃ dine tadgotrajaiḥ saha // GarP_2,5.15 //
GP12garup2_u:969: prāgudīcyāṃ caruṃ kṛtvā snātvā prayatamānasaḥ // GarP_2,5.17 //
GP12garup2_u:973: asagotraḥ sagotro vā yadi strī yati vā pumān // GarP_2,5.19 //
GP12garup2_u:981: yadāhi tryahamāśaucaṃ tadā vāñjalayo daśa // GarP_2,5.23 //
GP12garup2_u:991: vipraḥ śudhyatyapaḥ spṛṣṭvā kṣattriyo vāhanaṃ tathā // GarP_2,5.28 //
GP12garup2_u:992: vaiśyaḥ pratodaṃ raśmīnvā śūdro yaṣṭiṃ kṛtakriyaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:997: pratyahaṃ te vibhajyante caturbhāgaiḥ khagottama // GarP_2,5.31 //
GP12garup2_u:1001: śirastvādyena piṇḍena pretasya kriyate tathā // GarP_2,5.33 //
GP12garup2_u:1005: jānujaṅghaṃ tathā pādau pañcamena tu sarvadā // GarP_2,5.35 //
GP12garup2_u:1009: madhyamāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva me // GarP_2,5.37 //
GP12garup2_u:1012: nimittaṃ durmatiṃ kṛtvā yadi nārāyaṇo baliḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1013: ekādaśāhe kartavyo vṛṣotsargo 'pi tatra vai // GarP_2,5.39 //
GP12garup2_u:1015: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi // GarP_2,5.40 //
GP12garup2_u:1017: niṣphalaṃ sakalaṃ vidyātpramītāya na tadbhavet // GarP_2,5.41 //
GP12garup2_u:1019: putraḥ patnyatha dauhitraḥ pitā vā duhitātha vā // GarP_2,5.42 //
GP12garup2_u:1022: alaṅkṛto vidhānena pretatvaṃ tasya no bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:1024: darbhaiḥ piṣṭaistu sampādya taṃ vṛṣaṃ mocayedvudhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1031: tṛtīyāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva tām /
GP12garup2_u:1032: dvādaśa pratimāsyāni ādyaṃ ṣāṇmāsikaṃ tathā // GarP_2,5.48 //
GP12garup2_u:1034: dvādaśāhe tripakṣe ca ṣaṇmāse māsike 'bdike // GarP_2,5.49 //
GP12garup2_u:1036: yasyaitā ni na dattāni pretaśrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,5.50 //
GP12garup2_u:1038: ekādaśe dvādaśe vā dine ādyaṃ prakīrtitam // GarP_2,5.51 //
GP12garup2_u:1046: sapiṇḍīkaraṇeṣvevaṃ vidhiṃ pakṣīndra me śṛṇu // GarP_2,5.55 //
GP12garup2_u:1049: pātraṃ pretasya tatraikaṃ pitryaṃ pātratrayaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1052: tataḥ prabhṛti vai pretaḥ pitṛsāmānyamaśnute // GarP_2,5.58 //
GP12garup2_u:1056: sāpiṇḍyantu striyā nāsti mṛte bhartuḥ striyo bhavet // GarP_2,5.60 //
GP12garup2_u:1058: śrāddhādau saha dāhe ca patipatnyorna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,5.61 //
GP12garup2_u:1060: tāṃmṛtāhani tu samprāpte pṛthak piṇḍena yojayet // GarP_2,5.62 //
GP12garup2_u:1067: uktaṃ bhartrāpi sāpiṇḍyaṃ striyā veṣayabhedataḥ // GarP_2,5.66 //
GP12garup2_u:1068: navaśrāddhasya te kālaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu kāśyapa /
GP12garup2_u:1070: dvitīyañca tato mārge viśrāmo yatra kāritaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1073: daśamaikādaśe caiva nava śrāddhāni vai khaga // GarP_2,5.69 //
GP12garup2_u:1074: śrāddhāni nava caitāni tṛtīyā ṣoḍaśī smṛtā /
GP12garup2_u:1076: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā pañcame saptame tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1079: uktāni te mayā tāni ṛṣīṇāṃ matabhedataḥ // GarP_2,5.72 //
GP12garup2_u:1085: ekoddiṣṭaṃ me nibodha cetthamāvatsaraṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,5.75 //
GP12garup2_u:1088: pratyabdaṃ yo yathā kuryāttathā kuryātsa tānyapi /
GP12garup2_u:1089: ekādaśe dvādaśe 'hni preto bhuṅkte dinadvayam // GarP_2,5.77 //
GP12garup2_u:1091: sāpiṇḍye tu kṛte tasya pretaśabdo nivartate // GarP_2,5.78 //
GP12garup2_u:1093: annaṃ dīpo jalaṃ vastramanyadvādīyate ca yat // GarP_2,5.79 //
GP12garup2_u:1099: tasminmārge vrajatyeko gṛhīta iva markaṭaḥ // GarP_2,5.82 //
GP12garup2_u:1106: catvāriṃ śattathā sapta pratyahaṃ yāti tatra saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1109: evaṃ krameṇa yātabye mārge pāparataistu yat // GarP_2,5.87 //
GP12garup2_u:1123: purāṇi ṣoḍaśāmuṣmanmārge tāni ca me śṛṇu // GarP_2,5.94 //
GP12garup2_u:1124: yāmyaṃ sauripuraṃ nagedvabhavanaṃ gandharvaśailāgamau krauñcaṃ krūrapuraṃ vicitrabhavanaṃ bahvāpadaṃ duḥ khadam /
GP12garup2_u:1125: nānākrandapuraṃ sutaptabhavanaṃ raudraṃ payovarṣaṇaṃ śītāḍhyaṃ bahubhītiṣoḍaśapurāṇyetānyadṛṣṭani te // GarP_2,5.95 //
GP12garup2_u:1126: tatra yāmya puraṃ gacchanputraputreti ca bruvan /
GP12garup2_u:1127: hāheti krandate nityaṃ svakṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ smaran // GarP_2,5.96 //
GP12garup2_u:1129: puṣpabhadrā nadī yatra nyagrodhaḥ priyadarśanaḥ // GarP_2,5.97 //
GP12garup2_u:1130: viśrāmecchāṃ karotyatra kārayanti na te bhaṭāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1131: kṣitau dattaṃ sutaistasya snehādvā kṛpayā tathā // GarP_2,5.98 //
GP12garup2_u:1134: jalāśayo naiva kṛto mayā tadā manuṣyatṛptyai paśupakṣitṛptaya /
GP12garup2_u:1135: gotṛptihetorna ca gocaraḥ kṛtaḥ śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,5.100 //
GP12garup2_u:1136: tatra nāmnā tu rājāsau jaṅgamaḥ kāmarūpadhṛk /
GP12garup2_u:1137: bhayāt taddarśanājjātādbhuṅkte piṇḍaṃ sa śaṅkitaḥ // GarP_2,5.101 //
GP12garup2_u:1138: tripakṣe jalasaṃyuktaṃ kṣitau dattaṃ tato vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:1140: na nityadānaṃ na gavāhnikaṃ kṛtaṃ pustaṃ ca dattaṃ na hi vedaśāstrayoḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1141: purāṇadṛṣṭo na hi sevito 'dhvā śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,5.103 //
GP12garup2_u:1143: māsi dvitīye yaddattaṃ bāndhavaistu tato vrajet // GarP_2,5.104 //
GP12garup2_u:1147: tṛtīye māsi samprāpte gandharvanagare śubham // GarP_2,5.106 //
GP12garup2_u:1150: mayā na dattaṃ na hutaṃ hutāśane tapo na taptaṃ himaśailagahvare /
GP12garup2_u:1151: na sevitaṃ gāṅgamaho mahājalaṃ śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,5.108 //
GP12garup2_u:1156: na jñānamārgo na ca yogamārgo na karmamārgo na ca bhaktimārgaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1157: na sādhusaṅgātkimapi śrutaṃ mayā śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,5.111 //
GP12garup2_u:1158: tataḥ krūrapura māsi pañcame yāti kāśyapa /
GP12garup2_u:1159: bhuvi dattaṃ piṇḍajalaṃ bhuktvā krūrapuraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,5.112 //
GP12garup2_u:1161: hā mātarhāpitarbhrātaḥ sutā hā hā mama striyaḥ // GarP_2,5.113 //
GP12garup2_u:1163: evaṃ lālapyamānaṃ te yamadūtā vadantihi // GarP_2,5.114 //
GP12garup2_u:1164: kva mātā kva pitā mūḍha kva jāyā kva sutaḥ suhṛt /
GP12garup2_u:1165: svakarmopārjite bhuṅkṣvaṃ mūrkha yātāściraṃ pathi // GarP_2,5.115 //
GP12garup2_u:1166: jānāsi śambalamalaṃ balamadhvagānāṃ no 'śambalaḥ prayatate paralokagatyai /
GP12garup2_u:1167: gantavyamasti tava niścitameva tena mārgeṇa yena na bhavet krayavikrayo 'pi // GarP_2,5.116 //
GP12garup2_u:1171: kutra yāmi na hi gāmi jīvitaṃ hā mṛtasya maraṇaṃ punarna vai /
GP12garup2_u:1172: itthameva vilapan prayātyasau yātanārhadhṛtavigrahaḥ pati // GarP_2,5.119 //
GP12garup2_u:1174: tatra ṣaṇmāsapiṇḍena tṛptaḥ san vrajate puraḥ // GarP_2,5.120 //
GP12garup2_u:1176: mātā bhrātā pitā putraḥ ko 'pi me vartate na vā /
GP12garup2_u:1177: yo māmuddharate pāpaṃ patantaṃ duḥ khasāgare // GarP_2,5.122 //
GP12garup2_u:1178: vrajatastatra mārge tu tatra vaitaraṇī śubhā /
GP12garup2_u:1181: te vadanti pradattā gauryadi vaitaraṇī tvayā /
GP12garup2_u:1182: nāvamenāṃ samāroha sukenottara vai nadīm // GarP_2,5.124 //
GP12garup2_u:1183: tatra yena pradattā gauḥ sa sukhenaiva tāṃ taret /
GP12garup2_u:1184: adāyī tatra ghṛṣyeta karagrāhantu nāvikaiḥ // GarP_2,5.125 //
GP12garup2_u:1186: manujānāṃ hitaṃ dānamante vaitaraṇī khaga // GarP_2,5.126 //
GP12garup2_u:1187: dattā pāpaṃ dahet sarvaṃ mama lokantu sā nayet /
GP12garup2_u:1188: maptame māsi samprāpte puraṃ bahvāpadaṃ mṛtaḥ // GarP_2,5.127 //
GP12garup2_u:1189: vrajettu sodakaṃ bhuktvā piṇḍaṃ vai saptamāsikam /
GP12garup2_u:1191: na dattaṃ na hutaṃ taptaṃ na snātaṃ na kṛtaṃ hitam /
GP12garup2_u:1192: yādṛśaṃ caritaṃ karma mūḍhātman bhuṅkṣva tādṛśam // GarP_2,5.129 //
GP12garup2_u:1193: māsyaṣṭame duḥ khade tu pare bhuktvātha sodakam /
GP12garup2_u:1194: piṇḍaṃ prayātsayau tārkṣya nānākrandapuraṃ tataḥ // GarP_2,5.130 //
GP12garup2_u:1198: navame māsi dattaṃ vai nānākrandapure tataḥ // GarP_2,5.132 //
GP12garup2_u:1200: daśame māsi dattaṃ vai sutaptabhavanaṃ tataḥ // GarP_2,5.133 //
GP12garup2_u:1204: daśame māsi piṇḍādi tatra bhuktvā prasarpati // GarP_2,5.135 //
GP12garup2_u:1205: māse caikādaśe pūrṇe puraṃ raudraṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:1206: gacchanneva vilapate yathā pṛṣṭhe prapīḍitaḥ // GarP_2,5.136 //
GP12garup2_u:1209: kṣitau dattañca piṇḍādi bhuktvā tatra tato vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:1214: ūnābdikañca yacchrāddhaṃ tatra bhuṅkte suduḥ khitaḥ // GarP_2,5.140 //
GP12garup2_u:1215: saṃpūrṇe tu tato varṣe śītāḍhyaṃ nagaraṃ vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:1223: tato yāmyaṃ nātidūre nagaraṃ sa hi gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:1225: trayodaśa pratīhārāḥ śravaṇā nāma tatra vai /
GP12garup2_u:1228: mṛtyukālāntakādīnāṃ madhye paśyati vai yamam // GarP_2,5.147 //
GP12garup2_u:1232: tannirdiṣṭāṃ tato janturgatiṃ yāti śubhāśubhām // GarP_2,5.149 //
GP12garup2_u:1233: pāpī pāpāṃ gatiṃ yāti yathā te kathitaṃ purā /
GP12garup2_u:1235: ye tu puṇyakṛtastatra te paśyanti yamaṃ tadā /
GP12garup2_u:1237: ekādaśe dvādaśe hi ṣaṇmāse ābdike tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1238: viprān bahūn bhojayet tatra yanmahatī kṣudhā // GarP_2,5.152 //
GP12garup2_u:1240: yo na sādhayati svārthamevaṃ paścāddhikhidyate // GarP_2,5.153 //
GP12garup2_u:1243: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde varṣakṛtyayamalokamārgayātanādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:1247: akṛte tu vṛṣotsarge paralokagatirna hi // GarP_2,6.1 //
GP12garup2_u:1248: tasmāt kṛṣṇa vṛṣotsargaḥ kartavya iti me śrutam /
GP12garup2_u:1249: kiṃ phalaṃ vṛṣayajñasya purā kena kṛto hare // GarP_2,6.2 //
GP12garup2_u:1250: anaḍvān kīdṛśaḥ proktaḥ kasmin kāle viśeṣataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1251: ko vidhistasya nirdiṣṭaḥ sarvaṃ me kṛpayā vada // GarP_2,6.3 //
GP12garup2_u:1254: brahmaputreṇa yat proktaṃ rājānaṃ vīravāhanam // GarP_2,6.4 //
GP12garup2_u:1262: mune mayā kṛto dharmo yathāśakti prayatnataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1263: yamasya śāsanaṃ śrutvā bibhemi nitarāṃ hṛdi // GarP_2,6.8 //
GP12garup2_u:1265: na paśyāmi mahābhāga tathā vada dayānidhe // GarP_2,6.9 //
GP12garup2_u:1269: dānaṃ tīrthaṃ tapo yajñāḥ saṃnyāsaḥ paitṛko mahaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1271: eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:1272: yajeta vāśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣamutsṛjet // GarP_2,6.12 //
GP12garup2_u:1276: pretatvaṃ niścalaṃ tasya kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaistu kiṃ bhavet // GarP_2,6.14 //
GP12garup2_u:1278: vṛṣayajñaiḥ pramucyate nānyathā sādhanaiḥ khaga // GarP_2,6.15 //
GP12garup2_u:1286: lohito yastu varṇena mukhe pucche ca pāṇḍuraḥ // GarP_2,6.19 //
GP12garup2_u:1287: pītaḥ khuraviṣāṇeṣu sa nīlo vṛṣa ucyate /
GP12garup2_u:1288: śvetavarṇo bhavedvipro lohitaḥ kṣattra ucyate // GarP_2,6.20 //
GP12garup2_u:1289: pītavarṇo bhavedvaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ smṛto budhaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1297: dharmarājasya purato vācyaṃ me sukṛtaṃ vṛṣa /
GP12garup2_u:1306: pitṛparvaṇi saṃprāpte kuśāryo kānanaṃ yayau // GarP_2,6.29 //
GP12garup2_u:1312: sa tatra nagaraṃ rājan dadarśa bahuvistaram // GarP_2,6.32 //
GP12garup2_u:1320: kiṃ svapna uta māyā vai madīyo mānaso bhramaḥ // GarP_2,6.36 //
GP12garup2_u:1325: mahatyā ca śriyā yuktaṃ stūyamānaṃ suvandibhiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1326: rājāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ vipraṃ pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ // GarP_2,6.39 //
GP12garup2_u:1329: adya me saphalaṃ janma pāvitañca kulaṃ prabho /
GP12garup2_u:1330: viṣṇubhaktasya dharmasya yatte dṛggocaraṃ gataḥ // GarP_2,6.41 //
GP12garup2_u:1332: yataḥ samāgato devaḥ punastatraiva nīyatām // GarP_2,6.42 //
GP12garup2_u:1333: iti śrutvā vaco rājñaḥ papraccha dvijapuṅgavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1335: ko 'yaṃ deśa- kuto lokā uttamā madhyamādhamāḥ // GarP_2,6.43 //
GP12garup2_u:1341: virakta indriyārthebhyaḥ sa me pūjyo na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1345: anugṛhāṇa māṃ deva kṣamasva mama sāhasam /
GP12garup2_u:1346: ityuktvā darśayāmāsa mantriṇāṃ saṃjñayā bhruvaḥ // GarP_2,6.48 //
GP12garup2_u:1347: vadiṣyati samagraṃ te svayaṃ vaktuṃ na sāmpratam /
GP12garup2_u:1348: sāmantaḥ sarvavedajño jñātvā hārdaṃ nṛpasya ca // GarP_2,6.49 //
GP12garup2_u:1353: gavāṃ śuśrūṣako nityaṃ brāhmaṇānāñca pūjakaḥ // GarP_2,6.51 //
GP12garup2_u:1357: kadācidbandhubhiḥ sākaṃ kṛtvā tīrthāni bhūriśaḥ // GarP_2,6.53 //
GP12garup2_u:1363: dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ dharmanilayaṃ praklinnaṃ mānasaṃ mama /
GP12garup2_u:1365: śīryamāṇaṃ śarīraṃ hi jñātvā mṛtyuṃ puraḥ sthitam // GarP_2,6.56 //
GP12garup2_u:1367: kṛtvā tīrthāni vidhivadviśrāṇya vipulaṃ vasu // GarP_2,6.57 //
GP12garup2_u:1370: tīrthāni santi bhūrīṇi varṣai'smin bhārate śubhe // GarP_2,6.58 //
GP12garup2_u:1371: yattvayā hyupacīrṇāni tāni sarvāṇi me vada /
GP12garup2_u:1373: gaṅgā ca sūrya tanayā mahāpuṇyā sarasvatī // GarP_2,6.59 //
GP12garup2_u:1376: mṛtānāṃ yatra jantūnāṃ karṇe japati tārakam /
GP12garup2_u:1381: āgneyaṃ vāyukauberaṃ kaumāraṃ bhūruhāṃ punaḥ // GarP_2,6.63 //
GP12garup2_u:1382: saukaraṃ mathurā yatra nityaṃ sannihato hariḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1385: tāpī payoṣṇī nirvindhyā malayaḥ kṛṣṇaveṇikā // GarP_2,6.65 //
GP12garup2_u:1389: veṅkaṭādrau mahātejāḥ śrīraṅgākhyaḥ svayaṃ hariḥ // GarP_2,6.67 //
GP12garup2_u:1396: avāpa girijā devī tapasā yatra śaṅkaram /
GP12garup2_u:1407: anyānyapi ca tīrthāni kṛtāni kṛpayā tava // GarP_2,6.76 //
GP12garup2_u:1411: tvaṃ guruḥ sarvarṇānāṃ vidyayā vayasādhikaḥ // GarP_2,6.78 //
GP12garup2_u:1413: kiṃ kuryāṃ kaṃ nu pṛcche 'haṃ mano me 'ticalaṃ mune // GarP_2,6.79 //
GP12garup2_u:1415: manāgapi na sahate virahaṃ timiraṃ bruvat // GarP_2,6.80 //
GP12garup2_u:1417: śāntiṃ yathā samāyāti sampannamiva bhūsura // GarP_2,6.81 //
GP12garup2_u:1420: manastu prabalaṃ nityaṃ savikāraṃ svabhāvataḥ // GarP_2,6.82 //
GP12garup2_u:1431: śuśrūṣaṇānuvṛttyā ca praśrayeṇa damena ca // GarP_2,6.87 //
GP12garup2_u:1433: manīṣā nirmalā yena jātā mama śubhārthinī // GarP_2,6.88 //
GP12garup2_u:1436: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyā mo hitāya tava bālaka // GarP_2,6.89 //
GP12garup2_u:1437: yena vai dhriyamāṇena ihāmutra sukhaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:1440: devatvaṃ yāti sattvena rajasā ca manuṣyatām // GarP_2,6.91 //
GP12garup2_u:1442: māturlabdhvā punarjanma mriyate ca punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,6.92 //
GP12garup2_u:1448: navanīyaṃ yathā dadhno jyotiḥ kāṣṭhādapi kvacit // GarP_2,6.95 //
GP12garup2_u:1449: manthanaiḥ sādhanairevaṃ paraṃ jñātvā sukhī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:1450: ātmā nityo 'vyayaḥ satyaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvabhṛnmahān // GarP_2,6.96 //
GP12garup2_u:1456: bhaktānukampī bhagavān sādhūnāṃ rakṣaṇāya ca // GarP_2,6.99 //
GP12garup2_u:1460: tataḥ kṛtārtho bhavati sadā sarvatra niḥ spṛhaḥ // GarP_2,6.101 //
GP12garup2_u:1463: kva svapne niyataṃ dhairyamindrajāle kva satyatā /
GP12garup2_u:1464: kva nityatā śaranmeghe kva vā satyaṃ kalevare // GarP_2,6.103 //
GP12garup2_u:1467: ityuktvā te gatāḥ sarve sādhavo dīnavatsalāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1472: antarhitaṃ mahatejo yathā saudāminī divi // GarP_2,6.107 //
GP12garup2_u:1474: kāle kalevaraṃ tyaktvā gatavān harimavyayam // GarP_2,6.108 //
GP12garup2_u:1478: ityuktvā me svānubhavaṃ yayau yādṛcchiko muniḥ // GarP_2,6.110 //
GP12garup2_u:1480: ataste sādhusaṅgatyā bhaktyā ca paramātmanaḥ // GarP_2,6.111 //
GP12garup2_u:1483: kṣipraṃ naśyati dharmajña jalānāṃ śarado yathā /
GP12garup2_u:1485: pītvā te vākyapīyūṣaṃ svāntaṃ me śāntimāgamat // GarP_2,6.113 //
GP12garup2_u:1487: iti śrutvā vacastasya provāca ṛpisattamaḥ // GarP_2,6.114 //
GP12garup2_u:1490: yattvayā sukṛtaṃ bhūrivṛṣotsargaṃ vinā kṛtam // GarP_2,6.115 //
GP12garup2_u:1492: vṛṣotsargasamaṃ kiñcit sādhanaṃ na mahītale // GarP_2,6.116 //
GP12garup2_u:1494: vṛṣotsargaḥ kṛto yena aśvamedhasya yājakaḥ // GarP_2,6.117 //
GP12garup2_u:1495: ubhau samau mayā dṛṣṭau divyau tau śakrasannidhau /
GP12garup2_u:1496: atastvaṃ puṣkaraṃ gatvā vṛṣotsargaṃ vidhāya ca // GarP_2,6.118 //
GP12garup2_u:1497: tato yāhi gṛhaṃ sādho yena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:1499: tataḥ sa punarāgatya kārtikyāṃ puṣkare vare // GarP_2,6.119 //
GP12garup2_u:1505: tena rājakule janma vīrasenasya dharmataḥ // GarP_2,6.122 //
GP12garup2_u:1507: prakurvato vṛṣotsargaṃ tatra ye paricārakāḥ // GarP_2,6.123 //
GP12garup2_u:1510: tato dūratarā ye ca dṛśyante malinā janāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1511: durbhagā malinā rūkṣāḥ kṛśā vigatavāsasaḥ // GarP_2,6.125 //
GP12garup2_u:1514: dharmyaṃ vicitramākhyānaṃ śrutaṃ me yat parāśarāt /
GP12garup2_u:1515: atastvaṃ svagṛhaṃ gaccha kṛpāṃ kṛtvā mamopari // GarP_2,6.127 //
GP12garup2_u:1516: śrutvā vipaścidvākyaṃ sa vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1517: gṛhaṃ jagāma vipro 'sau prāpito rājasevakaiḥ // GarP_2,6.128 //
GP12garup2_u:1520: samācara vidhānena yadi bhīto yamādapi // GarP_2,6.129 //
GP12garup2_u:1522: mayā dharmarahasyaṃ te kathitaṃ rājasattama // GarP_2,6.130 //
GP12garup2_u:1524: vṛṣotsargaṃ na kurvīta gāṃ dadyācca payasviḥ nīm // GarP_2,6.131 //
GP12garup2_u:1526: śrutvā vākyaṃ vasiṣṭhasya rājā madhupurīṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1527: cakāra vidhivat sarvaṃ vṛṣotsargamahaṃ khaga // GarP_2,6.132 //
GP12garup2_u:1529: kālena nidhanaṃ prāpto nīto vaivasvatānugaiḥ // GarP_2,6.133 //
GP12garup2_u:1530: sa kālanagaraṃ hitvā gato dūrataraṃ pathi /
GP12garup2_u:1534: gataṃ pāpapuraṃ tattu na draṣṭavyaṃ bhavādṛśaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1537: ātmānaṃ darśayā māsa tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ // GarP_2,6.137 //
GP12garup2_u:1541: nīyatāṃ devalokāya yatra bhogāḥ supuṣkalāḥ // GarP_2,6.139 //
GP12garup2_u:1543: na jāne kena puṇyena svargaṃ nayasi māṃ vibho // GarP_2,6.140 //
GP12garup2_u:1545: tvayā kṛtāni puṇyāni dānaṃ yajñāḥ savistarāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1550: vīrabāhurdivaṃ gatvā devaiḥ saha mumoda ha // GarP_2,6.143 //
GP12garup2_u:1552: mayā te kathitaṃ pakṣin vṛṣayajñaḥ suvistaraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1553: prāṇināṃ karmanirhāraṃ śrutvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_2,6.144 //
GP12garup2_u:1554: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvidṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsargamāhātmyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:1558: punaranyāṃ kathāṃ brūhi yatra te mahimādbhutaḥ // GarP_2,7.1 //
GP12garup2_u:1569: jalasyonmīlya nayane diśaḥ sarvā nyabhīlayat // GarP_2,7.6 //
GP12garup2_u:1576: ete cānye ca bahavo vṛkṣāsteṣu na dṛśyate /
GP12garup2_u:1577: pakṣiṇāmapi vai panthā manuṣyasya kutaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,7.10 //
GP12garup2_u:1581: śvāpadaiśca tathā cānyaiḥ piśācai rākṣasairvṛte // GarP_2,7.12 //
GP12garup2_u:1583: kāndiśīkaḥ samabhavaḍh yadbhaviṣyo yayau punaḥ // GarP_2,7.13 //
GP12garup2_u:1586: sa tatra vaṭavṛkṣāgre snāyuvaddhaṃ śavaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1587: dadarśa tadbhujaścaiva pañca pretān sudāruṇām // GarP_2,7.15 //
GP12garup2_u:1595: ahaṃ pūrvamahaṃ pūrvaṃ yāmītyāktvā pradudruvuḥ // GarP_2,7.19 //
GP12garup2_u:1603: avatīrya tato vyomno gṛhītvā caraṇaiḥ // GarP_2,7.23 //
GP12garup2_u:1605: sa nīyamānamātmānaṃ vilokya viyati dvijaḥ // GarP_2,7.24 //
GP12garup2_u:1606: jagāma manasā māṃ sa śaraṇaṃ bhayavihvalaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1607: namaścakre cakradharaṃ cetasā cinmayaṃ samam // GarP_2,7.25 //
GP12garup2_u:1608: vakraṃ nakraṃ cakrapātena dūre kṛtvā hṛtvā tasya duḥ khaṃ mukundaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1609: mātaṅgaṃ yo 'mūmucannakravaktrātpāśaṃso 'sau karmaṇāṃ me lunātu // GarP_2,7.26 //
GP12garup2_u:1611: nirbaddhānyo bhargayajñāya muktaścakro me 'sau karmapāśaṃ lunātu // GarP_2,7.27 //
GP12garup2_u:1613: agacchaṃ sahasā tatra yatra pretaiḥ sa nīyate // GarP_2,7.28 //
GP12garup2_u:1615: papraccha na kiyantaṃ vai kālaṃ tānpṛṣṭhato 'nvagām // GarP_2,7.29 //
GP12garup2_u:1619: nikocyākṣi svapārśvaṃ sa nīto vai yakṣarāṇmayā // GarP_2,7.31 //
GP12garup2_u:1620: tamavocaṃ mahāyakṣaṃ tvaṃ hi pratibhaṭo bhava /
GP12garup2_u:1621: pretānnāśaya tadbhūyaḥ śavañca hara tadgatam // GarP_2,7.32 //
GP12garup2_u:1622: ityuktaḥ sa mahāghoraṃ kṛtvā roṣaṃ suduḥ saham /
GP12garup2_u:1623: jagrāha pretarūpaṃ tatpretānāmapi duḥ khadam // GarP_2,7.33 //
GP12garup2_u:1624: sa vivṛtya svakau bāhū sṛkkiṇī parilelihan /
GP12garup2_u:1626: bāhubhyāṃ dvau dvau ca padbhyāṃ mūrdhnaikaṃ ca samāharat /
GP12garup2_u:1628: te vivarṇamukhāḥ sarve taṃ dvijañca śavaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1631: daṃṣṭrāghātaiśca sarve tamekaṃ pretaṃ vyadārayan // GarP_2,7.37 //
GP12garup2_u:1633: jīvaṃ na tu śavaṃ teṣāṃ jahre prāṇamivāntakaḥ // GarP_2,7.38 //
GP12garup2_u:1634: hṛtamātre śave te tu pāriyātre girau dvijam /
GP12garup2_u:1635: muktvādhamātre pramuditā ekaṃ pretaṃ sudāruṇāḥ // GarP_2,7.39 //
GP12garup2_u:1637: adṛśyatāṃ yayau te 'tha hatāśā vipramāgaman // GarP_2,7.40 //
GP12garup2_u:1639: mama sthānasya viprasya mahimneva ca tatkṣaṇe // GarP_2,7.41 //
GP12garup2_u:1640: sadyaḥ smṛtiḥ samutpannā teṣāṃ pūrvasya janmanaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1645: kiṃ māyā kimu vā svapna utāho cittavibhramaḥ // GarP_2,7.44 //
GP12garup2_u:1649: kiṃnāmānaḥ kimācārāḥ kathañcemāṃ daśāṃ gatāḥ // GarP_2,7.45 //
GP12garup2_u:1650: avinītāḥ kathaṃ pūrvaṃ vinītāḥ sāmprataṃ katham /
GP12garup2_u:1654: ahaṃ paryuṣito nāmnā eṣa sūcīmukhaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,7.47 //
GP12garup2_u:1657: pretānāṃ karmajātānāṃ kuto nāma nirarthakam // GarP_2,7.48 //
GP12garup2_u:1658: niruktimeṣāṃ nāmnāṃ vai pretā vadata mā ciram /
GP12garup2_u:1662: kadācicchrāddhakāle vai mayā vipro nimantritaḥ // GarP_2,7.50 //
GP12garup2_u:1663: sa ca kṛtvā vilambena vṛddho madgṛhamāgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1664: akṛtaśrāddhakarmāhaṃ taṃ pākaṃ bhuktavān kṣudhā // GarP_2,7.51 //
GP12garup2_u:1666: tasmāt pāpānmṛtaḥ pāpo yoniṃ vai kutsitāṃ gataḥ // GarP_2,7.52 //
GP12garup2_u:1667: yataḥ paryuṣitaṃ dattaṃ tataḥ paryuṣitaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1672: vane tu vijane tatra pāpādhvagagatiṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1673: tasyāḥ savastraṃ pātheyaṃ tatsūnorvasanāni ca // GarP_2,7.55 //
GP12garup2_u:1677: mayātha sakalaṃ pītaṃ jalaṃ pātrāttṛṣāvatā // GarP_2,7.57 //
GP12garup2_u:1679: putraśokānmṛtā mātā kūpe prāsya nijaṃ vapuḥ // GarP_2,7.58 //
GP12garup2_u:1682: yadyapi prāpnuyāṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhakṣituntu na śakyate /
GP12garup2_u:1684: ata āsye tu vivaraṃ sūcyagreṇa samaṃmama /
GP12garup2_u:1687: purāhaṃ vaiśyajātīyaḥ sākaṃ sakhyā ca kenacit /
GP12garup2_u:1689: mitraṃ ca me bahudhanaṃ tasya lobho mahāṃstataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1694: abhūttadāti pāpasya krūrā matiratīva me // GarP_2,7.65 //
GP12garup2_u:1696: katkṛtyaṃ kurvato nāvi lokaistu jñātameva na // GarP_2,7.66 //
GP12garup2_u:1699: tatsarvaṃ svagṛhe muktvā tasya patnyai nyavedayam /
GP12garup2_u:1700: dasyubhirme hato bhrātā dhanamācchidya vai pathi // GarP_2,7.68 //
GP12garup2_u:1702: śokārtā sāpi tatkālaṃ mamatvaṃ gṛhabandhuṣu // GarP_2,7.69 //
GP12garup2_u:1704: tato niṣkaṇṭakaṃ taddhi vīkṣya hṛṣṭo gato gṛham // GarP_2,7.70 //
GP12garup2_u:1706: mitraṃ pūre hi niḥ kṣipya yadahaṃ śīghramāgataḥ // GarP_2,7.71 //
GP12garup2_u:1711: vṛddhau me pitarāvāstāṃ laghurekaḥ sahodaraḥ // GarP_2,7.73 //
GP12garup2_u:1712: śīghraṃ sa ca mayā bhrātā lubdhenaikaḥ pṛthakkṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1714: adattāṃ pitarau cchannaṃ kiñcitkiñcittu tasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:1719: sosau bālo 'pi babhrāma pitṛbhyāṃ rahito dvija // GarP_2,7.77 //
GP12garup2_u:1728: tāsāṃ me kurvataḥ pūjāṃ pāpā matirajāyata // GarP_2,7.81 //
GP12garup2_u:1730: ullekhanañca ratnānāṃ netrādibhyaḥ kṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_2,7.82 //
GP12garup2_u:1732: netrāṇi ca viratnāni nṛpaścukrodha vahnivat // GarP_2,7.83 //
GP12garup2_u:1734: ābhyo ratnaṃ suvarṇañca hṛtaṃ yena bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,7.84 //
GP12garup2_u:1735: jñātaśca sa hi me vadhyo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1736: ahaṃ tatsakalaṃ jñātvā rātrāvasidharo gṛham // GarP_2,7.85 //
GP12garup2_u:1738: gṛhītvātha maṇīn svarṇaṃ niśīthe 'haṃ gato 'nyataḥ // GarP_2,7.86 //
GP12garup2_u:1748: dhṛtirjñānaṃ naiva yatra vayaṃ tatra vasāmahe // GarP_2,7.90 //
GP12garup2_u:1749: tasya pīḍāṃ vapaṃ kurmo naiva śrāddhaṃ na tarpaṇam /
GP12garup2_u:1750: yasya gehe tadaṅgāttu māṃsañca rudhiraṃ kramāt // GarP_2,7.91 //
GP12garup2_u:1751: jakṣāmaśca pibāmaśca ukta ācāra eṣa naḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1754: vamanaṃ viḍū dūṣikā ca śleṣmā mūtrāśruṇī tathā // GarP_2,7.93 //
GP12garup2_u:1755: etadbhakṣyañca pānañca mā pṛcchātaḥ paraṃ dvija /
GP12garup2_u:1756: lajjā no jāyate svāminnāhāraṃ vadatāṃ svakam // GarP_2,7.94 //
GP12garup2_u:1758: akasmājjanmanāṃ vipra smṛtiḥ prāptā tu paurvikī // GarP_2,7.95 //
GP12garup2_u:1761: evaṃ vadatsu preteṣu tathā śrutavati dvije // GarP_2,7.96 //
GP12garup2_u:1763: sa tu dṛṣṭvā dvijaśreṣṭho hṛdgataṃ puruṣaṃ puraḥ // GarP_2,7.97 //
GP12garup2_u:1768: kṛpayā yaḥ samuddhāraṃ kuruṣe vai namo 'sta te // GarP_2,7.99 //
GP12garup2_u:1769: evaṃ dvijātau bruvati prabhū taprabhaiśca mukhyāṃbaracāriyuktaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1770: tadā madicchāprabhavairvimānaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samantādruruce giriḥ saḥ // GarP_2,7.100 //
GP12garup2_u:1771: itthaṃ vimānena madīyalokaṃ gato dvijaraso 'pyatha pañcamistaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1773: pretāḥ saṃgavaśena nākamavansantaptako brāhmaṇo viṣvaksana iti prasiddhavibhavo nāmnā gaṇe me 'bhavat /
GP12garup2_u:1774: etatte sakalaṃ mayā nigāditaṃ yaścaitadutkīrtayedyaścedaṃ śṛṇuyānna so 'pi puruṣaḥ pretatvamāpnoti hi // GarP_2,7.102 //
GP12garup2_u:1775: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakalpe pañcapretopākhyānaṃ nāma saptamo 'dyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:1779: kriyāḥ katividhāḥ proktā vadaitatsarvameva me // GarP_2,8.1 //
GP12garup2_u:1781: putraḥ pautraḥ prapautro vā tadbhrātā bhrātṛsantatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1784: kuladvaye 'pi cocchinne strībhiḥ kāryāḥ kriyāḥ khaga // GarP_2,8.3 //
GP12garup2_u:1786: pūrvāḥ kriyā madhyamāśca tathā caivottarāḥ kriyāḥ // GarP_2,8.4 //
GP12garup2_u:1788: śrāddhaṃ tatra prakartavyaṃ phalaṃ tasya śṛṇuṣva me // GarP_2,8.5 //
GP12garup2_u:1797: kartavyaṃ kiṃ tadā viṣṇo puruṣeṇa vijānatā // GarP_2,8.9 //
GP12garup2_u:1799: adhikāro yadā nāsti yadi nāsti ca niścayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1800: jīvite sati jīvāya dadyācchrāddhaṃsvayaṃ naraḥ // GarP_2,8.10 //
GP12garup2_u:1802: kartāramatha bhoktāraṃ viṣṇuṃ sarveśvaraṃ yajet // GarP_2,8.11 //
GP12garup2_u:1805: agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā nama iti smaran /
GP12garup2_u:1806: somāyatvā pitṛmate svadhā nama iti smaran // GarP_2,8.13 //
GP12garup2_u:1808: yamāyāṅgirase cātha svadhā nama iti smaran // GarP_2,8.14 //
GP12garup2_u:1809: tayormadhye tu niḥ kṣipya viprānsaṃmantrya bho jayet /
GP12garup2_u:1810: prathamāmuttare nyasya dvitīyāṃ dakṣiṇe nyaset // GarP_2,8.15 //
GP12garup2_u:1816: sāmyāṃ dhenuṃ tato dadyādvasūddeśaṃ dvijāya tu // GarP_2,8.18 //
GP12garup2_u:1817: āgneyyāṃ cātha raudrāya yāmyāṃ sūryadvijāya tu /
GP12garup2_u:1821: tataḥ kāmaṃ kuleśānīṃ śivaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ smaret /
GP12garup2_u:1823: vastrāṇi lohakhaṇḍāni jitaṃ ta iti saṃjapan /
GP12garup2_u:1824: dakṣiṇābhimukho vahniṃ jvālayettatra ca svayam // GarP_2,8.22 //
GP12garup2_u:1826: hutvā śmāśānikaṃ homaṃ pūrṇāhutyantameva hi // GarP_2,8.23 //
GP12garup2_u:1827: niragrimatha vā bhūmiṃ yamaṃ rudrañca saṃsmaret /
GP12garup2_u:1828: hutvā prādhānike sthāne paścādāvāhayecca tam // GarP_2,8.24 //
GP12garup2_u:1832: oṃ yamāya namaśceti dvitīyaṃ tadanantaram // GarP_2,8.26 //
GP12garup2_u:1834: tato dīpte samiddhe 'gnau bhūmau prakṛtidāruṇe // GarP_2,8.27 //
GP12garup2_u:1836: yamāya dharmarājāya mṛtyave cāntakāya ca // GarP_2,8.28 //
GP12garup2_u:1842: daśa piṇḍāṃstu dāndattvā viṣṇoḥ saumyaṃ mukhaṃ smaret // GarP_2,8.31 //
GP12garup2_u:1844: āśaucānte tataḥ kuryādātmano vā marasya tu // GarP_2,8.32 //
GP12garup2_u:1846: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ jīvacchrāddhaṃ mayā khaga // GarP_2,8.33 //
GP12garup2_u:1847: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇa garuḍasaṃvāde śrāddhakartrātmaśrāddhayornirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭamo
GP12garup2_u:1851: kasyacitkenacidrājñā kimādyā sā kṛtā purā // GarP_2,9.1 //
GP12garup2_u:1853: suparṇa śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathā rājñā kriyā kṛtā /

GP12garup2_u:2281: ekaḥ karoti pāpāni phalaṃ bhuṅkte mahājanaḥ /
