GP12garup2_u:2283: ko 'pi mṛtyuṃ na jayati bālo vṛddho yuvāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:2284: sukhaduḥ khādiko vāpi punarāyāti yāti ca // GarP_2,12.22 //
GP12garup2_u:2286: ekaḥ prajāyate jantureka eva pralīyate // GarP_2,12.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2287: eko 'pi bhuṅkte sukṛtameka eva ca duṣkṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:2292: śarīraṃ vahninā dagdhaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ saha sthitam // GarP_2,12.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2293: śubhaṃ vā yadi vā pāpaṃ bhuṅkte sarvatra mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2294: yadanastamite sūrye na dattaṃ dhanamarthinām // GarP_2,12.27 //
GP12garup2_u:2295: na jāne tasya tadvittaṃ prātaḥ kasya bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup2_u:2296: rāraṭīti dhanaṃ tasya ko me bhartā bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,12.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2300: dhanena dhāryate dharmaḥ śraddhāpūtena cetasā // GarP_2,12.30 //
GP12garup2_u:2302: dharmācca jāyate hyartho dharmātkāmo 'pi jāyate // GarP_2,12.31 //
GP12garup2_u:2305: akiñcanā hi munayaḥ śraddhāvanto divaṃ gatāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2306: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapastaptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
GP12garup2_u:2307: asadityucyate pakṣinpretya ceha na tatphalam // GarP_2,12.33 //
GP12garup2_u:2308: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakādṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde mṛtasya dharmamātrānuyāyitvanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśo
GP12garup2_u:2311: karmaṇā kena deveśa pretatvaṃ naiva jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:2312: pṛthivyāṃ sarvajantūnāṃ tad brūhi parameśvara // GarP_2,13.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2319: jīvanvāpi mṛto vāpi vṛṣotsargaṃ karoti yaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2320: pretatvaṃ na bhavettasya vinā dānamakhavrataiḥ // GarP_2,13.4 //
GP12garup2_u:2324: kiṃ phalaṃ tu bhavedante kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaistu ṣoḍaśaiḥ // GarP_2,13.6 //
GP12garup2_u:2327: nopatiṣṭhati tacchreyo dātuḥ pretasya niṣphalam // GarP_2,13.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2329: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi // GarP_2,13.8 //
GP12garup2_u:2332: jalena śṛṅgiṇā vāpi śastrādyairmriyate yadi // GarP_2,13.9 //
GP12garup2_u:2337: sārdhamāsena vaiśyastu śūdro māsena śudhyati // GarP_2,13.11 //
GP12garup2_u:2339: brahmacārī śucirbhūtvā na sa yātīha durgatim // GarP_2,13.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2344: puttro vā sodaro vāpi pautro bandhujanastathā /
GP12garup2_u:2345: gotriṇaścārthabhāgī ca mṛte kuryād vṛṣotsavam // GarP_2,13.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2346: putrābhāve tu patnī syāddauhittro duhītāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:2347: puttreṣu vidyamāneṣu vṛṣaṃ nānyena kārayet // GarP_2,13.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2349: puttrā yasya na vidyante narā nāryaḥ sureśvara /
GP12garup2_u:2352: aputtrasya gatirnāsti svargo naiva ca naiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:2354: yāni kāni ca dānāni svayaṃ dattāni mānavaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2355: tānitāni ca sarvāṇi tūpatiṣṭhanti cāgrataḥ // GarP_2,13.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2357: svahastena pradattāni dehānte cākṣayaṃ phalam // GarP_2,13.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2363: vāyubhūtaḥ kṣudhāviṣṭo bhramate ca divāniśam // GarP_2,13.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2364: kṛmiḥ kīṭaḥ pataṅgo vā jāyate mriyate punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2365: asadgarbhe bhavetso 'pi jātaḥ sadyo vinaśyati // GarP_2,13.24 //
GP12garup2_u:2366: yāvatsvasthamidaṃ śarīramarujaṃ yāvajjarā dūrato yāvaccendriyaśaktirapratihatā yāvatkṣayo nāyuṣaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2367: ātmaśreyasi tāvadeva viduṣā kāryaḥ prayatno mahānsandīpte bhavane tu kūpakhananaṃ pratyudyamaḥ kīdṛśaḥ // GarP_2,13.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2368: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsargadānadharmaputrādipraśaṃsanaṃ nāma trayodaśo
GP12garup2_u:2372: svasthāvasthena dattena vidhihīnena vā vibho // GarP_2,14.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2374: ekā gauḥ svasthacittasya hyāturasya ca gośatam /
GP12garup2_u:2381: dātavyaṃ pratyahaṃ pātre nimitteṣu viśeṣataḥ // GarP_2,14.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2383: apātre jātu gaurdattā dātāraṃ narakaṃ nayet // GarP_2,14.6 //
GP12garup2_u:2385: dehāntaraṃ pariprāpya svahastena kṛtaṃ ca yat // GarP_2,14.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2390: svalpenāpi hi vittena svayaṃ hastena yatkṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:2391: akṣayaṃ yāti tatsarvaṃ yathājyaṃ ca hutāśane // GarP_2,14.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2392: ekā caikasya dātavyā śayyā kanyā payasvinī /
GP12garup2_u:2393: sā vikrītā vā dahatyāsaptamaṃ kulam // GarP_2,14.11 //
GP12garup2_u:2397: evaṃ jñātvā khagaśreṣṭha vṛṣayajñaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,14.13 //
GP12garup2_u:2398: akṛtvā mriyate yastu aputro naiva muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:2399: aputro 'pi hi yaḥ kuryātsukhaṃ yāti mahāpathe // GarP_2,14.14 //
GP12garup2_u:2401: na tāṃ gatimavāpnoti vṛṣotsargeṇa yā gatiḥ // GarP_2,14.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2406: kasminkāle tithau kasyāṃ vidhinā kena tadbhavet // GarP_2,14.17 //
GP12garup2_u:2407: kṛtvā kiṃ phalamāpnoti etanme vada sāmpratam /
GP12garup2_u:2408: tvatprasādena govinda mukte bhavati mānavaḥ // GarP_2,14.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2412: śubhe lagne muhūrte vā śucau deśe samāhitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2413: brāhmaṇaṃ tu samāhūya vidhijñaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam // GarP_2,14.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2417: grahāṇāṃ sthāpanaṃ kuryātpūrvaṃ caiva khageśvara // GarP_2,14.22 //
GP12garup2_u:2418: mātṝṇāṃ pūjanaṃ kāryaṃ vasordhārāṃ ca pātayet /
GP12garup2_u:2419: vahniṃ saṃsthāpya tatraiva pūrṇaṃ homaṃ tu kārayet // GarP_2,14.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2423: pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhomānte ca visarjanam // GarP_2,14.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2425: dharma tvaṃ vṛṣarūpeṇa brahmaṇā nirmitaḥ purā // GarP_2,14.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2429: abhiṣiñcettato nīlaṃ rudrakumbho dakena tu // GarP_2,14.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2431: anna (ātma) śrāddhaṃ tataḥ kuryāddadyāddānaṃ dvijottame // GarP_2,14.29 //
GP12garup2_u:2434: nyūnaṃ saṃpūrṇatāṃ yāti vṛṣotsarge kṛte sati /
GP12garup2_u:2435: sutṛpto dustare mārge mṛto yāti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,14.31 //
GP12garup2_u:2436: yamalokaṃ na paśyanti sadā dānaratā narāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2437: yāvanna dīyate jantoḥ śrāddhaṃ caikādaśāhikam // GarP_2,14.32 //
GP12garup2_u:2439: trayodaśā tathā sapta pañca trīṇī krameṇa tu // GarP_2,14.33 //
GP12garup2_u:2441: tilapātrāṇi kurvīta sapta pañca yathākramam // GarP_2,14.34 //
GP12garup2_u:2443: vṛṣaṃ hi śannodevīti vedoktavidhinā tataḥ // GarP_2,14.35 //
GP12garup2_u:2445: vāme cakraṃ pradātavyaṃ triśūlaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā // GarP_2,14.36 //
GP12garup2_u:2446: mūlyaṃ dadyād vṛṣasyāpi taṃ vṛṣaṃ ca visarjayet /
GP12garup2_u:2459: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,14.43 //
GP12garup2_u:2461: tilapātrāṇi kurvīta śayyādānaṃ ca dāpayet // GarP_2,14.44 //
GP12garup2_u:2463: evaṃ yaḥ kurute tārkṣya putravānapyaputravān // GarP_2,14.45 //
GP12garup2_u:2464: sa siddhiṃ samavāpnoti yathā te brahmacāriṇaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2469: puṇyaṃ deyaṃ prayatnena pratyahaṃ vardhate khaga // GarP_2,14.48 //
GP12garup2_u:2471: tattasya cākṣayaṃ sarvaṃ vedikāyāṃ yathā kila // GarP_2,14.49 //
GP12garup2_u:2473: tathaiva pratipūjyante loke sarve ca nityaśaḥ // GarP_2,14.50 //
GP12garup2_u:2475: te yānti paramāṃllokāniti satyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,14.51 //
GP12garup2_u:2477: śṛṅgeṇālikhate vāpi bhūmiṃ nityaṃ praharṣitaḥ // GarP_2,14.52 //
GP12garup2_u:2486: ye namasyanti govindaṃ na teṣāṃ vidyate bhayam /
GP12garup2_u:2488: yāsyanti te parāṃllokāniti satyaṃ vaco mama /
GP12garup2_u:2493: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde godānavṛṣotsargadaśadānabhūridānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2500: prayāṇakāni sarvāṇi nagarāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,15.2 //
GP12garup2_u:2502: yamalokasya cordhvaṃ vai antarā mānuṣasya ca // GarP_2,15.3 //
GP12garup2_u:2503: kukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vāpi bhuktvā loke yathārjitam /
GP12garup2_u:2506: yasya yo vihito mṛtyuḥ sa taṃ dhruvamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,15.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2513: ekā vaktre tu dātavyā ghrāṇayugme tathā punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2514: akṣṇośca karṇayoścaiva dvedve deye yathākramam // GarP_2,15.9 //
GP12garup2_u:2515: atha liṅge tathā caikā tvekāṃ brahmāṇḍakekṣipet /
GP12garup2_u:2516: karayugme ca kaṇṭhe ca tulasīṃ ca pradāpayet // GarP_2,15.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2520: pituḥ pretaṃ svayaṃ putraḥ skandhamāropya bāndhavaiḥ // GarP_2,15.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2522: adagdhapūrvā yā bhūmiścitāṃ tatraiva kārayet // GarP_2,15.13 //
GP12garup2_u:2527: bībhatsaṃ dāruṇaṃ rūpaṃ praṇaiḥ kaṇṭhaṃ samāśritaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2528: phenamudgirate kopi mukhaṃ lālākulaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,15.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2531: duḥ khena pāpino yānti yamamārge ca durgame /
GP12garup2_u:2534: āhūya pāpinaḥ sarvānyamo daṇḍena rajjayet // GarP_2,15.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2540: aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo hāhā kurvan kalevarāt // GarP_2,15.22 //
GP12garup2_u:2542: nirviceṣṭaṃ śarīraṃ tu prāṇairmuktaṃ jugupsitam // GarP_2,15.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2546: dānaṃ vittādṛtā vācaḥ kīrtidharmau tathāyuṣaḥ // GarP_2,15.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2548: tasyaivaṃ nīyamānasya dūtāḥ santarjayanti hi // GarP_2,15.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2549: darśayanto bhayaṃ tīvraṃ narakāya punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2550: śīghraṃ pracala duṣṭātman gato 'sitvaṃ yamālaye // GarP_2,15.27 //
GP12garup2_u:2552: evaṃ vācastadā śṛṇvanbandhūnāṃ ruditaṃ tathā // GarP_2,15.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2554: sthāne śrāddhaṃ prakurvīta tathā cekādaśe 'hani // GarP_2,15.29 //
GP12garup2_u:2556: mṛtasthāne tathā dvāre catvare tārkṣya kāraṇāt // GarP_2,15.30 //
GP12garup2_u:2557: viśrāme kāṣṭhacayane tathā sañcayane ca ṣaṭ /
GP12garup2_u:2558: śṛṇu tatkāraṇaṃ tārkṣya ṣaṭ piṇḍaparikalpane // GarP_2,15.31 //
GP12garup2_u:2559: mṛtasthāne śavo nāma tena nāmnā pradīyate /
GP12garup2_u:2562: dvāre tu piṇḍaṃ deyaṃ ca pānthamityabhidhāya tu // GarP_2,15.33 //
GP12garup2_u:2564: catvare khecaro nāma tamuddiśya pradāpayet // GarP_2,15.34 //
GP12garup2_u:2566: viśrāme bhūtasaṃjño 'yaṃ tena tatra pradāpayet // GarP_2,15.35 //
GP12garup2_u:2567: piśācā rākṣasā yakṣā ye cānye diśi vāsinaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2570: citāyāṃ sādhakaṃ nāma vadantyeke khageśvara // GarP_2,15.37 //
GP12garup2_u:2574: anyathā copaghātāya pūrvoktāste bhavanti hi // GarP_2,15.39 //
GP12garup2_u:2575: utkrāme prathamaṃ piṇḍaṃ tathā cārdhapayepi ca /
GP12garup2_u:2576: citāyāṃ tu tṛtīyaṃ syāttrayaḥ piṇḍāśca kalpitāḥ // GarP_2,15.40 //
GP12garup2_u:2590: yamāya cāntakāyeti mṛtyave brahmaṇe tathā // GarP_2,15.47 //
GP12garup2_u:2592: ūrdhvaṃ tu jvālayedvahniṃ pūrvabhāge citāṃ punaḥ // GarP_2,15.48 //
GP12garup2_u:2594: asau svargāya lokāya svāhā jvalati pāvakaḥ // GarP_2,15.49 //
GP12garup2_u:2596: tato dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ putreṇa kila niścitam // GarP_2,15.50 //
GP12garup2_u:2597: roditavyaṃ tato gāḍhamevaṃ tasya sukhaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:2600: tāvadbhūtāḥ pratīkṣante taṃ pretaṃ bāndhavārthinam // GarP_2,15.52 //
GP12garup2_u:2606: dvārasya dakṣiṇe bhāge gomayaṃ gaurasarṣapān // GarP_2,15.55 //
GP12garup2_u:2608: bhakṣayennimbapatrāṇi ghṛtaṃ prāśya gṛhaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,15.56 //
GP12garup2_u:2610: aśrupātaṃ na kurvīta dadyādasmai jalāñjalīn // GarP_2,15.57 //
GP12garup2_u:2612: ato na roditavyaṃ hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ svaśaktitaḥ // GarP_2,15.58 //
GP12garup2_u:2613: dugdhaṃ ca mṛnmaye pātre toyaṃ dadyāddinatrayam /
GP12garup2_u:2614: sūrye cāstaṃ gate tārkṣya valabhyāṃ catvare 'pi vā // GarP_2,15.59 //
GP12garup2_u:2616: śmaśānaṃ catvaraṃ gehaṃ vīkṣanyāmyaiḥ sa nīyate // GarP_2,15.60 //
GP12garup2_u:2617: garte piṇḍā daśāhaṃ ca dātavyāśca dinedine /
GP12garup2_u:2620: puttreṇa hi kriyā kāryā bhāryayā tadabhāvataḥ // GarP_2,15.62 //
GP12garup2_u:2622: śmaśāne cānyatīrthe vā jalaṃ piṇḍaṃ ca dāpayet // GarP_2,15.63 //
GP12garup2_u:2626: pratyahaṃ te vibhajyante caturbhāgāḥ khageśvara // GarP_2,15.65 //
GP12garup2_u:2632: nāma gotraṃ samuccārya yaddattaṃ taddaśāhikam // GarP_2,15.68 //
GP12garup2_u:2634: prathame 'hani yaḥ piṇḍastena mūrdhā prajāyate // GarP_2,15.69 //
GP12garup2_u:2635: grīvā skandhau dvitīye ca tṛtīye hṛdayaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:2636: caturthena bhavetpṛṣṭhaṃ pañcame nābhireva ca // GarP_2,15.70 //
GP12garup2_u:2637: ṣaṭ saptame kaṭī guhyamṛrū cāpyaṣṭame tathā /
GP12garup2_u:2638: tālū pādau ca navame daśame 'hni kṣudhā bhavet // GarP_2,15.71 //
GP12garup2_u:2639: dehaṃ prāptaḥ kṣudhāviṣṭo gṛhe dvāre ca tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup2_u:2640: daśame 'hani yaḥ piṇḍastaṃ dadyādāmiṣeṇa tu // GarP_2,15.72 //
GP12garup2_u:2642: atastvāmiṣabāhyena kṣudhā tasya na naśyati // GarP_2,15.73 //
GP12garup2_u:2647: trayodaśe 'hni sa preto nīyate ca mahāpathe /
GP12garup2_u:2648: piṇḍajaṃ dehamāśritya divā naktaṃ bubhukṣitaḥ // GarP_2,15.76 //
GP12garup2_u:2650: kṣudhā tṛṣṇātmikā caiva savva saumyaṃ kṛtātmanām // GarP_2,15.77 //
GP12garup2_u:2655: gṛhīto yamapāśaiśca hāheti rudite tu saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2656: svagṛhaṃ tu parityajya yāmyaṃ puramanuvrajet // GarP_2,15.80 //
GP12garup2_u:2657: krameṇa yāti sa pretaḥ puraṃ yāmyaṃ śubhāśubham /
GP12garup2_u:2658: atītya tānitānyeva mārge puravarāṇi ca // GarP_2,15.81 //
GP12garup2_u:2660: kroñcaṃ krūrapuraṃ vicitrabhavanaṃ bahvāpadaṃ duḥ khadam // GarP_2,15.82 //
GP12garup2_u:2661: nānākrandapuraṃ sutaprabhavanaṃ raudraṃ payovarṣaṇaṃ śītāḍhyaṃ bahudharmabhītabhavanaṃ yāmyaṃ puraṃ cāgrataḥ // GarP_2,15.83 //
GP12garup2_u:2663: tasminmārge brajatyeko gṛhīta iva markaṭaḥ // GarP_2,15.84 //
GP12garup2_u:2664: tathava sa vrajanmārge putraputreti ca bruvan /
GP12garup2_u:2665: hāheti krandate nityaṃ kīdṛśaṃ tu mayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.85 //
GP12garup2_u:2667: mahatā puṇyayogena mānuṣyaṃ janma labhyate // GarP_2,15.86 //
GP12garup2_u:2668: na tatprāpya pradattaṃ hi yācakebhyaḥ svakaṃ dhanam /
GP12garup2_u:2672: sukhasya duḥ khasya na kopi dātā paro dadātīti kubuddhireṣā /
GP12garup2_u:2673: purā kṛtaṃ karma sadaiva bhujyate dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.89 //
GP12garup2_u:2674: mayā na dattaṃ na hutaṃ hutāśane tapo na taptaṃ himaśailagahvare /
GP12garup2_u:2675: na sevitaṃ gāṅgamaho mahājalaṃ dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.90 //
GP12garup2_u:2676: na nityadānaṃ na gāvāhnikaṃ kṛtaṃ na vedadānaṃ na ca śāstrapustakam /
GP12garup2_u:2677: purā nadṛṣṭaṃ na ca sevito 'dhvā dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.91 //
GP12garup2_u:2678: jalāśayo naiva kṛto hi nirjale manuṣyahetoḥ paśupakṣihetave /
GP12garup2_u:2679: gotṛptihetorna kṛtaṃ hi gocaraṃ dehinkvacinnastara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.92 //
GP12garup2_u:2680: mayā na bhuktaṃ patisaṅgasaukhyaṃ vahnipraveśo na kṛto mṛte sati /
GP12garup2_u:2681: tasminmṛte tadvratapālanaṃ vā dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.93 //
GP12garup2_u:2683: nārīśarīraṃ bahuduḥ khabhājanaṃ labdhaṃ mayā pūrvakṛtairvikarmabhiḥ // GarP_2,15.94 //
GP12garup2_u:2684: uktāni vācyāni mayā narāṇāmataḥ śṛṇuṣvāvahito 'pi pakṣin /
GP12garup2_u:2685: strīṇāṃ śarīraṃ pratilabhya dehī bravīti karmāṇi kṛtāni pūrvam // GarP_2,15.95 //
GP12garup2_u:2686: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde yamalokavistāratanmāhātmyatadyānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśo
GP12garup2_u:2690: krandamānasya nitarāṃ pīḍitasya ca kiṅkaraiḥ // GarP_2,16.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2692: aṣṭādaśe tvahorātre pūrvaṃ yāmyapuraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,16.2 //
GP12garup2_u:2693: tasminpuravare ramye pretānāṃ ca gaṇo mahān /
GP12garup2_u:2695: pure sa tatra viśrāmaṃ prāpyate yamakiṅkaraiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2696: jāyāputrādikaṃ saukhyaṃ smarettatra suduḥ khitaḥ // GarP_2,16.4 //
GP12garup2_u:2698: svadhanaṃ svakalatrāṇi gṛhaṃ putrāḥ sukhāni ca // GarP_2,16.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2699: bhṛtyamitrāṇi cānyacca sarvaṃ śocati vai tadā /
GP12garup2_u:2702: kva dhanaṃ kva sutā jāyā kva gṛhaṃ kva tvamīdṛśaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2703: svakarmopārjitaṃ bhuṅkṣva ciraṃ gaccha mahāpathe // GarP_2,16.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2704: jānāsi śaṃbalavaśaṃ balamadhvagānāṃ no śaṃbalaḥ prayatate paralokapāntha /
GP12garup2_u:2705: gantavyamasti tava niścitameva tena mārgeṇa yatra bhavataḥ krayavikrayau na // GarP_2,16.8 //
GP12garup2_u:2710: māsikaṃ piṇḍamaśrāti tataḥ sauripuraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,16.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2711: tatra nāmnā tu rājā vai jaṅgamaḥ kālarūpadhṛk /
GP12garup2_u:2712: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhayabhītastu viśrāme kurute matim // GarP_2,16.11 //
GP12garup2_u:2714: traipakṣike tu yaddattaṃ tatpuraṃ sa vyatikramet // GarP_2,16.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2716: gacchanvanāni raudrāṇi dṛṣṭvā krandati tatra saḥ // GarP_2,16.13 //
GP12garup2_u:2717: bhīṣaṇaiḥ kliśyamānastu rudate ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2719: bhuktvā cānnaṃ jalaṃ pītvā yaddattaṃ vāndhavairiha /
GP12garup2_u:2722: tṛtīyaṃ māsikaṃ bhuktvā tatra gacchatyasau puraḥ // GarP_2,16.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2723: śailāgamaṃ caturthe sa māse prāpnoti vai puram /
GP12garup2_u:2725: caturthamāsike śrāddhaṃ bhukte tatra sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,16.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2726: tato yāti puraṃ pretaḥ krūraṃ māse tu pañcame /
GP12garup2_u:2727: iha dattaṃ sutairbhuṅkte preto vai tatpure sthitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2728: ṣaṣṭhe māsi tataḥ preto yāti krauñcābidhaṃ puram // GarP_2,16.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2730: muhūrtārdhaṃ tu viśramya kampamānaḥ suduḥ khitaḥ // GarP_2,16.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2732: prayāti citranagaraṃ vicitro yatra pārthivaḥ // GarP_2,16.21 //
GP12garup2_u:2736: mārge punaḥ punastasya bubhukṣā pīḍayatyalam // GarP_2,16.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2738: saukhyaṃ yo me janayati patataḥ śokasāgare // GarP_2,16.24 //
GP12garup2_u:2744: vayaṃ tvāṃ tārayiṣyāmaḥ sukheneti vadanti te // GarP_2,16.27 //
GP12garup2_u:2745: antaraṃ dehi bho pāntha bahulā cedrucistava /
GP12garup2_u:2746: tena tatra pradattā gaustayā nāvā prasarpati /
GP12garup2_u:2747: manujānāṃ hitaṃ dānamante vaitaraṇī smṛtā // GarP_2,16.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2748: parāpāpaṃ dahetsarvaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ ca sā nayet /
GP12garup2_u:2749: na dattā cetkhagaśreṣṭha tāṃ sametya samajjati // GarP_2,16.29 //
GP12garup2_u:2751: deyā ca viduṣe dhenustāṃ nadīṃ tartumicchatā // GarP_2,16.30 //
GP12garup2_u:2753: pātheyārthaṃ mayā kiñcinna pradattaṃ dvijāyaca // GarP_2,16.31 //
GP12garup2_u:2754: na dattaṃ na hutaṃ japtaṃ na snātaṃ na kṛtaṃ stutam /
GP12garup2_u:2755: yādṛśaṃ karma caritaṃ mūḍha bhuṅkṣveti tādṛśam // GarP_2,16.32 //
GP12garup2_u:2757: vaitaraṇyāḥ parataṭe bhuṅkte dattaṃ ghaṭādikam // GarP_2,16.33 //
GP12garup2_u:2759: tārkṣya tatra viśeṣeṇa bhojayīta dvijāñchubhān // GarP_2,16.34 //
GP12garup2_u:2761: prayāti pratyahaṃ tārkṣya ahorātreṇa karśitaḥ // GarP_2,16.35 //
GP12garup2_u:2762: saptame māsi samprāpte puraṃ bahvāpadaṃ vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:2763: tatra bhuktva pradattaṃ yacchrāddhaṃ saptamamāsikam // GarP_2,16.36 //
GP12garup2_u:2766: svayaṃ ca śūnyahṛdayaḥ samākrandati duḥ khitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2767: tanmāsikaṃ ca yacchrāddhaṃ bhuktvā tatra sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,16.38 //
GP12garup2_u:2768: vihāya tatpuraṃ preto yāti taptapuraṃ prati /
GP12garup2_u:2770: dvijabhojyaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ sutena yat // GarP_2,16.39 //
GP12garup2_u:2771: māsi vai daśame prāpte raudraṃ sthānaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:2772: daśame māsi yaddattaṃ tadbhuktvā ca prayāti saḥ // GarP_2,16.40 //
GP12garup2_u:2774: meghāstatra pravarṣanti pretānāṃ duḥ khadāyakāḥ // GarP_2,16.41 //
GP12garup2_u:2776: dvādaśe māsi yacchrāddhaṃ tatra bhuṅkte suduḥ śitaḥ // GarP_2,16.42 //
GP12garup2_u:2777: kiñcinnyūne tato varṣe sārdhe caikādaśe 'tha vā /
GP12garup2_u:2778: yāti śītapuraṃ tatra śītaṃ yatrātiduḥ khadam // GarP_2,16.43 //
GP12garup2_u:2779: śītārtaḥ kṣudhitaḥ so 'tha vīkṣate hi diśo daśa /
GP12garup2_u:2780: tiṣṭhettu bāndhavaḥ ko 'pi yo me duḥkhaṃ vyapohati // GarP_2,16.44 //
GP12garup2_u:2781: kiṅkarāstaṃ vadantyevaṃ kva te puṇyaṃ hi tādṛśam /
GP12garup2_u:2782: śrutvā teṣāṃ tu tadvākyaṃ hā daiva iti bhāṣate // GarP_2,16.45 //
GP12garup2_u:2783: daivaṃ hi pūrvasukṛtaṃ tanmayā naiva sañcitam /
GP12garup2_u:2784: evaṃ sañcintya bahuśo dhairyamālambate punaḥ // GarP_2,16.46 //
GP12garup2_u:2789: śubhāśubhaṃ tu yatkarma te vicārya punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2790: śravaṇā brahmaṇaḥ putrā manuṣyāṇāṃ ca ceṣṭitam /
GP12garup2_u:2791: kathayanti tadā loke pūjitāḥ pūjitāḥ svayam // GarP_2,16.49 //
GP12garup2_u:2792: naraistuṣṭaiśca puṣṭaiśca yatproktaṃ ca kṛtaṃ ca yat /
GP12garup2_u:2793: sarvamāvedayanti sma citragupte yame ca tat // GarP_2,16.50 //
GP12garup2_u:2797: evaṃ teṣāṃ śaktirasti yartye martyādhikāriṇaḥ // GarP_2,16.52 //
GP12garup2_u:2799: jāyante tasya te saumyāḥ sukhamṛtyupradāyinaḥ // GarP_2,16.53 //
GP12garup2_u:2800: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretayātrādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2803: eko me saṃśayo deva hṛdaye samprabādhate /
GP12garup2_u:2804: śramaṇāḥ kasya putrāśca kathaṃ yamapure sthitāḥ // GarP_2,17.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2805: mānuṣaiśca kṛtaṃ karma kasmājjānanti te prabho /
GP12garup2_u:2806: kathaṃ śṛṇvanti te sarve kasmājjñānaṃ samāgatam // GarP_2,17.2 //
GP12garup2_u:2813: kṣīrodasāgare pūrvaṃ mayi supte jagatpatau // GarP_2,17.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2816: brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ pūrvaṃ viṣṇunā pālitaṃ tadā /
GP12garup2_u:2817: rudraḥ saṃhāramūrtiśca nirmito brahmaṇā tataḥ // GarP_2,17.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2822: yoyo hi nirmitaḥ pūrvaṃ tattatkarma samācaret /
GP12garup2_u:2827: saṃcintya brahmaṇo mantraṃ vibudhaiḥ preritastadā // GarP_2,17.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2830: yoyaṃ vadati lokesmiñchubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
GP12garup2_u:2831: prāpayanti tataḥ śīghraṃ brahmaṇaḥ karṇagocaram // GarP_2,17.14 //
GP12garup2_u:2833: sarve śṛṇvanti yatpakṣiṃstenaiva śravaṇā matāḥ // GarP_2,17.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2834: sthitvā caiva tathākāśe jantūnāṃ ceṣṭitaṃ ca yat /
GP12garup2_u:2835: tajjñātvā dharmarājāgre mṛtyukāle vadanti ca // GarP_2,17.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2836: dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca kathayanti te /
GP12garup2_u:2839: uttamā dhamamārgeṇa vainateya prayānti hi // GarP_2,17.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2843: pāṣāṇaiḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ kliṣṭaḥ pāśabaddho 'tha yāti vai // GarP_2,17.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2849: dvādaśaṃ sakalatraṃ ca mama prītyai prapūjayet // GarP_2,17.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2850: devaiḥ sarvaiśca saṃpūjya svargaṃ yānti sukhepsayā /
GP12garup2_u:2853: śravaṇānāṃ ca māhātmyamutpattiṃ ceṣṭitaṃ śubham // GarP_2,17.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2854: śṛṇoti pakṣiśārdūla sa ca pāpairna lipyate /
GP12garup2_u:2855: iha loke sukhaṃ bhuktvā svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,17.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2856: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretaklape śravaṇamahātmyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaso 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2859: śravaṇānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā punastataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2862: citraguptastataḥ sarvaṃ karma tasmai vadatyatha // GarP_2,18.2 //
GP12garup2_u:2863: vācaiva yatkṛtaṃ karma kṛtaṃ caiva tu kāyikam /
GP12garup2_u:2864: mānasaṃ ca tathā karma kṛtaṃ bhuṅkte śubhāśubham // GarP_2,18.3 //
GP12garup2_u:2866: viśrānti dāni sarvāṇi sthānāni kathitāni te // GarP_2,18.4 //
GP12garup2_u:2868: divā rātrau tamuddiśya sthāne dīpaprado bhavet // GarP_2,18.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2870: dīpte 'dhvani ca te yānti dīpo dattaśca yairnaraiḥ // GarP_2,18.6 //
GP12garup2_u:2871: kārtike ca caturdaśyāṃ dīpadānaṃ sukhāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:2877: tadahni dīyate sarvaṃ dvādaśāhe viśeṣataḥ // GarP_2,18.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2881: eka evāsti sarvatre vyavahāraḥ khagādhipa // GarP_2,18.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2885: mṛte yadbāndhavairdattaṃ tadāśritya sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,18.14 //
GP12garup2_u:2888: dīyate kasya deveśa tadvadasva yathātatham // GarP_2,18.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2891: āsanaṃ bhājanaṃ caiva padaṃ saptavidhaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,18.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2892: ātapastatra yo raudro dahyate yena mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2895: aśvārūḍhāśca gacchanti dadate ya upānahau // GarP_2,18.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2898: sukhena bhuṅkte sa pretaḥ pathi gacchañchanaiḥ śanaiḥ // GarP_2,18.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2914: sa gacchati mahāmārge taddattaṃ kena gṛhyate // GarP_2,18.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2916: gṛhṇāti varuṇo dānaṃ mama haste prayacchati /
GP12garup2_u:2917: ahaṃ ca bhāskare deve bhāskarātso 'śnute sukham // GarP_2,18.27 //
GP12garup2_u:2919: sarve te narakaṃ yānti yāvatpāpasya saṃkṣayaḥ // GarP_2,18.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2923: teṣāṃ madhye śreṣṭhatamā ghorā yā ekaviṃśatiḥ // GarP_2,18.30 //
GP12garup2_u:2930: yeṣāṃ tu narake ghore bahvabdāni gatāni vai /
GP12garup2_u:2931: santātarnaiva vidyate dūtatvaṃ te tu (pretya) yānti hi // GarP_2,18.34 //
GP12garup2_u:2932: yamena preṣitāste vai mānuṣasya mṛtasya tu /
GP12garup2_u:2935: māsānte bhojanaṃ piṇḍameke yacchanti tatra vai // GarP_2,18.36 //
GP12garup2_u:2936: tṛptiṃ prayānti te sarve pratyahaṃ caiva vatsaram /
GP12garup2_u:2941: jāmadagnyasyeva rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tejaḥ prasarpati // GarP_2,18.39 //
GP12garup2_u:2946: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti naro 'parāṇi /
GP12garup2_u:2947: tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇānyanyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī // GarP_2,18.42 //
GP12garup2_u:2948: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmadṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍa saṃvāde vṛṣotsarganānādānaphalayamalokagamanakarmajadehaprāptinirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2952: te dehaṃ sa samāsādya yamena saha gacchati // GarP_2,19.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2958: dattaṃ tenaiva tṛpyanti yamasya puracāriṇaḥ // GarP_2,19.4 //
GP12garup2_u:2959: gatvā ca tatra te sarve pratīhāraṃ vadanti hi /
GP12garup2_u:2962: tatra gatvā pratīhāro brūte tasya śubhāśubham // GarP_2,19.6 //
GP12garup2_u:2964: paśyanti ca durātmāno yamarūpaṃ subhīṣaṇam // GarP_2,19.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2965: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhayabhītastu hāheti vadate janaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2966: kṛtaṃ dānaṃ ca yairmartyaisteṣāṃ nāsti bhayaṃ kvacit // GarP_2,19.8 //
GP12garup2_u:2967: prāptaṃ sukṛtinaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānācca lati sūryajaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2968: eṣa me maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā brahmalokaṃ prayāsyati // GarP_2,19.9 //
GP12garup2_u:2970: eṣa mārgo viśālo 'tra na kenāpya nugamyate /
GP12garup2_u:2971: dānapuṇyaṃ vinā vatsa na gaccheddharmamandiram // GarP_2,19.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2972: tasminmārge tu raudre vai bhīṣaṇā yamakiṅkarāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2975: gṛhṇanti māsamāsānte pādaśeṣaṃ tu tadbhavet // GarP_2,19.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2980: daivikīṃ paitṛkīṃ yoniṃ mānuṣīṃ vātha nārakīm // GarP_2,19.14 //
GP12garup2_u:2982: mānuṣyaṃ tattvataḥ prāpya sa puttraḥ puttratāṃ vrajet // GarP_2,19.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2983: yathāyathā kṛtaṃ karma tāntāṃ yoniṃ vrajennaraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2986: yadā bhavati mānuṣyaṃ tadā dharmaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,19.17 //
GP12garup2_u:2987: kṛmayo bhasma viṣṭhā vā dehānāṃ prakṛtiḥ sadā /
GP12garup2_u:2988: andhakūpe mahāraudre dīpahastaḥ pātettu vai // GarP_2,19.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2990: yastatprāpya careddharmaṃ sa gacchetparamāṃ gatim // GarP_2,19.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2991: api jānanvṛthā dharmaṃ duḥ khamāyāti yāti ca // GarP_2,19.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2992: jātīśatena labhate kila mānuṣatvaṃ tatrāpi durlabhataraṃ khaga bho dvijatvam /
GP12garup2_u:2993: yastatra pālayati lālayati vratāni tasyāmṛtaṃ bhavati hastagataṃ prasādāt // GarP_2,19.21 //
GP12garup2_u:2994: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde
GP12garup2_u:2998: ye kecitpretarūpeṇa kutra vāsaṃ labhanti te /
GP12garup2_u:2999: pretalokādvinirmuktāḥ kathaṃ kutra vrajanti te // GarP_2,20.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3005: pakṣirāja śṛṇuṣva tvaṃ yatra pretāścaranti vai /
GP12garup2_u:3011: te vyavasyanti ca pretā vadhopāyaṃ ca bandhuṣu // GarP_2,20.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3014: svaṃ veśma punarāgatya mitrasthāne viśanti te /
GP12garup2_u:3021: pibanti te ca pānīyaṃ bhojanocchiṣṭayojitam // GarP_2,20.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3024: kathaṃ kurvanti te pretāḥ kena rūpeṇa kasya kim /
GP12garup2_u:3025: jñāyate kena vidhinā jalpanti na vadanti vā // GarP_2,20.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3026: enaṃ chindhi manomohaṃ mama cedicchasi priyam /
GP12garup2_u:3027: kalikāle hṛṣīkeśa pretatvaṃ jāyate bahu // GarP_2,20.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3030: jīvansa dṛśyate snehī mṛto duṣṭatvamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,20.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3032: satyavāk priyavādī ca na pretaiḥ sa hi pīḍyate // GarP_2,20.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3036: kṛtādau dvāparānte ca na preto naiva pīḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:3041: virodho bandhubhiḥ sārdhaṃ pretadoṣeṇa kāśyapa // GarP_2,20.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3047: syāddhantakalaho nityaṃ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3051: paradravyāṇāṃ ca hartā sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3053: loke kalahakārī ca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3055: pretapīḍā tu sā jñeyā satyaṃsatyaṃ khageśvara // GarP_2,20.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3056: hīnajātyā ca sambandho hīnakarma karoti yaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3057: adharme ramate nityaṃ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3061: jāyā saṃpīḍhyate yacca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3063: abhāvo jāyate dharme sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3065: pratyakṣaṃ vā parokṣaṃ vā sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3068: strīṇāṃ garbhavināśaḥ syānna puṣpaṃ dṛśyate tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3069: bālānāṃ maraṇaṃ yatra sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3071: svayameva na kurvīta sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.35 //
GP12garup2_u:3072: tīrthe gattvā parāsaktaḥ svakṛtyaṃ ca parityajet /
GP12garup2_u:3073: dharmakārye na sampattiḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3075: paradrohe matiścaiva sā pīḍā pretasaṃbhavā // GarP_2,20.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3076: puṣpaṃ yatra na dṛśyena phalaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3077: viraho bhāryayā yatra sā pīḍā pretasagbhavā // GarP_2,20.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3078: yeṣāṃ vai jāyate cihnaṃ sadoccāṭaparaṃ nṛṇām /
GP12garup2_u:3079: svakṣetre niṣphalaṃ tejaḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.39 //
GP12garup2_u:3081: na prītirnāpi saukhyaṃ ca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3082: pitṛvākyaṃ na kurute svapatnīṃ ca na sevate /
GP12garup2_u:3083: sadā krūramatirvyagraḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.41 //
GP12garup2_u:3087: pretatvaṃ jāyate tārkṣya pīḍyante yena jantavaḥ // GarP_2,20.43 //
GP12garup2_u:3089: yo vai na manyate pretānmṛtaḥ pretatvamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,20.44 //
GP12garup2_u:3090: pretadoṣaḥ kule yasya sukhaṃ tasya na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:3092: tṛtīye pañcame puṃsi vaṃśacchedo hi jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3094: ye kecitpetarūpā vikṛtamukhadṛśo raudrarūpāḥ karālā manyante naiva gotraṃ sutaduhitṛpitṝn bhrātṛjāyāṃ vadhūṃ vā /
GP12garup2_u:3095: kṛtvā kāmyaṃ ca rūpaṃ sukhagatirahitā bhāṣamāṇā yatheṣṭaṃ hā kaṣṭaṃ bhoktukāmā vidhivaśapatitāḥ saṃsmaranti svapākam // GarP_2,20.47 //
GP12garup2_u:3096: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pratakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretāvāsatadbādhāprakāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3100: yanmuktau ca manuṣyāṇāṃ na pīḍā jāyate punaḥ // GarP_2,21.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3102: teṣāṃ kadā bhavenmuktiḥ pretatvaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,21.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3103: pretatve hi pramāṇaṃ ca kati varṣāṇi saṃkhyayā /
GP12garup2_u:3106: muktiṃ prāyanti te pretāstadahaṃ kathayāmi te /
GP12garup2_u:3107: yadaiva manujo 'vaiti mama pīḍā kṛtā tviyam // GarP_2,21.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3109: svapne dṛṣṭaḥ śubho vṛkṣaḥ phalitaścūtacampakaḥ // GarP_2,21.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3110: vipro vā vṛṣabho devo bhramate tīrthago yadi /
GP12garup2_u:3111: evaṃ dṛṣṭo yadā svapno mṛtaḥ ko 'pisvagotrajaḥ // GarP_2,21.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3115: dharmāpāyaṃ prakurute pretapīḍā tadā vrajet // GarP_2,21.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3116: tadā tatra vināśāya cittabhaṅgaṃ karoti sā /
GP12garup2_u:3118: aśreyasi pravṛtti ca prerayanti punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3119: uccāṭanaṃ ca krūratvaṃ sarvaṃ pretakṛtaṃ khaga // GarP_2,21.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3121: tasya karmaphalaṃ sādhu pretavṛttiśca śāśvatī // GarP_2,21.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3122: sa bhavettena muktastu dattaṃ śreyaskaraṃ param /
GP12garup2_u:3123: svayaṃ tṛpyati bhoḥ pakṣinyasyoddeśena dīyate // GarP_2,21.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3124: śṛṇu satyamidaṃ tārkṣya yaddadāti bhunakti saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3125: ātmānaṃ śreyasā yuñjyātpretastṛptiṃ ciraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,21.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3127: ajñātayastu ye duṣṭāḥ pīḍayanti svavaṃśajān // GarP_2,21.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3130: sadā bandhuṣu yacchanti vṛddhimṛddhiṃ khagādhipa // GarP_2,21.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3132: na prāpayati mūḍhātmā pretaśāpaiḥ sa lipyate // GarP_2,21.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3135: evaṃ bruvanti te pretāḥ punaryābhyaṃ samāśritāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3138: nāma gotraṃ na dṛśyeta pratītirnaiva jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3140: na svapnaścaiṣṭitaṃ naiva darśanaṃ na kadācana /
GP12garup2_u:3141: kiṃ kartavyaṃ suraśreṣṭha tatra me brūhi niścitam // GarP_2,21.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3146: kṛtvā kṛṣṇabaliṃ caiva puraścaraṇa pūrvakam // GarP_2,21.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3148: kṛtena tena vighnāni vinaśyanti khageśvara // GarP_2,21.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3151: vimuktaḥ sarvapīḍābhya iti satyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,21.24 //
GP12garup2_u:3154: navame daśame varṣe pikṣuddeśena vai pumān /
GP12garup2_u:3155: gāyattrīmayutaṃ japtvā daśāṃśena ca homayet // GarP_2,21.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3162: anyā yā devatā loke na dehaprabhavo hi tāḥ // GarP_2,21.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3164: deho datto hi yenaivaṃ ko 'nyaḥ pūjyatamastataḥ // GarP_2,21.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3166: tatsarvamātmanā bhuṅkte dānaṃ vedavido viduḥ // GarP_2,21.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3168: tasmātputtra iti prokta iha cāpi paratra ca // GarP_2,21.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3172: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi pretacihnaṃ na paśyati // GarP_2,21.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3173: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakādṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde svapnādhyāyo nāmaikaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3176: sambhavanti kathaṃ pretāḥ kena teṣāṃ gatirbhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3177: kīdṛkteṣāṃ bhavedrūpaṃ bhojanaṃ kiṃ bhavetprabho // GarP_2,22.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3178: suprītāste kathaṃ pretāḥ kva tiṣṭhanti sureśvara /
GP12garup2_u:3179: prasannaḥ kṛpayā deva praśramenaṃ vadasva me // GarP_2,22.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3182: jāyante te mṛtāḥ pretāstāñchṛṇuṣva vadāmyaham // GarP_2,22.3 //
GP12garup2_u:3184: prapāṃ sadma suvṛkṣāṃśca tathā bhojanaśālikāḥ // GarP_2,22.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3188: karṣayanti ca ye lobhātpretāste vai bhavanti hi // GarP_2,22.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3198: rajasvalādidoṣaiśca na ca bhūmau matāśca ye // GarP_2,22.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3200: sūtakaiḥ śvādisaṃparkaiḥ pretabhāvā iha kṣitau // GarP_2,22.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3202: te sarve pretayonisthā vicaranti marusthale // GarP_2,22.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3203: mātaraṃ bhaginīṃ bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3204: adṛṣṭadoṣāṃ tyajati sa preto jāyatedhruvam // GarP_2,22.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3208: viśvāsaghātī krūrastu sa preto jāyate dhruvam // GarP_2,22.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3216: kena vā mucyate kasmāttanme brūhi pitāmaha /
GP12garup2_u:3217: yacchrutvā na punarmohamevaṃ yāsyā mi suvrata // GarP_2,22.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3219: yenaiva jāyate preto yenaiva sa vimucyate /
GP12garup2_u:3220: prāpnoti narakaṃ ghoraṃ dustaraṃ daivatairapi // GarP_2,22.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3223: śrūyate hi purā vatsa brāhmaṇaḥ śaṃsitavrataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3224: nāmnā santaptakaḥ khyāta stapor'the vanamāśritaḥ // GarP_2,22.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3227: yajansa sakalānyajñānyuktyā kālaṃ ca vikṣipan // GarP_2,22.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3234: bahūnyabdāni vijane vane tasya gatāni vai /
GP12garup2_u:3235: tasya buddhistato jātā tīrthānugamanaṃ prati // GarP_2,22.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3240: dadarśādhvani gacchansa pañca pretān sudāruṇān // GarP_2,22.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3245: papraccha madhurābhāṣī ke yūyaṃ vikṛtānanāḥ // GarP_2,22.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3246: kiñcāśubhaṃ kṛtaṃ karma yena prāptāḥ stha vaikṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:3247: kathaṃ vā caikataḥ karma prasthitāḥ kutra niścitam // GarP_2,22.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3249: svaiḥ svaistu karmabhiḥ prāptaṃ pretatvaṃ hi dvijottama /
GP12garup2_u:3252: hatavākyā hataśrīkā hata saṃjñā vicetasaḥ // GarP_2,22.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3253: na jānīmo diśaṃ tāta vidiśaṃ cātiduḥ khitāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3254: kva nu gacchāmahe mūḍhāḥ piśācāḥ karmajā vayam // GarP_2,22.35 //
GP12garup2_u:3255: na mātā na pitāsmākaṃ pretatvaṃ karmabhiḥ svakaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3256: prāptāḥ sma sahasā jātaduḥ khodvegasamākulam // GarP_2,22.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3262: evaṃ nāmnā ca sarve vai saṃprāptāḥ pretatāṃ vayam /
GP12garup2_u:3267: mayā svādu sadā bhuktaṃ dattaṃ paryuṣitaṃ dvija // GarP_2,22.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3268: śīghraṃ gacchati vipreṇa yācitaḥ kṣudhitena vai /
GP12garup2_u:3270: śīghraṃ gacchati vipreṇa yācitaḥ kṣudhitena vai /
GP12garup2_u:3278: tena karmavipākena lekhako nāma cocyate // GarP_2,22.45 //
GP12garup2_u:3279: pretatvaṃ karmabhāvena prāptaṃ nāmāni ca dvija /
GP12garup2_u:3285: sarve ca vikṛtākārā lamboṣṭhā vikṛtānanāḥ // GarP_2,22.48 //
GP12garup2_u:3287: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ pretatve kāraṇaṃ mayā // GarP_2,22.49 //
GP12garup2_u:3288: jñānino 'pi vayaṃ sarve jātāḥ sma tava darśanāt /
GP12garup2_u:3289: yatra te śravaṇe śraddhā tatpṛccha kathayāmi te // GarP_2,22.50 //
GP12garup2_u:3294: yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā āhārāṇāṃ dvijottama /
GP12garup2_u:3295: asmākaṃ tu mahībhāga śṛṇutvaṃ susamāhitaḥ // GarP_2,22.52 //
GP12garup2_u:3301: yacchrutvā garhase brahman bhūyobhūyaśca garhitam // GarP_2,22.54 //
GP12garup2_u:3303: ucchiṣṭaiścaiva cānyaiśca pretānāṃ bhojanaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,22.55 //
GP12garup2_u:3305: malināni prasūtāni pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.56 //
GP12garup2_u:3306: nāsti satyaṃ gṛhe yatra na śaucaṃ na ca saṃyamaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3307: patitairdasyubhiḥ saṅgaḥ pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.57 //
GP12garup2_u:3309: svādhyāya vratahīnāni pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.58 //
GP12garup2_u:3310: na lajjā na ca maryādā yadātra strījito gṛhī /
GP12garup2_u:3311: guravo yatra pūjyā na pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.59 //
GP12garup2_u:3312: yatra lobhastathā krodho nidrā śoko bhayaṃ madaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3313: ālasyaṃ kalaho nityaṃ pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.60 //
GP12garup2_u:3314: bhartṛhīnā ca yā nārī paravīryaṃ niṣevate /
GP12garup2_u:3315: bījaṃ mūtrasamāyurkta pretā bhuñjanti tattu vai // GarP_2,22.61 //
GP12garup2_u:3316: lajjā me jāyate tāta vadato bhojanaṃ svakam /
GP12garup2_u:3317: yatstrīrajo yonigataṃ pretā bhuñjanti tattu vai // GarP_2,22.62 //
GP12garup2_u:3319: yathā na bhavitā pretastanme vada tapodhana /
GP12garup2_u:3320: nityaṃ mṛtyurvaraṃ jantoḥ pretatvaṃ mā bhavetkvacit // GarP_2,22.63 //
GP12garup2_u:3323: vrataiśca vividhaiḥ pūto na preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.64 //
GP12garup2_u:3325: aparaiḥ sukṛtaiḥ pūto na preto na preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.65 //
GP12garup2_u:3329: vidyādo 'bhayadaścaiva na preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.67 //
GP12garup2_u:3330: śūdrānnena tu bhuktena jaṭharasthena yo mṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3331: durmṛtyunā mṛto yaśca sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.68 //
GP12garup2_u:3333: kārubhiśca rato nityaṃ sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.69 //
GP12garup2_u:3335: ajñānādbhakṣayanmāṃsaṃ sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.70 //
GP12garup2_u:3336: devadravyaṃ ca brahmasvaṃ gurudravyaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3337: kanyāṃ dadāti śulkena sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.71 //
GP12garup2_u:3338: mātaraṃ bhaginīṃ bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ tathāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3344: hartā hemnaśca bhūmeśca sa predṛ // GarP_2,22.74 //
GP12garup2_u:3346: evaṃ bruvati vai vipre ākāśe dundubhisvanaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3349: svargaṃ gatā vimānaiste divyaiḥ saṃpṛcchya taṃ munim // GarP_2,22.76 //
GP12garup2_u:3355: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe bhīṣma yudhiṣṭhirasaṃvāde pretatvotpattitanmuktipeñcapretopākhyāna nirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3359: vadanti vā kadācitkiṃ tadvadasva sureśvara // GarP_2,23.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3361: teṣāṃ svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi cihnaṃ svapnaṃ yathātatham /
GP12garup2_u:3364: tatra yacchanti liṅgāni darśayanti khageśvara // GarP_2,23.3 //
GP12garup2_u:3366: hayo gajo vṛṣo martyodṛśyate vikṛtānanaḥ // GarP_2,23.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3367: śayānaṃ viparītaṃ tu ātmānaṃ ca viparyayam /
GP12garup2_u:3369: svapne narau hi nigaḍairbadhyate bahudhā yadi /
GP12garup2_u:3370: annaṃ ca yācate svapne kuveṣaḥ pūrvajo mṛtaḥ // GarP_2,23.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3372: ātmanastu paro vāpi tṛṣārtastu jalaṃ pibet // GarP_2,23.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3374: utpatya gaganaṃ yāti tīrthe yāti kṣudhāturaḥ // GarP_2,23.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3376: liṅge gaje tathā deve bhūte prete niśācare // GarP_2,23.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3378: svakalatraṃ svabandhuṃ vā svasutaṃ svapatiṃ vibhum /
GP12garup2_u:3380: yācate yaḥ paraṃ svapne kṣuttṛḍbhyāṃ ca pariplutaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3383: pitā bhrātā kalatraṃ ca pretadoṣaistu paśyati // GarP_2,23.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3385: kṛtvā snānaṃ gṛhe tīrthe śrīvṛkṣe tarpaṇaṃ jalaiḥ // GarP_2,23.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3389: paṭhate śṛṇute vāpi pretacihnaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,23.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3390: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakṛtitaduktitaccihnatadvimuktyupāyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayoviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3394: kasmānmṛtyumavāpnoti rājā vā śrotriyopi vā // GarP_2,24.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3396: vedairuktaṃ tu yadvākyaṃ śataṃ jīvati mānuṣe // GarP_2,24.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3397: jīvanti mānuṣe loke sarve varṇā dvijātayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3399: na dṛśyate kalau tacca kasmāddeva samādiśa /
GP12garup2_u:3403: taporato yogaśīlo mahājñānī ca yo naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3406: kasmānmṛtyumavāpnoti rājā vā śrotriyo 'pi vā // GarP_2,24.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3408: sādhusādhu mahāprājña yastvaṃ bhakto 'si me priyaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3411: tato vakṣyāmi pakṣīndra kāśyapeya mahādyute // GarP_2,24.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3413: vikarmaṇaḥ prabhāveṇa śīghraṃ cāpi vinaśyati // GarP_2,24.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3424: prāpayanti vaśaṃ mṛtyostato yāti ca yātanām /
GP12garup2_u:3425: svakarmāṇi parityajya mukhyavṛttāni yāni ca // GarP_2,24.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3429: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homo svādhyāyo davartāccanam // GarP_2,24.17 //
GP12garup2_u:3430: yasmindine na sevyante sa vṛthā divaso nṛṇām /
GP12garup2_u:3433: yatprātaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ sāyaṃ nūnamannaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,24.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3435: gataṃ jñātvā tu pakṣīndra vapurardhaṃ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_2,24.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3441: anekabhavasambhūtaṃ pātakaṃ tu tridhā kṛtam // GarP_2,24.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3442: yadā prāpnoti mānuṣyaṃ tadā sarvaṃ tapatyapi /
GP12garup2_u:3449: na jānātiḥ khagaśreṣṭha bālabhāvaṃ samāśritaḥ // GarP_2,24.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3450: yauvane timirāndhaśca yaḥ paśyati sa muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:3451: ādhānānmṛtyumāpnoti bālo vā sthaviro yuvā // GarP_2,24.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3454: taporato yogaśīlo mahājñānī ca yo naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3456: vinā mānupadehaṃ tu sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ na vindati // GarP_2,24.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3460: yoniṃ pūrayate yasmānmṛto 'pyāyāti yāti ca // GarP_2,24.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3463: iti kṛṣṇavacaḥ śrutvā garuḍo vākyamabravīt // GarP_2,24.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3467: kathaṃ kiṃ kena dātavyaṃ mṛtānte ko vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3470: yadi garbho vipadyate stravate vāpi yoṣitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3473: tato jāte vipanne tu ā cūḍākaraṇācchiśoḥ // GarP_2,24.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3474: dugdhaṃ bhojyaṃ tāśakti bālānāṃ ca pradīyate /
GP12garup2_u:3475: ā cūḍātpañcavarṣe tu dehadāho vidhīyate // GarP_2,24.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3476: dugdhaṃ tasya pradeyaṃ syādbālānāṃ bhojanaṃ śubham /
GP12garup2_u:3479: dātavyaṃ tu khagaśreṣṭha ṛṇasambandhakastu saḥ // GarP_2,24.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3480: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyurdhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:3485: purāṇe gīyate gāthā sarvathā pratibhāti me // GarP_2,24.43 //
GP12garup2_u:3486: miṣṭānnaṃ bhojanaṃ deyaṃ dāne śaktistu durlabhā /
GP12garup2_u:3492: pāpaprabhāvānnarakaṃ prayāti punardaridraḥ punareva pāpī // GarP_2,24.46 //
GP12garup2_u:3493: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'lpāyurmaraṇahe tubālāntyeṣṭyornirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturviśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3497: jīvanvāpi mṛto vāpi pañcavarṣādhiko 'pi vā // GarP_2,25.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3498: pūrṇe tu pañcame varṣe pumāṃścaiva pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3502: garbhe naṣṭe kriyā nāsti dugdhaṃ deyaṃ mṛte śiśau /
GP12garup2_u:3503: paraṃ ca pāyasaṃ kṣīraṃ dadyādvalavipattitaḥ // GarP_2,25.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3507: bāle vā taruṇe vṛddhe ghaṭo bhavati vai mṛte // GarP_2,25.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3509: tataḥ paraṃ khagaśreṣṭha dehadāho vidhoyate // GarP_2,25.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3515: ā pañca varṣātkaumāraḥ paugaṇḍo navahāṃyanaḥ // GarP_2,25.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3517: mṛto 'pi pañcame varṣe avṛtaḥ savṛto 'pi vā // GarP_2,25.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3523: brahmabījodbhavāḥ putrā devarṣoṇāṃ ca vallabhāḥ // GarP_2,25.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3525: bālo vṛddho yubā vāpi ghaṭamicchanti dehinaḥ // GarP_2,25.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3526: sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ sadā vetti dehī vai sarvagastviha /
GP12garup2_u:3529: tasmāddeyāni dānāni mṛte bāle suniścitam // GarP_2,25.17 //
GP12garup2_u:3533: dvādaśe hani samprāpte kuryācchrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,25.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3540: yadā nakriyate sarvaṃ mudgalatvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,25.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3541: vratātprāṅgeva deyaṃ tu tataḥ pitṛgaṇasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:3544: apasavyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ kṛte yānti parāṃ gatim // GarP_2,25.24 //
GP12garup2_u:3548: ghaṭādiṣu pṛthak sarvaṃ paśya rūpaṃ ca tatsamam // GarP_2,25.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3550: yā yasya prakṛtiḥ pūrvaṃ śukraśoṇitasaṅgame // GarP_2,25.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3554: sadṛśaḥ ko 'pi loke 'sminna bhūto na bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,25.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3555: andhādandho na bhavati mūkānmūko na jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3557: anurūpā na dṛśyante madīyaṃ vacanaṃ śṛṇu // GarP_2,25.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3560: saṃgṛhītaḥ suto yastu dāsīputtraśca tena kim // GarP_2,25.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3562: bhavenna duhitā yasya na dauhitro na vā sutaḥ // GarP_2,25.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3563: śrāddhaṃ tasya kathaṃ kāryaṃ vidhinā kena tadbhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3565: mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu putrasya mucyate paitṛkādṛṇāt // GarP_2,25.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3567: lokānantyaṃ divaḥ prāptiḥ puttrapauttra prapauttrakaiḥ // GarP_2,25.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3570: kurvantyanye sutāḥ śrāddhame koddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam /
GP12garup2_u:3572: śrāddhaṃ sāṃvatsaraṃ kurvañjāyate narakāya vai // GarP_2,25.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3574: saṃgṛhītaḥ sutaḥ kuryādekoddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam // GarP_2,25.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3575: pratyabdaṃ pitṛmātṛbhyāṃ śrāddhaṃ dattvā na lipyate /
GP12garup2_u:3576: ekoddiṣṭaṃ parityajya pārvaṇaṃ kurute yadi // GarP_2,25.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3581: saṃgṛhītasuto bhūtvā pākaṃ vā yaḥ prayacchati // GarP_2,25.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3586: yastu pravrajitājjāto brāhmaṇyāṃ śūdrataśca yaḥ // GarP_2,25.42 //
GP12garup2_u:3589: taiḥ suvṛttaiḥ sukhaṃ prāpyaṃ kuvṛttairnarakaṃ vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:3593: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dhamakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasavāde mṛtabālāntyeṣṭibhinnābhinnasutakṛtāntyeṣṭyorvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3596: satyaṃ brūhi suraśreṣṭha kṛpāṃ kṛtvā mayi prabho /
GP12garup2_u:3597: mṛtānāṃ caiva jantūnāṃ kadā kuryātsapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,26.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3598: sapiṇḍatve kuto yānti asapiṇḍe kuto gatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3603: agnyārohe kathaṃ śrāddhaṃ vṛṣotsargaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,26.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3605: kathayasva prasādena hītāya jagatāṃ prabho // GarP_2,26.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3609: sapiṇḍane tato vṛtte pitṛlokaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:3614: sahapiṇḍe kṛte pretastato yāti parāṃ gatim /
GP12garup2_u:3615: tannāma samparityajya tataḥ pitṛgaṇo bhavet // GarP_2,26.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3618: vivāhaṃ naiva kurvīta mṛte ca gṛhamedhini /
GP12garup2_u:3624: niragnikaḥ sāgniko vā dvādaśāhe sapiṇḍayet // GarP_2,26.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3625: dvādaśāhe tripakṣe vā ṣaṇmāse vatsare 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:3634: etaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāddhaiḥ preto muktastu jāyate // GarP_2,26.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3636: yāvajjīva ca sadbhatryā na kuryātsahapiṇḍatām // GarP_2,26.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3639: āsurādivivā heṣu yā vyūḍhā kanyakā bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3642: puttrābhāve tu patnī syātpatnyabhāve sahodaraḥ // GarP_2,26.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3643: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputtro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā /
GP12garup2_u:3646: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ putrahīne nare khaga // GarP_2,26.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3648: sarvete tena putreṇa putriṇo manurabravīt // GarP_2,26.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3656: ye sapiṇḍīkṛtāḥ pretāsteṣāṃ na syātpṛthak kriyā // GarP_2,26.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3657: sapiṇḍane kṛte vatsa pṛthaktvaṃ tu vigarhitam /
GP12garup2_u:3658: yastu kuryātpṛthak piṇḍaṃ pitṛhā so 'bhijāyate // GarP_2,26.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3660: pṛthak piṇḍe kṛte paścātpunaḥ kuryātsapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,26.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3662: ātmānaṃ ca tathā pretaṃ sa nayeddamaśāsanam // GarP_2,26.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3664: ghaṭādi bhojanaṃ nityaṃ padadānāni yāni ca /
GP12garup2_u:3665: sapiṇḍīkaraṇe vṛtte ekasyaiva tu dāpayet // GarP_2,26.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3669: divyadeho vimānasthaḥ sukhaṃ yāti yamālayam // GarP_2,26.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3670: jīvamāne ca pitari na hi puttre sapiṇḍatā /
GP12garup2_u:3671: strīṇāṃ sapiṇḍanaṃ nāsti tathā bhartari jīvati // GarP_2,26.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3673: tasyā bhartṛdine kāryaṃ vṛṣotsargādikaṃ ca yat // GarP_2,26.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3677: putreṇaiva pṛthak śrāddhaṃ kṣayākhye tasya vāsare // GarP_2,26.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3679: pṛthak śrāddhāni kurvīta sāpiḍyaṃ patinā saha // GarP_2,26.41 //
GP12garup2_u:3680: pṛthakpṛthak ca piṇḍena dampatī patinā saha /
GP12garup2_u:3681: na lipyate mahādoṣairetatsatyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,26.42 //
GP12garup2_u:3687: ekagotre mṛtānāṃ tu striyā vā puruṣasya vā /
GP12garup2_u:3691: ekenaiva tu pākena śrāddhāni kurute sutaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3693: tīrthe cāparapakṣe vā candrasūryagrahe 'pi vā // GarP_2,26.47 //
GP12garup2_u:3695: agnirdahati gātrāṇi ātmānaṃ naiva pīḍayet // GarP_2,26.48 //
GP12garup2_u:3696: dahyate dhmāyamānānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hi yathā malam /
GP12garup2_u:3697: tathā nārī daheddehaṃ hutāśe hyamṛtopame // GarP_2,26.49 //
GP12garup2_u:3699: taptatailena lohena vahninā naiva dahyate // GarP_2,26.50 //
GP12garup2_u:3700: tathā sā patisaṃyuktā dahyate na kadācana /
GP12garup2_u:3703: bhartṛlokaṃ na sā yāti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // GarP_2,26.52 //
GP12garup2_u:3705: mṛtaṃ patimanuvrajya sā ciraṃ sukhamedhate // GarP_2,26.53 //
GP12garup2_u:3707: tāvatkālaṃ vasetsvarge nakṣatraiḥ saha sarvadā // GarP_2,26.54 //
GP12garup2_u:3708: tadante carate loke kule bhavati bhoginām /
GP12garup2_u:3709: sā hi labdhamahāprītirbhartrā saha pativratā // GarP_2,26.55 //
GP12garup2_u:3710: evaṃ na kurute nārī dharmoḍhā patisaṃgamam /
GP12garup2_u:3712: valgulī gṛhasodhā vā godhā vā dvimukhī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3715: manasā karmaṇā vācā mṛtaṃ jīvantameva vā // GarP_2,26.58 //
GP12garup2_u:3716: jīvamāne mṛte vāpi kilbiṣaṃ kurute tu yā /
GP12garup2_u:3717: sa ca vaidhavyamāpnoti janmajanmani durbhagā // GarP_2,26.59 //
GP12garup2_u:3720: evaṃ kṛte khagaśreṣṭha pitṛloke ciraṃ vaset /
GP12garup2_u:3723: pativratā yathā nārī bhartṛduḥkhaṃ na vindati // GarP_2,26.62 //
GP12garup2_u:3727: punaḥ kuryātsadā nityaṃ ghaṭānnaṃ pratimāsikam // GarP_2,26.64 //
GP12garup2_u:3729: yaḥ karoti naraḥ kaścitkṛt pūrvaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,26.65 //
GP12garup2_u:3731: pratimāsaṃ ghaṭā deyā sodanā jalapūritāḥ // GarP_2,26.66 //
GP12garup2_u:3732: arvākca vṛddheḥ karaṇācca tārkṣya sapiṇḍanaṃ yaḥ kurute hi putraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3733: tathāpi māsaṃ pratipiṇḍamekamannaṃ ca kumbhaṃ sajalaṃ ca dadyāt // GarP_2,26.67 //
GP12garup2_u:3734: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍedvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakalpe sapiṇḍananirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3737: kathaṃ pretā vasantyatra kīdṛgrūpā bhavanti te /
GP12garup2_u:3740: pretatvānmucyate yena dānena ca śubhe na ca /
GP12garup2_u:3741: tanme kathaya deveśa mama cedicchasi priyam // GarP_2,27.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3743: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā tārkṣya mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:3746: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābāho tena te kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,27.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3756: vanamadhye tadā rājā mṛgaṃ dūrādapaśyata // GarP_2,27.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3757: tena viddho mṛgo 'tīva bāṇena sudṛḍhena ca /
GP12garup2_u:3758: bāṇamādāya taṃ tasya sa vane 'darśanaṃ yayau // GarP_2,27.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3774: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtaṃ ghoraṃ vismito babhruvāhanaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3775: preto 'pi dṛṣṭvā tāṃ ghorāmaṭavīmāgataṃ nṛpam // GarP_2,27.18 //
GP12garup2_u:3777: abravītsa tadā tārkṣya pretarājo nṛpaṃ vacaḥ // GarP_2,27.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3778: pretabhāvo mayā tyaktaḥ prāpto 'smi paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup2_u:3782: kathayasva mama prītyā yathaivaṃ cāsi tattvataḥ // GarP_2,27.21 //
GP12garup2_u:3783: tathā pṛṣṭaḥ sa vai rājñā provāca sakalaṃ svakam // GarP_2,27.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3786: pretatve kāraṇaṃ śrutvā dayāṃ kartuṃ mamārhasi // GarP_2,27.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3791: vaiśyo jātyā sudevo 'haṃ nāmnā viditamastu te // GarP_2,27.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3797: yathā me niṣphalaṃ jātaṃ sukṛtaṃ tadvadāmi te // GarP_2,27.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3798: na me 'sti santatistāta na suhṛnna ca bāndhavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3799: na ca mitraṃ hi me tādṛgyaḥ kuryādaurdhvadaihikam // GarP_2,27.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3800: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tena mama jātaṃ nṛpottama /
GP12garup2_u:3802: pratimāsyāni cānyāni evaṃ śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,27.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3804: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi // GarP_2,27.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3806: varṇānāṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ rājā bandhurihocyate // GarP_2,27.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3807: tanmāṃ tāraya rājendra maṇiratnaṃ dadāmi te /
GP12garup2_u:3809: tathā kāryaṃ mahābāho kṛpā yadi mayīṣyate /
GP12garup2_u:3813: piśācāśca bhavantīha karmabhiḥ kaiśca tadvada // GarP_2,27.35 //
GP12garup2_u:3816: ye haranti nṛpaśreṣṭha pretayoniṃ vrajanti te // GarP_2,27.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3817: tāpasīṃ ca sagotrāṃ ca agamyāṃ ye bhajanti hi /
GP12garup2_u:3818: bhavanti te mahāpretā ambujāni haranti ye // GarP_2,27.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3827: kathaṃ muktā bhavantīha pretatvāttvaṃ ca te 'pi ca /
GP12garup2_u:3829: vidhinā kena tatkāryaṃ sarvametadvadasva me // GarP_2,27.41 //
GP12garup2_u:3834: ato vakṣyāmi te viṣṇupūjāṃ pretatvanāśinīm // GarP_2,27.43 //
GP12garup2_u:3839: pūrve tu śrīdharaṃ devaṃ dakṣiṇe madhusūdanam /
GP12garup2_u:3840: paścime vānamaṃ devamuttare ca gadādharam // GarP_2,27.46 //
GP12garup2_u:3841: madhye pitāmahaṃ pūjya tathā devaṃ maheśvaram /
GP12garup2_u:3844: ghṛtena dadhnā kṣīreṇa viśvāndevāṃstathā nṛpa // GarP_2,27.48 //
GP12garup2_u:3851: sānnāśca sodakā deyā ghaṭāḥ pretahitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:3852: śayyādānamatho dattvā ghaṭaṃ pretasya nirvapet // GarP_2,27.52 //
GP12garup2_u:3859: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahārāja kathayāmi nibodha te /
GP12garup2_u:3860: pretatvaṃ na bhavedyena dānena sudṛḍhena ca // GarP_2,27.55 //
GP12garup2_u:3863: santaptahāṭakamayaṃ tu ghaṭaṃ vidhāya brahmośakeśavayutaṃ saha lokapālaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3864: kṣīrājyapūrṇavivaraṃ praṇipatya bhaktyā viprāya dehi tava dānaśataiḥ kimanyaiḥ // GarP_2,27.57 //
GP12garup2_u:3865: brahmā madhye tathā viṣṇuḥ śaṅkaraḥ śaṅkaro 'vyayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3866: prācyādiṣu ca tatkaṇṭhe lokapālānkrameṇa tu // GarP_2,27.58 //
GP12garup2_u:3868: tato dugdhājyasahitaṃ ghaṭaṃ deyaṃ hiraṇmayam // GarP_2,27.59 //
GP12garup2_u:3874: tato bale samāyāte dattvā rājñe mahāmaṇim /
GP12garup2_u:3877: svapuraṃ sa samāsādya sarvaṃ tatpretabhāṣitam // GarP_2,27.63 //
GP12garup2_u:3879: tasya puṇyapradānena preto mukto divaṃ yayau // GarP_2,27.64 //
GP12garup2_u:3881: kiṃ punaḥ putradattena pitā yātīti cātbhutam // GarP_2,27.65 //
GP12garup2_u:3884: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde babhruvāhanapretasaṃvāde pretatvahetutannivṛttyupāyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3888: pretatvānmucyate yena dānena sukṛtena vā // GarP_2,28.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3891: santaptahāṭakamayaṃ ghaṭakaṃ vidhāya brahmeśakeśavayutaṃ saha lokapālaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3892: kṣīrājyapūrṇaviviraṃ praṇipatya bhaktyā viprāya dehi tava dānaśataiḥ kimanyaiḥ // GarP_2,28.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3896: saṃsāre sādhu me nātha brūhi kṛtyaṃ janārdana /
GP12garup2_u:3897: yathā kāryā naraiḥ samyak kriyā caivaurdhvadaihikī // GarP_2,28.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3899: kambhavanti suraśreṣṭha karmabhiḥ kaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ // GarP_2,28.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3901: tanme kathaya deveśa ahamicchāmi veditum // GarP_2,28.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3903: adhastācca tilā darbhāḥ pādau yāmyāṃ vyavasthitāḥ // GarP_2,28.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3905: kimarthaṃ smaryate viṣṇuḥ viṣṇusūktañca paṭhyate // GarP_2,28.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3910: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3911: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāvo dīyate kena he tunā // GarP_2,28.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3912: kathaṃ ca mriyate janturmṛtasya ca kuto gatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3913: ativāhaśarīraṃ ca kathaṃ viśramate tadā // GarP_2,28.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3914: śaṃva skandhe vahetputro vahnidātā ca pautrakaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3915: kimarthaṃ deva deveśa ājyenābhyañjanaṃ kutaḥ // GarP_2,28.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3919: vastraṃ naraśca nārī ca vidadhyādadharottaram // GarP_2,28.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3921: navakāni ca piṇḍāni kimarthaṃ vitaretsutaḥ // GarP_2,28.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3922: kimarthaṃ catvare dugdhaṃ pātre pakve ca mṛnmaye /
GP12garup2_u:3923: kāṣṭhatrayaṃ guṇe baddhvā kṛtvā rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,28.17 //
GP12garup2_u:3925: dāhodakaṃ kimarthaṃ ca saṃvādaḥ svajanaiḥ saha // GarP_2,28.18 //
GP12garup2_u:3928: idaṃ ca kriyate deva kasmātpiṇḍaṃ pradāpayet // GarP_2,28.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3931: dvitīye 'hni kutaḥ snānaṃ caturthe sāgnike dvije /
GP12garup2_u:3932: daśame kiṃ malasnānaṃ kāryaṃ sarvajanaiḥ saha // GarP_2,28.21 //
GP12garup2_u:3934: taiḥ samudvartanaṃ cāpi dadyuḥ sthalajalāśraye // GarP_2,28.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3936: piṇḍaṃ caikādaśe kasmād vṛṣotsargaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,28.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3940: prāpte kāle ca mriyate anityo mānavaḥ prabho // GarP_2,28.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3941: chidraṃ tu naiva paśyāmi kuto jīvaḥ sa nirgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3942: kuto gacchanti bhūtāni pṛthivyāpo manastathā // GarP_2,28.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3943: tejo vadasva me nātha vāyurākāśameva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3944: vāyavaścaiva pañcaite kathaṃ gacchanti cāptaye // GarP_2,28.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3946: tṛṣṇā kāmo 'pyahaṅkāraḥ kuto yānti janārdana // GarP_2,28.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3948: naṣṭe dehe kuto yānti dānāni vividhāni ca // GarP_2,28.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3949: sapiṇḍanaṃ kimarthaṃ ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:3950: pretasya melanaṃ sārdhaṃ kaiḥ samaṃ tatra ko vidhiḥ // GarP_2,28.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3951: ye dagdhā ye tvadagdhāśca patitā ye narābhuvi /
GP12garup2_u:3952: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni teṣāmante bhavecca kim // GarP_2,28.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3953: pāpino ye durācārā mudgalatvaṃ ca ye gatāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3954: ātmaghātī brahmahā ca steyī viśvāsaghātakaḥ // GarP_2,28.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3956: dhārayedvā brahmasūtraṃ kā gatistasya mādhava // GarP_2,28.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3957: viprasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā saṃgṛhī tā yadā bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3959: sarvametanmayā pṛṣṭo vada lokahitāya vai // GarP_2,28.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3960: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde aurdhvadahikakarmakālakriyamāṇanānādānādiphalapraśranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3963: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:3968: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābhāga sarvaṃ te kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,29.3 //
GP12garup2_u:3969: aputrasya gatirnāsti svargo naiva ca naiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3970: yena kenāpyupāyena kāryaṃ janma sutasya ca // GarP_2,29.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3972: dāhaḥ putreṇa kartavyo deyaḥ pautreṇa pāvakaḥ // GarP_2,29.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3973: tilairdarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī dhātumatī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3974: pañcaratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,29.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3976: tasyāmevāturo muktaḥ sarvaṃ dahati pātakam // GarP_2,29.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3978: darbhāṃstatra hi ye bhūmyāṃ tilayuktāna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,29.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3979: sarvatra vasudhā pūtā yatra lepo na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:3980: yatra lepaḥ sthitastatra punarlepena śudhyati // GarP_2,29.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3982: alipte āturaṃ muktaṃ viśantyete na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,29.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3984: maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyāṃ kurvantyetacca niṣphalam // GarP_2,29.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3985: āturo mucyate naiva maṇḍalena vinā bhuvi /
GP12garup2_u:3986: brahmā rudraśca viṣṇuśca śrīrhutāśana eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3988: anyathā mriyate yastu bālo vṛddho yuvāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:3989: yonyantaraṃ sa vai gacchetkrīḍate vāyunā saha // GarP_2,29.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3990: miśritaṃ lohatāmraṃ tu tathaiva janma jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3991: tasmaivaṃ vāyubhūtasya na śrāddhaṃ nodaka kriyā // GarP_2,29.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3995: te me dahantu pāṣāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni ca // GarP_2,29.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3997: tarpaṇe dānahome ca datto bhavati cākṣayaḥ // GarP_2,29.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4004: darbhāgre śaṅkaraṃ vidyāttrayo devāḥ kuśe sthitāḥ // GarP_2,29.20 //
GP12garup2_u:4005: viprā mantrāḥ kuśā vahnistulasī ca khageśvara /
GP12garup2_u:4006: naite nirmālyatāṃ yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,29.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4010: pañca pravahaṇānyeva bhavābdhau majjatāṃ satām // GarP_2,29.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4018: viṣṇulokaṃ sa vai yāti mantrahīno 'pi mānavaḥ // GarP_2,29.27 //
GP12garup2_u:4022: tatra dattena dānena sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati // GarP_2,29.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4024: yasmādannarasāḥ sarve notkaṭā lavaṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,29.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4025: pitṝṇāṃ ca priyaṃ bhavyaṃ tasmātsvargapradaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4028: brāhmaṇa kṣattriyaviśāṃ strīṇāṃ śūdrajanasya ca // GarP_2,29.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4030: lavaṇaṃ tu tadā deyaṃ dbārasyoddhāṭanaṃ divaḥ // GarP_2,29.33 //
GP12garup2_u:4031: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde
GP12garup2_u:4036: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ guhyaṃ dānānāṃ dānamuttamam /
GP12garup2_u:4037: paramaṃ sarvadānānāṃ paraṃ gopyaṃ divaukasām // GarP_2,30.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4039: yena dattena prīyante bhūrbhuvaḥ svariti kramāt // GarP_2,30.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4044: yamalokaṃ vinirjitya svargaṃ tākṣya sa gacchati // GarP_2,30.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4045: gāṃ tilāṃśca kṣitaṃ hema yo dadāti dvijanmane /
GP12garup2_u:4048: taddvayaṃ dīyate vipre nānyavarṇe kadācana // GarP_2,30.6 //
GP12garup2_u:4050: anyeṣu naiva varṇeṣu poṣyavarge kadācana // GarP_2,30.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4052: āture voparāge ca dvayaṃ dānaṃ viśiṣyate /
GP12garup2_u:4053: āture dīyate dānaṃ tatkāle copatiṣṭhati // GarP_2,30.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4055: satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ yaddattaṃ vikalendriye // GarP_2,30.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4057: ato dadyāt sa putro vā yāvajjīvatsasau ciram /
GP12garup2_u:4058: ativāhastathā preto bhogāṃśca labhate yataḥ // GarP_2,30.10 //
GP12garup2_u:4060: dehe tathātivāhasya parataḥ prīṇanaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,30.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4063: tilā lauhaṃ hiraṇyañca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4064: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,30.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4066: lavaṇe dīyamāne tu na bhayaṃ vidyate yamāt // GarP_2,30.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4067: karpāsasya tu dānena na bhūtebhyo bhayaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4070: hemabhūmipradānācca na pīḍā narake bhavet // GarP_2,30.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4072: sarve te varadā yānti saptadhānyena prīṇitāḥ // GarP_2,30.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4077: tasmin kāle suto yastu sarvadānāni dāpayet /
GP12garup2_u:4080: putrairyatnena kartavyā pitaraṃ tārayanti te // GarP_2,30.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4082: aśvamedho mahāyajñaḥ kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm // GarP_2,30.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4083: dharmātmā sa nu putro vaidevairapi supūjyate /
GP12garup2_u:4084: dāpayedyastu dānāni hyāturaṃ pitaraṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,30.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4086: yamaṃ bhīmañca nāpnoti na gacchet tasya veśmani // GarP_2,30.24 //
GP12garup2_u:4087: kuṭhāro musalo daṇḍaḥ khaḍgaśca cchurikā tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4091: garbhasthāḥ śiśavo ye ca yuvānaḥ sthavirāstathā /
GP12garup2_u:4094: śabalā śyāmadūtā ye lohadānena prīṇitāḥ // GarP_2,30.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4096: dadate nāture dānaṃ brahmaghnaistu samā hi te // GarP_2,30.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4097: pañcatve bhūmiyuktasya śṛṇu tasya ca yā gatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4098: ativāhaḥ punaḥ pretovarṣordhvaṃ sukṛtaṃ labhet // GarP_2,30.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4100: kālatrayaṃ trisandhyaṃ ca trayo varṇāstriśaktayaḥ // GarP_2,30.31 //
GP12garup2_u:4102: grīvāṃ yāvaddharirnābheḥ śarīre manujasya ca // GarP_2,30.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4106: dharmādharme matiṃ dadyāt sukhaduḥkhe kṛtākṛte // GarP_2,30.34 //
GP12garup2_u:4109: svargaṃ ca narakaṃ mokṣaṃ prayānti prāṇino dhruvam // GarP_2,30.35 //
GP12garup2_u:4110: svargasthaṃ narakasthaṃ vā śrāddhe vāpyāyanaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4112: matsyaṃ karmaṃ ca vārāhaṃ nārasiṃhañca vāmanam /
GP12garup2_u:4113: rāmaṃ rāmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca buddhaṃ caiva sakalkinam /
GP12garup2_u:4114: etāni daśa nāmāni smartavyāni sadā budhaiḥ // GarP_2,30.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4115: svargaṃ jīvāḥ sukhaṃ yānti cyutāḥ svargācca mānavāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4116: labdhvā sukhaṃ ca vittaṃ ca dayādākṣiṇyasaṃyutāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4119: aṣṭākṣaraṃ tathā mantraṃ japedvā dvādaśākṣaram // GarP_2,30.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4123: yatra viṣṇuṃ na paśyāmi tena vāsena kiṃ mama // GarP_2,30.41 //
GP12garup2_u:4125: jvālāmālākule viṣṇuḥ sarvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ jagat // GarP_2,30.42 //
GP12garup2_u:4126: vayamāpo vayaṃ pṛthvī vayaṃ darbhā vayaṃ tilāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4127: vayaṃ gāvo vayaṃ rājā vayaṃ vāyurvayaṃ prajāḥ // GarP_2,30.43 //
GP12garup2_u:4128: vayaṃ hema vayaṃ dhānyaṃ vayaṃ madhu vayaṃ ghṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:4129: vayaṃ viprā vayaṃ devā vayaṃ śambhuśca bhūrbhuvaḥ // GarP_2,30.44 //
GP12garup2_u:4130: ahaṃ dātā ahaṃ grāhī ahaṃ yajvā ahaṃ kratuḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4131: ahaṃ hartā ahaṃ dharmo ahaṃ pṛthvī hyahaṃ jalam // GarP_2,30.45 //
GP12garup2_u:4133: yat karma kriyate kvāpi pūrvajanmārjitaṃ khaga // GarP_2,30.46 //
GP12garup2_u:4135: yātanāṃ kurute so 'pi dharme muktiṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_2,30.47 //
GP12garup2_u:4136: manujānāṃ hitā tārkṣya ante vaitaraṇī smṛtā /
GP12garup2_u:4137: tayāvamatya pāpaughaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,30.48 //
GP12garup2_u:4138: bālatve yacca kaumāre yacca pariṇatau ca yat /
GP12garup2_u:4141: sandhyayoryat kṛtaṃ karma karmaṇā manasā girā // GarP_2,30.50 //
GP12garup2_u:4145: gāvo me hṛdaye santu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham // GarP_2,30.52 //
GP12garup2_u:4146: yā lakṣmīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yā ca deve vyavasthitā /
GP12garup2_u:4147: dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpaṃ vyapohatu // GarP_2,30.53 //
GP12garup2_u:4148: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde nānādānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṃso 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4154: aśvārūḍhāśca te yānti dadate ye hyupānahau // GarP_2,31.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4155: ātape śramayogena na dahyante ca kutracit /
GP12garup2_u:4156: chattradānena vai pretā vicaranti sukhaṃ pathi // GarP_2,31.3 //
GP12garup2_u:4157: yamuddiśya dadātyannaṃ tena cāpyāyito bhavet // GarP_2,31.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4159: uddyotenaiva te yānti dīpadānena mānavāḥ // GarP_2,31.5 //
GP12garup2_u:4161: caturdaśyāñca dīyeta dīpadānaṃ sukhāya vai // GarP_2,31.6 //
GP12garup2_u:4163: yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ vāpi pretasya sukhalipsayā // GarP_2,31.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4164: kule dyotati śuddhātmā prakāśatvaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:4167: kuryādyāmyamukhaṃ pitre adbhiḥ saṅkalpya susthiram // GarP_2,31.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4172: sukhe na bhuñjamānastu dena gacchatyalaṃ pathi // GarP_2,31.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4177: dātavyāni yathāśaktyā preto 'sau prīṇito bhavet // GarP_2,31.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4179: mudrikāṃ vastrayugmañca tayā yāti parāṃ gatim // GarP_2,31.15 //
GP12garup2_u:4180: yo 'śvaṃ nāvaṃ gajaṃ vāpi brāhmaṇe pratipādayet /
GP12garup2_u:4183: yamaputtrasya yā mātā mahiṣī sugatipradā // GarP_2,31.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4185: tena samprīṇitāḥ sarve tasmin kleśaṃ na kurvate // GarP_2,31.18 //
GP12garup2_u:4190: na bhīṣayanti taṃ yāmyā vastradāne kṛte sati // GarP_2,31.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4195: tathā pretatvamukto 'sau modate saha daivataiḥ // GarP_2,31.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4198: jātasya mṛtyuloke vai prāṇino maraṇaṃ dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:4199: mṛtiḥ kuryāt svadharmeṇa yāsyataśca parantapa // GarP_2,31.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4205: vātāhataḥ patatyeva nirādhāro yathā drumaḥ // GarP_2,31.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4206: pṛthivyāṃ līyate pṛthvī āpaścaiva tathāpsu ca /
GP12garup2_u:4208: ākāśe ca tathā kāśaḥ sarvavyāpī ca śaṅkare // GarP_2,31.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4209: tatra kāmastathā krodhaḥ kāye pañcendriyāṇi ca /
GP12garup2_u:4210: ete tārkṣya samākhyātā dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ // GarP_2,31.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4216: praviśet sa navaṃ dehaṃ gṛhe dagdhe yathā gṛhī // GarP_2,31.33 //
GP12garup2_u:4218: ṣāṭkauśiko hyayaṃ kāyo mātā pitrośca dhātavaḥ // GarP_2,31.34 //
GP12garup2_u:4220: mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ tadyogā ye cānye vyādhayastathā // GarP_2,31.35 //
GP12garup2_u:4221: asthi śukraṃ tathā snāyuḥ dehena saha dahyate /
GP12garup2_u:4222: eṣa te kathitastārkṣya vināśaḥ sarvadehinām // GarP_2,31.36 //
GP12garup2_u:4230: tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ sarvā bhuvanāni caturdaśa // GarP_2,31.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4231: ātmānaṃ ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ /

GP12garup2_u:4292: karṇau ca nāsike vakṣo jāyeran māsi pañcame /
GP12garup2_u:4295: aṣṭame calate jīvo dhātrīgarbhe punaḥ punaḥ /

GP12garup2_u:4304: navame daśame māsi jāyate pāñcabhautikaḥ // GarP_2,32.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4309: mūlabhūtā ime proktāḥ sapta nāḍyantare sthitāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4311: ete pañca guṇāḥ proktā mayā bhūmeḥ khageśvara /
GP12garup2_u:4312: yathā pañca guṇāścāpastathā tacchṛṇu kāśyapa // GarP_2,32.36 //
GP12garup2_u:4313: lālā mūtraṃ tathā śukraṃ majjāra raktañca pañcamam /
GP12garup2_u:4314: āpaḥ pañcaguṇāḥ proktā jñātavyāste prayatnataḥ // GarP_2,32.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4315: kṣudhā tṛṣā tathā nidrā ālasyaṃ kāntireva ca /

GP12garup2_u:4317: rāgadveṣau tathā lajjā bhayaṃ mohastathaiva ca /

GP12garup2_u:4320: nirodhaḥ pañcamaḥ prokto vāyoḥ pañca guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_2,32.40 //

GP12garup2_u:4323: śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsā buddhīndriyāṇi ca /

GP12garup2_u:4325: iḍāca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā /

GP12garup2_u:4328: piṇḍa madhye sthitā hyetāḥ pradhānā daśa nāḍayaḥ // GarP_2,32.44 //
GP12garup2_u:4329: prāṇāpānau samānaśca udāno vyāna eva ca /

GP12garup2_u:4335: sa praviśya guhe samyak pṛthagannaṃ pṛthagjalam /

GP12garup2_u:4348: palāni daśa medaśca tvacā caiva tu tatsamā // GarP_2,32.54 //
GP12garup2_u:4350: śukraṃ dvikuḍavaṃ jñeyaṃ śoṇitaṃ kuḍavaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,32.55 //

GP12garup2_u:4384: svargaṃ ca nirayaṃ caiva svakarmaphalamaśnute // GarP_2,32.72 //
GP12garup2_u:4386: svarloke narake caiva bhuktaprāye dvijottamāḥ // GarP_2,32.73 //
GP12garup2_u:4388: dṛśyate nātra modante pātyamānāstu nārakaiḥ // GarP_2,32.74 //
GP12garup2_u:4394: jātasya bālabhāve 'pi vṛddhatve duḥkhameva ca // GarP_2,32.77 //

GP12garup2_u:4397: kṛṣyamāṇaśca yāmyaiḥ sa narake 'pi ca yātyadhaḥ /

GP12garup2_u:4402: vinatāsuta mokṣāya yatitavyaṃ tato naraiḥ // GarP_2,32.81 //
GP12garup2_u:4404: kathayāmi kramapraśraṃ pṛṣṭaṃ vā vartate spṛhā // GarP_2,32.82 //

GP12garup2_u:4416: prāgudakśirasaṃ vāpi mukhe svarṇaṃ viniḥ kṣepet /

GP12garup2_u:4420: ādau tu praṇavaṃ kṛtvā pūjādāne tataḥ smṛte /

GP12garup2_u:4425: nivartayenmamatvaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ pādau hṛdi smaran // GarP_2,32.92 //
GP12garup2_u:4427: puttrādyāḥ prapaṭheyuste mriyamāṇe nije jane // GarP_2,32.93 //
GP12garup2_u:4433: tilairdarbhaiśca niḥ kṣiptaiḥ snānaṃ kratumayaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,32.96 //

GP12garup2_u:4451: brahmāṇḍe ye guṇāḥ santi śarīre te vyavasthitāḥ // GarP_2,32.105 //
GP12garup2_u:4454: pādādhastu talaṃ jñeyaṃ pādordhvaṃ vitalaṃ tathā /

GP12garup2_u:4467: asthisthāne sthito jambūḥ śāko majjāsu saṃsthitaḥ /

GP12garup2_u:4478: nābhisthāne sthito mando mukhe rāhuḥ sthitaḥ sadā // GarP_2,32.118 //
GP12garup2_u:4479: pāyu (da) sthāne sthitaḥ ketuḥ śarīre grahamaṇḍalam /
GP12garup2_u:4481: utpannā ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4482: bubhukṣā ca tṛṣā raudrā dāhodbhūtā ca mūrchanā // GarP_2,32.120 //
GP12garup2_u:4484: vināśaḥ pūrṇakāle ca jāyate sarvadehinām // GarP_2,32.121 //
GP12garup2_u:4489: yamaloke vasantyete kuṭyāṃ janma na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:4490: evaṃ sañjāyate tārkṣya martye jantuḥ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_2,32.124 //
GP12garup2_u:4491: utpannā ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4492: āyuḥ karma ca vittañca vidyā nidhanameva ca // GarP_2,32.125 //

GP12garup2_u:4503: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dharmadṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde jantūtpattitadgadhātvādivibhāgabhuvanādivibhāgavarṇanaṃ nāma dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12garup2_u:4509: kaiśca pāpaiḥ kṛtairdeva kena vā śubhakarmaṇā /

GP12garup2_u:4525: sudīnāḥ kṛpaṇā mūḍhā duḥ khairvyāptāstaranti tam // GarP_2,33.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4526: rudanti dāruṇaṃ kecit keciddrohaṃ vadanti ca /
GP12garup2_u:4528: īdṛgvidhaḥ sa vai panthā vijñeyo dāruṇaḥ khaga /

GP12garup2_u:4539: svayaṃ tiṣṭhati vai yasyāṃ yamo dūtaiḥ samanvitaḥ // GarP_2,33.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4548: tatrastho bhagavān dharma āsane tu same śubhe /
GP12garup2_u:4562: na muhyati kadācit sa sukṛte duṣkṛte 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4563: yadyenopārjitaṃ yāvat tāvadvai vetti tasya tat // GarP_2,33.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4569: aiśanyāṃ vai śiro 'rtiśca āgneyyāñcaiva mṛkatā // GarP_2,33.31 //
GP12garup2_u:4571: ebhiḥ parivṛto nityaṃ citraguptaḥ sa tiṣṭhati // GarP_2,33.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4572: yat karma kurute kaścittat sarvaṃ vilakhatyasau /

GP12garup2_u:4586: yamaloke mayā dṛṣṭā mamasvaṃ bhakṣitaṃ tvayā // GarP_2,33.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4589: dānopakāraṃ vakṣyāmi yathā tatra sukhaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,33.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4590: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pratakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde yamalokavistṛtidṛvarṇanaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4594: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ nṝṇāmagre dhāvati dhāvatām // GarP_2,34.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4596: dvāpare yajñadāne ca dānamekaṃ kalau yuge // GarP_2,34.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4598: iṣṭāpūrte svaśaktyā hi kurvatāṃ nāsti pātakam // GarP_2,34.3 //
GP12garup2_u:4600: yamamārge sukhaṃ tasya vrajato nitarāṃ bhavet // GarP_2,34.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4602: tapyamānāḥ sukhaṃ yānti sarva kāmaiḥ prapūritāḥ // GarP_2,34.5 //
GP12garup2_u:4604: tena sarvamidaṃ dattaṃ yena dattā vasundharā // GarP_2,34.6 //
GP12garup2_u:4605: yāniyāni ca bhūtāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4608: dadāti vidhinā putra prete tadu patiṣṭhati // GarP_2,34.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4610: tārayet pitaraṃ ghorāt tena puttraḥ pravakṣyate // GarP_2,34.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4612: ativāhastadā preto bhogān vai labhate hi saḥ // GarP_2,34.10 //
GP12garup2_u:4614: dīyate pretarūpo 'sau prīto yāti yamālaye // GarP_2,34.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4615: apakve mṛnmaye pātre dugdhaṃ dattaṃ dinatrayam /
GP12garup2_u:4616: kāṣṭhatrayaṃ guṇairbaddhvā prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,34.12 //
GP12garup2_u:4617: prathame 'hni dvitīye ca tṛtīye ca tathā khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4622: na pūrvāhne na madhyāhne nāparāhne na sandhiṣu /
GP12garup2_u:4624: puttreṇa datte te sarve gotriṇo hitabāndhavāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4625: svajātyaiḥ parajātyaiśca deyo nadyāṃ jalāñjaliḥ // GarP_2,34.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4626: gantavyaṃ naiva vipreṇa dātuṃ śīghraṃ jalāñjalim /
