GP12garup2_u:4628: pañcatvañca gate śūdre yaḥ kāṣṭhaṃ nayate citām /
GP12garup2_u:4630: trirātre ca tataḥ pūrṇe nadīṃ gacchet samudragām /
GP12garup2_u:4631: prāṇāyāmaśataṃ kṛtvā ghṛtaṃ prāśya viśudhyati // GarP_2,34.19 //
GP12garup2_u:4632: śūdro gacchati sarvatra vaiśyastriṣu dvayoḥ paraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4633: gacchati svīyavarṇeṣu dātuṃ prete jalāñjalim // GarP_2,34.20 //
GP12garup2_u:4635: tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa // GarP_2,34.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4637: yatra sthāne mṛto yastu adhvanyapi gṛhe 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4638: viśleṣastu tataḥ sthānānna kvacidvihito budhaiḥ // GarP_2,34.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4643: gotribhirna ca kartavyaṃ gṛhānnañca na bhojayet /
GP12garup2_u:4644: bhuñjīta mṛnmaye pātre uttānañca vivarjayet // GarP_2,34.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4648: vāyurūpo bhramatyeva vāyurūrdhvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,34.27 //
GP12garup2_u:4650: navakaiḥ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhaiḥ prayāti hi kuṭīṃ naraḥ // GarP_2,34.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4651: tilairdarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī dhātumayī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4652: pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,34.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4653: yadā puṣpaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ hi tadā garbhaṃ na dhārayet /
GP12garup2_u:4654: ādarācca tato bhūmau tiladarbhānviniḥ kṣipet // GarP_2,34.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4655: paśutve sthāvaratve ca yatra kvāpi sa jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:4658: yathā śrāddhaṃ yamuddiśya kṛtaṃ tasyopatiṣṭhati // GarP_2,34.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4661: piṇḍadānaṃ na yasyābhūdākāśe bhramate tu saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4663: ākāśe vasate trīṇi dinamekantu vāsake // GarP_2,34.34 //
GP12garup2_u:4664: dagdhe dehe ca vahnau ca jalenaiva tu tarpitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4666: prathame 'hni tṛtīye ca pañcame saptame 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4668: gṛhadvāre śmaśāne vā tīrthe devālaye 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4669: yatrādyo dīyate piṇḍastatra sarvān samāpayet // GarP_2,34.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4673: dadyādviprāya yaḥ śayyāṃ yathoktaṃ pretamokṣadām // GarP_2,34.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4674: na bhavet yadā sa gotro paro 'pi vidhimācaret /
GP12garup2_u:4675: bhāryā vā puruṣaḥ kaścit tuṣṭaśca kurute striyaḥ // GarP_2,34.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4677: annādyena ca tenaiva sarvaśrāddhāni kārayet // GarP_2,34.41 //
GP12garup2_u:4679: śrāddhaṃ kṛtantu yairvastraistāni tyaktvā gṛhaṃ viśet // GarP_2,34.42 //
GP12garup2_u:4680: asagotraḥ sagotro vā yadi strī yadi vā pumān /
GP12garup2_u:4681: prathame 'hani yaḥ kuryāt sa daśāhaṃ samāpayet // GarP_2,34.43 //
GP12garup2_u:4685: caturṇāmapi varṇānāmeṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,34.45 //
GP12garup2_u:4687: caturastu dvitīye 'hni tṛtīye trīṃśtathaiva ca // GarP_2,34.46 //
GP12garup2_u:4689: ekoddiṣṭantu vai śrāddhaṃ caturthe 'hani kārayet // GarP_2,34.47 //
GP12garup2_u:4691: cakṣuḥ śrotrañca nāsā ca dvitīye 'hni prajāyate // GarP_2,34.48 //
GP12garup2_u:4692: gaṇḍau vaktraṃ tathā grīvā tṛtīye 'hani jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:4693: hṛdayaṃ kukṣirudaraṃ caturthe tadvadeva hi // GarP_2,34.49 //
GP12garup2_u:4695: ṣaṣṭhe ūrū ca vijñeye saptame gulphasambhavaḥ // GarP_2,34.50 //
GP12garup2_u:4696: aṣṭame divase prāpte jaṅghe ca bhavato 'ṇḍaja /
GP12garup2_u:4697: pādau ca navame jñeyau daśame balavatkṣudhā // GarP_2,34.51 //
GP12garup2_u:4699: siddhānnaṃ tasya dātavyaṃ kṛśarāḥ pūpakāḥ payaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4702: tripakṣañcāpi ṣaṇmāse dve śrāddhāni ca ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,34.53 //
GP12garup2_u:4703: prati māsaṃ pradātavyaṃ mṛtāhe yā tithirbhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4704: sa māsaḥ prathamo jñeya iti vedavido viduḥ // GarP_2,34.54 //
GP12garup2_u:4706: tadeva prathamaṃ śrāddhaṃ tat syādekādaśe 'hani // GarP_2,34.55 //
GP12garup2_u:4707: sā tithirmāsike śrāddhe mṛto yasmin dine naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4708: riktayośca tripakṣe ca sā tithirnādriyeta vai // GarP_2,34.56 //
GP12garup2_u:4709: paurṇamāsyāṃ mṛto yo 'sau caturthī tasya conakā /
GP12garup2_u:4710: caturthyāntu mṛto yastu navamī tasya conakā // GarP_2,34.57 //
GP12garup2_u:4711: navamyāñca mṛto yaśca riktā tasya caturdaśī /
GP12garup2_u:4712: etā riktāśca vijñeyā antyeṣṭau kuśalena ca // GarP_2,34.58 //
GP12garup2_u:4714: catuṣpathe tyajedannaṃ punaḥ snānaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,34.59 //
GP12garup2_u:4720: etasmāddīyate kumbhaḥ prītiḥ pretasya jāyate // GarP_2,34.62 //
GP12garup2_u:4721: yasmin dine mṛto janturaṭavyāṃ viṣame 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4722: yadā tadā bhaveddāhaḥ sūtakaṃ mṛtavāsarāt // GarP_2,34.63 //
GP12garup2_u:4724: ekādaśāhe dātavyaṃ tena śūddho dvijo bhavet // GarP_2,34.64 //
GP12garup2_u:4725: kṣattriyo dvādaśāhe tu vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśe tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4726: śuddhiḥ śūdrasya māsena mṛtake jātasūtake // GarP_2,34.65 //
GP12garup2_u:4727: māsatraye trirātraṃ syāt ṣaṇmāsena tu pakṣiṇī /
GP12garup2_u:4729: anenaivā nusāreṇa śuddhiḥ syāt sārvavarṇikī // GarP_2,34.66 //
GP12garup2_u:4733: evaṃ pracchādyate sarvaṃ na preto bhavati kvacit // GarP_2,34.68 //
GP12garup2_u:4735: anityaṃ jīvanaṃ ysamāt paścāt ko nu pradāsyati // GarP_2,34.69 //
GP12garup2_u:4737: mṛte mṛta iti jñātvā kṣaṇāt sneho nivartate // GarP_2,34.70 //
GP12garup2_u:4741: evaṃ jānannidaṃ sarvaṃ svahastenaiva dāpayet // GarP_2,34.72 //
GP12garup2_u:4744: tasyāṃ saṃsthāpya haimañca hariṃ lakṣmyā samanvitam // GarP_2,34.73 //
GP12garup2_u:4746: vijñeyo garuḍa prītyai sa nidrākalaśo budhaiḥ // GarP_2,34.74 //
GP12garup2_u:4754: vastraiḥ suśobhanaiḥ pūjya cailakaṃ paridhāpayet // GarP_2,34.78 //
GP12garup2_u:4761: tathā caikādaśāhe tu vidhireṣa prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_2,34.82 //
GP12garup2_u:4762: dadāti yo hi dharmārthe bāndhavo bāndhave mṛte /
GP12garup2_u:4763: viśeṣamatra pakṣe tu kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu // GarP_2,34.83 //
GP12garup2_u:4764: upayuktañca tasyāsīt yat kiñcit svagṛhe purā /
GP12garup2_u:4766: yadabhīṣṭañca tasyāsīt tat sarvaṃ parikalpayet // GarP_2,34.84 //
GP12garup2_u:4767: sthāpayet puruṣaṃ haimaṃ śayyopari śubhaṃ budhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4771: pīḍayanti na taṃ yāmyāḥ puruṣā bhīṣaṇānanāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4772: na gharmeṇa na śītena bādhyate sa naraḥ kvacit // GarP_2,34.87 //
GP12garup2_u:4774: apiḥ pāpasamāyuktaḥ svargalokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,34.88 //
GP12garup2_u:4778: bharturyā kurute nārī tasyāḥ śreyo hyanantakam // GarP_2,34.90 //
GP12garup2_u:4779: upakārāya sā bharturjīvantī na mṛtā tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4780: uddharejjīvamānā sā satī satyavatī priyam // GarP_2,34.91 //
GP12garup2_u:4782: vastrabhūṣā tathā śayyā sarvametaddhi dāpayet // GarP_2,34.92 //
GP12garup2_u:4784: bhūṣaṇaṃ gātralagnañca vastu bhogyādikañca yat // GarP_2,34.93 //
GP12garup2_u:4785: tat sarvaṃ melayitvā tu svesve sthāne niyojayet /
GP12garup2_u:4791: ātmā śambhuḥ śivā gaurī śakraḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha /
GP12garup2_u:4794: gṛhīte brāhmaṇastatra ko 'dāditi ca kīrtayet // GarP_2,34.98 //
GP12garup2_u:4796: vidhinānena vai pakṣin dānamekasya dāpayet // GarP_2,34.99 //
GP12garup2_u:4797: bahubhyo na pradeyāni gaurgṛhaṃ śayanaṃ striyaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4798: vibhaktadakṣiṇā hyete dātāraṃ pātayanti hi // GarP_2,34.100 //
GP12garup2_u:4799: evaṃ yo vitaret tārkṣya śṛṇu tasya ca yat phalam /
GP12garup2_u:4800: sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ divyaṃ svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,34.101 //
GP12garup2_u:4802: dvārakāyāntu yat puṇyaṃ candrasūryagrahe tathā // GarP_2,34.102 //
GP12garup2_u:4807: yatrāsau jāyate prāṇī bhuṅkte tatraiva tat phalam /
GP12garup2_u:4808: karmakṣaye kṣitau yāti mānuṣaḥ śubhadarśanaḥ // GarP_2,34.105 //
GP12garup2_u:4810: punaḥ sa yāti vaikuṇṭhaṃ mṛto 'sau narapuṅgavaḥ // GarP_2,34.106 //
GP12garup2_u:4812: aho 'sau havyakavyeṣu pitṛbhiḥ saha modate // GarP_2,34.107 //
GP12garup2_u:4814: maghāsu pitṛparvāṇi yāniyāni ca teṣu ca // GarP_2,34.108 //
GP12garup2_u:4815: śṛṇu tārkṣya yathānyāyaṃ pretatve pitaro yadi /
GP12garup2_u:4817: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ pūrṇe varṣe na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4818: ādyantu śavaśuddhyarthaṃ kṛtvā caivākṣa ṣoḍaśīm // GarP_2,34.110 //
GP12garup2_u:4820: vṛddhiṃ prāpyāgrataḥ kuryācchūdrasya svacchayaiva hi // GarP_2,34.111 //
GP12garup2_u:4822: na cāsau kurute yāvat preta eva sa vahnimān /
GP12garup2_u:4823: dvādaśāhe tataḥ kāryaṃ sāgnikena sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.112 //
GP12garup2_u:4825: abdamadhye na kurvīta sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,34.113 //
GP12garup2_u:4826: sapatnyo yadi bahvyaḥ syurekā putravatī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4829: samācārādbhavet pāpī pitṛhā cāpi jāyate // GarP_2,34.115 //
GP12garup2_u:4830: mṛte bhartari yā nārī prāṇāṃścaiva parityajet /
GP12garup2_u:4831: bhartraiva hi samaṃ tasyāḥ prakurvīta sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.116 //
GP12garup2_u:4832: asthānikāpi yā vyūḍhā vaiśyā vā kṣattriyāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4833: yāḥ patnyo vai pituḥ kaścit kuryāt putraḥ sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.117 //
GP12garup2_u:4835: ekoddiṣṭantu tacchrāddha sā tu tenaiva yujyate // GarP_2,34.118 //
GP12garup2_u:4836: anye tu daśa ye putrā jātā varṇa catuṣṭaye /
GP12garup2_u:4837: te tāsutāsu yoktvayāḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇe sadā // GarP_2,34.119 //
GP12garup2_u:4839: pituḥ pṛthak pradāvyaṃ striyāḥ piṇḍaṃ sapiṇḍane // GarP_2,34.120 //
GP12garup2_u:4841: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryamiti tārkṣya mataṃ mama // GarP_2,34.121 //
GP12garup2_u:4842: aputrāyāṃ mṛtāyāṃ tu patiḥ kuryāt sapiṇḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:4844: putro nāsti na bhartā ca strīṇāṃ tārkṣya sapiṇḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:4847: ekoddiṣṭena dātavyaṃ pareṇa saha bhrātṛbhiḥ // GarP_2,34.124 //
GP12garup2_u:4850: adāhe na ca kartavyaṃ sadāhe kārayedbudhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4852: pituḥ putreṇa kartavyaṃ na kurbvīta pitā sute /
GP12garup2_u:4857: antyeṣṭiṃ kurute hyeko munibhaiḥ samudāhṛtam // GarP_2,34.129 //
GP12garup2_u:4859: ekaikena ca kartavyā putreṇa ca svayaṃsvayam // GarP_2,34.130 //
GP12garup2_u:4862: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā /
GP12garup2_u:4867: pārvaṇaṃ na sutaiḥ kāryaṃ śrāddhaṃ nāndīmukhaṃ na ca // GarP_2,34.134 //
GP12garup2_u:4871: pitṛpiṇḍo na dātavyaḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,34.136 //
GP12garup2_u:4873: apūrṇe 'pyabdamadhyepi kartavyamiti ke ca na // GarP_2,34.137 //
GP12garup2_u:4875: kartavyaṃ tacca vai sarvameṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,34.138 //
GP12garup2_u:4877: ṛṣīṇāṃ pitaro devāḥ pitā jayati tena vai // GarP_2,34.139 //
GP12garup2_u:4880: mṛte pitaryabdamadhye yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kārayet sutaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4881: saptajanmakṛtā dharmāt hīyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,34.141 //
GP12garup2_u:4883: bhramanti vāyunā sarve kṣuttṛḍbhyāṃ paripīḍitāḥ // GarP_2,34.142 //
GP12garup2_u:4885: atha māturvipattiḥ syāt pitṛkāryaṃ na lupyate // GarP_2,34.143 //
GP12garup2_u:4886: mṛtā mātā pitā tiṣṭhejjīvantī ca pitāmahī /
GP12garup2_u:4887: sapiṇḍanantu kartavyaṃ pitāmahyā sahaiva tu // GarP_2,34.144 //
GP12garup2_u:4888: satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama /
GP12garup2_u:4889: na piṇḍo milito yeṣāṃ mṛtānāntu nṛṇāṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,34.145 //
GP12garup2_u:4892: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde aurdhvadehikādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4896: puruṣasya ca kasyāpi matā pañcatvamāgatā // GarP_2,35.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4897: pitāmahī jīvati ca tathā ca prapitāmahī /
GP12garup2_u:4900: kena sā melyate mātā etat kathaya me prabho // GarP_2,35.3 //
GP12garup2_u:4909: antyastu tyājako jñeyo yo vṛddhaprapitāmahaḥ // GarP_2,35.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4911: lepakastvantimo yastu sa bhavet paṅktisannidhaḥ // GarP_2,35.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4913: ityete pitaro jñeyā ekaviṃśati saṃkhyakāḥ // GarP_2,35.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4915: jāyate 'tra na sandehaḥ śṛṇu tasyāpi yat phalam // GarP_2,35.10 //
GP12garup2_u:4916: pitā dadāti puttrān vai vicchinnasantatiḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4918: kṛte śrāddhe guṇā hyete pitṝṇāṃ tapeṇe smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4920: yasya puṃsaśca martye vai vicchinnā santatiḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4921: sa vasennarake ghore paṅke magnaḥ karī yathā // GarP_2,35.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4923: na santatiṃ vinā so 'tra mucyate narakāddhruvam // GarP_2,35.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4924: ācāryastasya śiṣyo vā yo dūre 'pi hi gātrejaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4927: nivasennākaloke ca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_2,35.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4929: revatyantaṃ sadā dūṣyamaśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,35.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4931: dīyate na jalaṃ tatra aśubhaṃ jāyate dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:4932: lokayātrā na kartavyā duḥ khārtaḥ svajano yadi // GarP_2,35.18 //
GP12garup2_u:4938: sadyāhutikaraṃ puṇyaṃ tīrthe taddāha uttamaḥ // GarP_2,35.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4940: śavasya ca samīpe tu kṣipyante puttalāstataḥ // GarP_2,35.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4942: tato dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ taiśca puttalakaiḥ saha // GarP_2,35.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4944: pañcakeṣu mṛto yo 'sau na gatiṃ labhate naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4945: tilān gāśca suvarṇaṃ ca tamuddiśya ghṛtaṃ dadet // GarP_2,35.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4947: sūtakānte ca satputraiḥ sa preto labhate gatim // GarP_2,35.26 //
GP12garup2_u:4951: vidhānaṃ yo na kurvīta vighnastasya prajāyate // GarP_2,35.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4953: āśiṣo dviguṇān darbhān praṇavān naikapiṇḍatām // GarP_2,35.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4955: vikiraṃ ca svadhākāraṃ pitṛśabdaṃ na coccaret // GarP_2,35.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4958: na kuryāt tilahomañca dvijaḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4961: sthāne dvāre cārdhamārge citāyāṃ śavahastake // GarP_2,35.33 //
GP12garup2_u:4963: ṣaṣṭhaṃ sañcayane proktaṃ daśa piṇḍā daśāhikāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4965: anyacca ṣoḍaśaṃ madhye dvitīyaṃ tārkṣya me śṛṇu /
GP12garup2_u:4968: evaṃ ṣoḍaśakaṃ prāhuretat tattvavido janāḥ // GarP_2,35.36 //
GP12garup2_u:4970: tripakṣasambhavañcaiva dve rikte khaga ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,35.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4973: śatārdhena vihīno yo militaḥ paṅktibhāṅna hi /
GP12garup2_u:4976: melanīyaḥ śatārdhena sandhiḥ śrāddhena tattvataḥ // GarP_2,35.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4979: evaṃ cenna vidhānaṃ vidhīyate tatpiśācaparibhavanam // GarP_2,35.41 //
GP12garup2_u:4981: śavaṃ na muñceta mucyate cet duḥ sparśāddurgatirbhavet // GarP_2,35.42 //
GP12garup2_u:4982: grāmamadhye sthite prete śrute bhuṅkte yadṛcchayā /
GP12garup2_u:4985: grāmamadhye sthite prete varjayet piṇḍapātanam // GarP_2,35.42 // (35.44)
GP12garup2_u:4987: grāmamadhye sthite prete śuddhyarthaṃ jñātidharmataḥ // GarP_2,35.43 // (35.45)
GP12garup2_u:4990: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde sapiṇḍanaśavavidhyornirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4994: svagṛhantu parityajya tīrthe vai mriyate yadi // GarP_2,36.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4995: aprāpya tīrthaṃ mriyate gṛhe vā mṛtyu māgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4996: būtvā kuṭīcaro yastu sa kāṃ gatimavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,36.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4997: saṃnyāsaṃ kurute yastu tīrthe vāpi gṛhe 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4999: niyame cet kṛte deva cittabhaṅgo hi jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:5000: kena tasya bhavet siddhiḥ kṛtenāpyakṛtena vā // GarP_2,36.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5002: kṛtvā niraśanaṃ yo vai mṛtyumāpnoti ko 'pi cet /
GP12garup2_u:5003: mānupīṃ tanumutsṛjya mama tulyo virājate // GarP_2,36.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5006: tīrthe gṛhe vā saṃnyāsaṃ nītvā cenmriyate yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5007: pratyahaṃ labhate so 'pi pūrvoktaṃ dviguṇaṃ phalam // GarP_2,36.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5009: punarna jāyate rogo devavaddhi virājate // GarP_2,36.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5010: ya āturaḥ san sannyāsaṃ gṛhṇāti yadi mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5011: punarna jāyate bhūmau saṃsāre duḥ khasāgare // GarP_2,36.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5015: mṛto muktimavāpnoti yathā sarve maharṣayaḥ // GarP_2,36.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5017: tasmāt svasthe cottare vā sādhayenmokṣalakṣaṇam // GarP_2,36.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5018: puttradravyādi santyajya tīrthaṃ vrajati yo naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5022: vrataṃ niraśana kṛtvā svagṛhe 'pi mṛto yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5024: annañcaiva tathā toyaṃ parityajya naro yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5027: yamadūtā viśeṣeṇa na yāmyāstasya pārśvagāḥ // GarP_2,36.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5030: sevite 'pi sadā tathi hyanyatra mriyate yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5031: śubhe deśe kule dhīmān sa bhavedvedaviddvijaḥ // GarP_2,36.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5033: brāhmaṇān sa samāhūya sarvasvaṃ yat parityajet // GarP_2,36.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5035: anṛtaṃ na vadet paścāddharmameva samācaret // GarP_2,36.21 //
GP12garup2_u:5036: tīrthe gatvā ca yaḥ ko 'pi punarāyāti vai gṛham /
GP12garup2_u:5037: anujñātaḥ sa vai vipraiḥ prāyaścittamathācaret // GarP_2,36.22 //
GP12garup2_u:5039: tīrthaṃ yadi labhed yastu mṛtyukāle sa bhāgyavān // GarP_2,36.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5041: padepade tu godānaṃ yadi hiṃsā na jāyate // GarP_2,36.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5042: gṛhe tu yat kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tīrthasnānena śudhyati /
GP12garup2_u:5043: kurute tatra pāpañcedvajralepasamaṃ hi tat // GarP_2,36.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5045: tatra dattāni dānāni jāyante cākṣayāṇi vai // GarP_2,36.26 //
GP12garup2_u:5048: dānavantaṃ naraṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5049: ṛṣibhiḥ saha dharmaṇa citraguptena sarvadā // GarP_2,36.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5051: parādhīnaṃ mṛte sarvaṃ kṛpayā kaḥ pradāsyati // GarP_2,36.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5053: ātmānaṃ sadhanaṃ tena cakre putraprapautrakaiḥ // GarP_2,36.30 //
GP12garup2_u:5057: mṛtāḥ śocanti te sarve kadaryāḥ pāpinastviti // GarP_2,36.32 //
GP12garup2_u:5062: udāse dhārmikaḥ saumyaḥ prāpyāpi vipulaṃ dhanam /
GP12garup2_u:5064: na caivopadravāstasya mohajālo na caiva hi /
GP12garup2_u:5065: mṛtyukāle na ca bhayaṃ yamadūtasamudbhavam // GarP_2,36.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5066: samāḥ sahasrāṇi ca sapta vai jale daśaikamagnau pavane ca ṣoḍaśa /
GP12garup2_u:5067: mahāhave paṣṭiraśītirgogṛhe anāśake kāśyapa cākṣayā gatiḥ // GarP_2,36.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5068: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'naśanamṛta gatinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5072: vidhinā kena kartavyā kṛtireṣā janārdana // GarP_2,37.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5073: kiṃlakṣaṇāḥ kena pūrṇāḥ kasya deyā janārdana /
GP12garup2_u:5079: dvādaśāhe ca paṇmāse traipakṣe vāpi vatsare /
GP12garup2_u:5080: udakumbhāḥ pradātavyā mārge tasya sukhāya vai // GarP_2,37.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5084: suprītastena dattena preto yāmyaiḥ sa gacchati // GarP_2,37.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5086: vidhinā tatra saṅkalpaya ghaṭān dvādaśasaṃkhyakān // GarP_2,37.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5088: viṣṇumuddiśya dātavyā saṃkalpya brāhmaṇe śubhe // GarP_2,37.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5089: eko vai dharmarājāya tena tuṣṭena muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:5090: citraguptāya caikaṃ tu gatastatra sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,37.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5095: pakvānnajalapūrṇo hi yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ dinam // GarP_2,37.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5097: ekā vai vardhanī tatra tasyāṃ pātrantu vaṃśajam // GarP_2,37.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5104: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe sodakumbhaśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5107: dānatīrthārthitaṃ mokṣaṃ svargañca vada me prabho /
GP12garup2_u:5108: kena mokṣamavāpnoti kena svarge vasecciram // GarP_2,38.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5110: mānuṣyaṃ kena labhate narakeśu nimajjati // GarP_2,38.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5112: brūhi kasmin mṛte svarge punarjanma na vidyate // GarP_2,38.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5114: mānuṣyaṃ bhārate varṣe trayodaśasu jātiṣu // GarP_2,38.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5115: tat prāpya mriyate kṣetre punarjanma na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:5116: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantikā // GarP_2,38.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5118: sannyastamiti yo bruyāt prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi // GarP_2,38.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5119: mṛto viṣṇupuraṃ yāti na punarjāyate kṣitau /
GP12garup2_u:5122: kṛṣṇakṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ // GarP_2,38.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5124: śālagrāmajilā yatra yatra dvāravatī śilā // GarP_2,38.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5125: ubhayoḥ saṅgamo yatra muktistatra na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5129: tulasī dahate pāpaṃ nṛṇāṃ janmārjitaṃ khaga // GarP_2,38.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5131: yaḥ snāto mānase tīrthe na sa lipyeta pātakaiḥ // GarP_2,38.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5132: na kāṣṭhe vidyate devo na śilāyāṃ kadācana /
GP12garup2_u:5133: bhāve hi vidyate devastasmādbhāvaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,38.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5135: na te śivapurīṃ yānti cittavṛttirgarīyasī // GarP_2,38.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5136: yādṛk cittapratītiḥ syāt tādṛk karmaphalaṃ nṛṇām /
GP12garup2_u:5138: brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe ca strīṇāṃ balavadheṣu ca /
GP12garup2_u:5139: prāṇatyāgaparo yastu sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,38.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5140: anāśake mṛtau yastu sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt /
GP12garup2_u:5141: anāśake mṛto yastu sa muktaḥ sarvabandhanaiḥ // GarP_2,38.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5143: ete vai mokṣamārgāśca svargamārgāstathaiva ca // GarP_2,38.18 //
GP12garup2_u:5146: ātmānaṃ tatra santyajya svargavāsaṃ labhecciram // GarP_2,38.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5150: prabhāse śrīsthale caiva arbude ca tripuṣkare // GarP_2,38.21 //
GP12garup2_u:5151: bhūteśvare mṛto yastu svarge vasati mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5152: brahmaṇo divasaṃ yāvat tataḥ patati bhūtale // GarP_2,38.22 //
GP12garup2_u:5154: sarvaṃ kalaṃ sa muddhṛtya svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,38.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5156: indraloke vaset so 'pi svakulaiḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ // GarP_2,38.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5160: jīrṇoddhāreṇa vā teṣāṃ tat puṇyaṃ dviguṇaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,38.26 //
GP12garup2_u:5162: kṛtvā viprāya viduṣe pradadāti kuṭumbine // GarP_2,38.27 //
GP12garup2_u:5163: tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭī ca naraḥ svarge mahīyate // GarP_2,38.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5164: yā strī savarṇā saṃśubā mṛtaṃ patimanuvrajet /
GP12garup2_u:5165: sā mṛtā svargamāpnoti varṣāṇāṃ romasaṃkhyatā // GarP_2,38.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5167: svargaṃ labhetāṃ tau cobhau divyastrībhiralaṅkṛtau // GarP_2,38.30 //
GP12garup2_u:5169: prakṣālayati sarvāṇi yā svaṃ patimanuvrajet // GarP_2,38.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5179: saro bhirdaśabhistulyā yā prapā nirjale vane // GarP_2,38.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5180: yā vāpī nirjale deśe yaddānaṃ nirdhane dvije /
GP12garup2_u:5181: prāṇināṃ yo dayāṃ dhatte sa bhavennākanāyakaḥ // GarP_2,38.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5183: sa tat sarvaṃ phalaṃ prāpya pratiṣṭhāṃ paramāṃ labhet // GarP_2,38.38 //
GP12garup2_u:5184: phalgu kāryaṃ parityajya satataṃ dharmavān bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:5185: dānaṃ damo dayā ceti sārametat trayaṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,38.39 //
GP12garup2_u:5188: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttamalokagatyāgatimokṣamānuṣyahetunirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭātriṃśattamo
GP12garup2_u:5191: sūtakānāṃ vidhiṃ brūhi dayāṃ kṛtvā mayiprabho /
GP12garup2_u:5192: vivekāya hi cittasya mānavānāṃ hitāya ca // GarP_2,39.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5197: dānaṃ pratigraho homaḥ svādhyāyaśca nivartate // GarP_2,39.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5201: snānaṃ sacelaṃ kartavyaṃ sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // GarP_2,39.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5202: āmagarbhāśca ye jīvā ye ca garbhādviniḥ sṛtāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5205: rājānaḥ śrotiyāścaiva sadyaḥ śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_2,39.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5208: eteṣāṃ sūtakaṃ nāsti yasya cecchanti pārthivāḥ // GarP_2,39.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5209: prasave ca sapiṇḍānāṃ na kuryāt saṅkaraṃ dvijaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5210: daśāhācchrudhyate mātā avagāhya pitā śuciḥ // GarP_2,39.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5216: tāvat syādaśucirvipro yāvat tat syādanirdaśam // GarP_2,39.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5217: udite niyame dāne ārte vipre nivedayet /
GP12garup2_u:5218: tathaiva ṛṣibhiḥ proktaṃ yathākālaṃ na duṣyati // GarP_2,39.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5220: mṛttikayā tathānte ca naraḥ snātvā śucirbhavet // GarP_2,39.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5221: dānaṃ pariṣade dadyāt suvarṇaṃ govṛṣaṃ dvije /
GP12garup2_u:5222: kṣattriyo dviguṇaṃ caiva vaiśyastu triguṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,39.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5226: ahastu sūtakaṃ tasya tvabdānāṃ saṃkhyayā smṛtam // GarP_2,39.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5227: brāhmaṇārthe vipannā ye nārīṇāṃ gograheṣu ca /
GP12garup2_u:5235: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde sūtakakālādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmai konacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5239: kathaṃ teṣāṃ bhavenmārgaḥ kiṃ sthānaṃ kā gatirbhavet // GarP_2,40.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5240: kiñca yuktaṃ bhavetteṣāṃ vidhānaṃ vāpi kīdṛśam /
GP12garup2_u:5241: tadahaṃ śrotumicchāmi brūhi me madhusūdana // GarP_2,40.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5245: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ gopyaṃ jāte durmaraṇe sati /
GP12garup2_u:5250: yānti te narakeghore ye ca mlecchādibhirhatāḥ // GarP_2,40.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5252: ullaṅghitā mṛtā ye ca mahārogaiśca pīḍitāḥ // GarP_2,40.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5258: na teṣāṃ kārayeddāhaṃ sūtakaṃ nodakakriyām // GarP_2,40.10 //
GP12garup2_u:5259: na vidhānaṃ mṛtādyaṃ ca na kuryādaurdhvadaihikam /
GP12garup2_u:5262: ṣaṇmāsaṃ brāhmaṇe dāhastrimāsaṃ kṣattriye mataḥ // GarP_2,40.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5263: sārdha māsaṃ tu vaiśyasya sadyaḥ śūdre vidhīyate /
GP12garup2_u:5264: gaṅgāyāṃ yamunāyāñca naimiṣe puṣkare 'tha ca // GarP_2,40.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5265: taḍāge jalūpūrṇe vā hrade vā vimalodake /
GP12garup2_u:5266: vāpyāṃ kūpe gavāṃ goṣṭhe gṛhe vā pratimālaye // GarP_2,40.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5268: pretāya tarpaṇaṃ kāryaṃ mantraiḥ paurāṇavaidikaiḥ // GarP_2,40.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5276: dānadharmarataḥ śāntaḥ praṇamya vāgyataḥ śuciḥ // GarP_2,40.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5278: bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta śrāddhatyekādaśaiva tu // GarP_2,40.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5281: haviṣyānnaṃ śubhaṃ mudrāṃ chatroṣṇīṣe ca calekam /
GP12garup2_u:5286: śaṅkhapātre tathā tāmre tarpaṇañca pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_2,40.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5293: ye devāsaścaturthe tu samudraṃ gaccha pañcame /
GP12garup2_u:5294: agnirjyoti stathā ṣaṣṭhe hiraṇyagarbhaḥ saptame // GarP_2,40.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5296: taśame yāḥ phalinīti piṇḍe caikādaśe tataḥ // GarP_2,40.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5304: sīsakaṃ tu bhavetpretaṃ tvatha vā darbhakaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5305: śannodevīti mantreṇa govindaṃ paścime nyaset // GarP_2,40.33 //
GP12garup2_u:5309: madhye maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā sthāpyo darbhamayo naraḥ // GarP_2,40.35 //
GP12garup2_u:5310: brahmā viṣṇustathā rudro yamaḥ pretaśca pañcamaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5313: japaṃ karyātpṛthaktatra brahmādau devatāsu ca // GarP_2,40.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5316: śaṅkhe vā tāmrapātre vā alābhe mṛnmaye 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5327: palāśasya ca vṛntānāṃ vibhāgaṃ śṛṇu kāśyapa // GarP_2,40.44 //
GP12garup2_u:5329: śatatrayeṇa ṣaṣṭyā ca vṛntaiḥ prokto 'sthisañcayaḥ // GarP_2,40.45 //
GP12garup2_u:5333: bāhuyugme śataṃ dadyātkaṭi deśe ca viṃśatim // GarP_2,40.47 //
GP12garup2_u:5337: nārikelaṃ śiraḥ sthāne tumbaṃ dadyācca tāluke /
GP12garup2_u:5339: antreṣu nālakaṃ dadyādbālakaṃ prāṇa eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:5340: vasāyīṃ medakaṃ dadyādgomūtreṇa tu mūtrakam // GarP_2,40.50 //
GP12garup2_u:5341: gandhakaṃ dhātavo deyo haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup2_u:5342: retaḥ sthāne pāradañca purīṣe pittalaṃ tathā // GarP_2,40.51 //
GP12garup2_u:5343: manaḥ śilāṃ tathā gātre tilakalkañca sandhiṣu /
GP12garup2_u:5344: yavapiṣṭaṃ tathā māṃse madhu vai kṣaudrameva ca // GarP_2,40.52 //
GP12garup2_u:5348: vṛntākaṃ vṛṣaṇadvandve liṅge syādgṛñjanaṃ śubham // GarP_2,40.54 //
GP12garup2_u:5349: ghṛtaṃ nābhyāṃ pradeyaṃ syātkaupīne ca trapu smṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5352: paridhānaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃ hṛdaye rukmakaṃ nyaset // GarP_2,40.56 //
GP12garup2_u:5353: ṛddhivṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣuṣośca kapardakau /
GP12garup2_u:5358: śirome śrīriti ṛcā punantu varuṇeti ca /
GP12garup2_u:5361: (tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5362: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pānaṃ samṛtam // GarP_2,40.61 //
GP12garup2_u:5363: tilapātraṃ tato dattvā padadānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,40.61*1 //
GP12garup2_u:5367: pretaṃmokṣaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhṛdi viṣṇuṃ prakalpya ca // GarP_2,40.63 //
GP12garup2_u:5368: oṃ viṣṇuriti saṃsmṛtya pretaṃ tanmṛtyumeva ca /
GP12garup2_u:5371: sarvaṃ varṣavidhiṃ kuryādevaṃ pretaśca muktibhāk // GarP_2,40.65 //
GP12garup2_u:5372: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'pamṛtyau sukhaduḥ khalābhālābhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5376: kārtikādiṣu māseṣu paurṇamāsyāṃ śubhe dine // GarP_2,41.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5379: vāpyāṃ kūpe gavāṃ goṣṭhe sthāpyāgniṃ vidhivattataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5382: puryukṣaṇānte homaṃ ca karyā dvai brāhmaṇena tu // GarP_2,41.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5383: āghārāvājyabhāgau ca cakṣuṣī ca pradā payet /
GP12garup2_u:5386: agnaye rudrāya śarvāya paśupataye ugrāya śivāya /
GP12garup2_u:5402: evaṃ vidhiḥ samāyuktaḥ pretamokṣe karoti hi // GarP_2,41.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5403: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsarganirūpaṇaṃ nāmai kacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5410: nāsti bhamisamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti bhamisamo nidhiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5411: nāsti satyasamo dharmo nānṛtātpātakaṃ param // GarP_2,42.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5412: agnerapatyaṃ prathamaṃ suvarṇaṃ bhūrvaiṣṇavī sūryasutāśca gāvaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5413: lokatrayaṃ tena bhavetpradattaṃ yaḥ kāñcanaṃ gāṃ ca mahīṃ ca dadyāt // GarP_2,42.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5416: kṛtvā bahūni pāpāni raudrāṇi vipulāni ca /
GP12garup2_u:5419: sa yāti narake ghore yastaṃ na parirakṣati // GarP_2,42.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5423: vṛtticchede tathā vṛtteḥ karaṇaṃ lakṣadhenukam // GarP_2,42.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5424: varamekāpyapahṛtā na tu dattaṃ gavāṃ śatam /

GP12garup2_u:5426: svayameva tu yo dattvā svayameva prabādhate /
GP12garup2_u:5427: sa pāpī narakaṃ yāti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // GarP_2,42.11 //

GP12garup2_u:5434: svadattāṃ paradattāṃ vā yo harecca vasundharām /

GP12garup2_u:5444: saṃkrāntau yāni dānāni havyakavyāni yāni ca /

GP12garup2_u:5450: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde bhūdānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśatamo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12garup2_u:5458: rājadaṇḍo na tasyāsti prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate // GarP_2,43.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5459: raktasya darśane daṣṭe āturā strī bhaved yadi /

GP12garup2_u:5462: snātvāsnātvāspṛśedenaṃ tataḥ śudhyet sa āturaḥ // GarP_2,43.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5463: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde śuddhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5472: na teṣāṃ syānnava śrāddhaṃ na saṃskāraḥ sapiṇḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:5473: śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśoktāni na bhavanti ca tānyapi // GarP_2,44.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5477: ekādaśīṃ samāsādya śuklapakṣe ca kāśyapa // GarP_2,44.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5479: daśa piṇḍān ghṛtāktāṃśca darbheṣu madhusaṃyutān // GarP_2,44.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5480: yajñopavīti satilān dhyāyan viṣṇuṃ yamaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5482: uddhṛtya miśritān paścāt tīrthe 'bhmaḥ su viniḥ kṣipet /
GP12garup2_u:5483: kṣipan saṃkīrtayennāma gotraṃ ca mṛtakasya ca // GarP_2,44.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5489: apare 'hani madhyāhne yamaṃ viṣṇuṃ tathārcayet // GarP_2,44.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5493: pretaṃ yamaṃ ca viṣṇuṃ ca smaran śrāddhaṃ samāpayet // GarP_2,44.14 //

GP12garup2_u:5496: prathamaṃ viṣṇave dadyādbrahmaṇe ca śivāya ca /

GP12garup2_u:5498: nāma gotraṃ smaret tasya viṣṇuśabdaṃ prakīrtayet /
GP12garup2_u:5502: dadyādannaṃ dvijānāṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5503: evaṃ śiṣṭatamaṃ vipraṃ hariṇyena prapūjayet // GarP_2,44.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5505: anuvrajya dvijān paścāt tyaktāmbho dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // GarP_2,44.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5516: arcayet tāṃ sitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sugandhaiścandanenaca // GarP_2,44.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5522: dhenuṃ dattvā tato brūyāt prīyatāṃ nāgarāḍiti // GarP_2,44.28 //

GP12garup2_u:5526: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde durmaraṇe kāryākāryakriyādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuścatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5533: ekoddiṣṭaṃ na kuryātāṃ pratyabdaṃ tau tu pārvaṇam // GarP_2,45.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5534: yadā tvanyataraḥ sāgniḥ putro vāpyathavā pitā /
GP12garup2_u:5535: pratyabdaṃ pārvaṇaṃ tatra kuryātāṃ kṣetrajaurasau // GarP_2,45.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5536: anagnayaḥ sāgnayo vā putrā vā pitaro 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5537: ekoddiṣṭaṃ sutaiḥ kāryaṃ kṣayāha iti kecana // GarP_2,45.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5538: darśakāle kṣayo yasya pretapakṣe 'tha vā punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5539: pratyabdaṃ pārvaṇaṃ kāryaṃ tasya sarvaiḥ sutairapi // GarP_2,45.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5542: bahirlūnāḥ sakṛllanāḥ śrāddhaṃ vṛddhimṛte sadā // GarP_2,45.7 //

GP12garup2_u:5546: māsenyasmin tithau tasyāṃ kuryācchrāddhaṃ tadaiva hi // GarP_2,45.9 //

GP12garup2_u:5551: dadyāt pūrvaṃ mṛtasyādau dvitīyasya tataḥ punaḥ /

GP12garup2_u:5565: gṛhasthe proṣite yacca kaścittu mriyate gṛhe /

GP12garup2_u:5570: samāpanīyaṃ tatrāpi śrāddhaṃ gṛhītu dūrataḥ // GarP_2,45.21 //

GP12garup2_u:5578: sarvān pitṛgaṇān samyak sahaivoddiśya yojayet // GarP_2,45.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5582: dattvā tu dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā namaskārairvisarjayet // GarP_2,45.27 //

GP12garup2_u:5591: patiputrānvitāḥ sādhvyo yoṣito 'ṣṭau ca bhāvayet // GarP_2,45.32 //

GP12garup2_u:5597: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pratyābdikādiśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśo

GP12garup2_u:5628: kharo vai bahuyājī syātkāko nirmantrabhojanāt // GarP_2,46.14 //

GP12garup2_u:5757: svahastena tato deyaṃ mṛte kaḥ kasya dāsyatī // GarP_2,47.38 //
GP12garup2_u:5759: asthireṇa śarīreṇa sthiraṃ karma samācaret // GarP_2,47.39 //

GP12garup2_u:5761: itīdamuktaṃ tava pakṣirāja viḍambanaṃ jantugaṇasya sarvam /

GP12garup2_u:5770: mayā proktaṃ vai muktyai nidānaṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5773: dharmo jayati nādharmaḥ satyaṃ jayati nānṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5774: kṣamā jayati na krodho viṣṇurjayati nāsurāḥ // GarP_2,47.46 //
GP12garup2_u:5776: yeṣāmeva sthirā buddhirna teṣāṃ durgatirbhavet // GarP_2,47.47 //
GP12garup2_u:5785: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gatopi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5786: yaḥ smaretpuṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraṃ śuciḥ // GarP_2,47.52 //
GP12garup2_u:5787: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpu- uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dharmakādṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde karmavipākādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12garup2_u:5791: kāle svakīye nijapuṇyasaṃkhyayā vadanti lāka kathasva tanme // GarP_2,48.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5793: kenaiva puṇyena mudaṃ prayānti tiṣṭhanti kenaiva kulaṃ balaṃ vayaḥ // GarP_2,48.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5795: śrutvātha devo garuḍaṃ tvavocat smṛtvā vapuḥ karmabhayañca rūpam /
GP12garup2_u:5796: sṛṣṭā dharā yena carācaraṃ jagatsa yena śastā vihito yamo vibhuḥ // GarP_2,48.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5799: praviśyacāṅguṣṭhasame sa tatra vai taṃ prāpya dehaṃ svamandiram? // GarP_2,48.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5800: gṛhītapāśo rudate punaḥ punardeśe supuṇye dvija dehasaṃsthitaḥ /

GP12garup2_u:5802: na me 'sti bandhuryamamārgagāmino mayā na kṛtyaṃ dvijadehalipsayā /
GP12garup2_u:5804: prāptaṃ suratnaṃ karasaṃsthitaṃ gataṃ dehankvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5805: yaḥ kṣattriyo bāhubalena saṃyuge lalāṭadeśādrudhiraṃ mukhe papau /

GP12garup2_u:5809: kṣattrānvayo vāpi viśonvayo vā śūdrānvayo vāpi hi nīcavarṇaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5811: upadruteṣveṣu parāṅmukho yaḥ syustasya devāḥ sakalāḥ parāṅmukhāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5812: tilodakaṃ naiva pibanti pūrve hutaṃ na gṛhṇāti hutāśanopi tat // GarP_2,48.10 //
GP12garup2_u:5813: dveṣādbhayādvā samare samāgate śastraṃ gṛhītvā parasainyasaṃmukhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5814: na yāti pakṣīndra mṛśca paścātkṣāttraṃ balaṃ tasya gataṃ tathaiva /
GP12garup2_u:5815: dvijāya dattvā kanakaṃ mahīmimāṃ bhūyaḥ sa paścādbhavatīha loke // GarP_2,48.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5816: dānaṃ pradattaṃ grahaṇe dvijendre snānaṃ kṛtaṃ tena sadā sutīrthe /
GP12garup2_u:5817: gatvā gayāyāṃ pitṛpiṇḍadānaṃ kṛtaṃ sadā yo mriyate tu yuddhe // GarP_2,48.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5818: yaḥ kṣāttradehantu vihāya śocate raṇāṅgaṇe svāmivadhe ca gograhe /
GP12garup2_u:5819: strībālaghāte pathi sārthahetave mayā svakośaṃ na hataṃ na pātitam // GarP_2,48.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5820: vaiśyaḥ svakarmāṇi viśocate tadā gṛhītapāśo na mayāpi sañcitam /
GP12garup2_u:5821: satyaṃ na coktaṃ kraya vikrayeṇa mohādvimūḍhena kuṭumbahetave // GarP_2,48.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5822: śūdraṃ vapuḥ prāpya yaśaskaraṃ sadā dānaṃ dvijebhyo na kṛtaṃ dvijārcanam /
GP12garup2_u:5824: jalāśayo naiva kṛto dharātale asaṃskṛto vipravaro na saṃskṛtaḥ // GarP_2,48.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5825: tyaktvā svakarmāṇi madena susthitaṃ mayā sutīrthe svavapurna cojjhitam /
GP12garup2_u:5826: dharmorjito naiva na devapūjanaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā caiva vimuktihetave // GarP_2,48.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5828: marunmayaṃ dehamime viśanti naivehamānāḥ pathi dharmasaṃkule // GarP_2,48.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5829: parasparaṃ dharmakṛntaṃ svakīyaṃ sampādya lakṣyaṃ pathi sañcarantsvam /
GP12garup2_u:5830: pakṣīndra vākyāni śṛṇuṣva tāni manoramāṇi pravadanti yāni // GarP_2,48.18 //
GP12garup2_u:5831: sārā hi lokeṣu bhavettrilokī dvīpeṣu sarveṣu ca jambukākhyam /
GP12garup2_u:5832: deśeṣu sarveṣvapi devadeśaḥ jīveṣu sarveṣu manuṣya eva // GarP_2,48.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5833: varṇāśca catvāra iha praśastāḥ varṇeṣu dharmiṣṭhanarāḥ praśastāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5834: dharmeṇa saukhyaṃ samupaiti sarvaṃ jñānaṃ samāpnoti mahāpathe sthitaḥ // GarP_2,48.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5835: dehaṃ parityajya yadā gatāyuḥ pakṣin sthito 'haṃ kṛmikīṭasaṃsthitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5837: sarvaṃ vijānāti hi garbhasaṃsthito jātaśca sadyastadidañca vismaret /
GP12garup2_u:5838: yaccintitaṃ garbhasamāgatena vai bālo yuvā vṛddhavayā babhūva // GarP_2,48.22 //
GP12garup2_u:5839: mohādvināṣṭaṃ yadi garbhacintitaṃ smṛtaṃ punarmṛtyugate cadehe /
GP12garup2_u:5840: tasminpranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitaṃ gataṃ smṛtaṃ punargarbhagate ca dehe // GarP_2,48.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5841: tasminpranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitaṃ punarmayā svakośe paravañcanaṃ kṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5842: dyūtaiśchalenāpi ca cauryavṛttyā dharmaṃ vyatikramya śarīrarakṣaṇe // GarP_2,48.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5843: kṛcchreṇa lakṣmīḥ samupārjitā svayaṃ mayā na bhuktaṃ manasepsitaṃ dhanam /
GP12garup2_u:5845: somagrahe sūryasamāgamepi vā na sevitaṃ tīrthavariṣṭhamuttamam /
GP12garup2_u:5846: kośaṃ svakīyaṃ malamūtrapūritaṃ dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.26 //
GP12garup2_u:5847: mayā na dṛṣṭā na natā na pūjitā traivikramī mūrtiriha sthitā bhuvi /
GP12garup2_u:5848: prabhāsanātho na ca bhaktisaṃstuto dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.27 //
GP12garup2_u:5849: gatvā variṣṭhe bhuvi tīrthasannidhau dhanaṃ na dattaṃ viduṣāṃ kare mayā /
GP12garup2_u:5850: āplutya dehaṃ vidhinā dvije gurau dihinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5851: na mātṛpūjā na ca viṣṇuśaṅkarau gaṇeśacaṇaḍyau na ca bhāskaro 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5853: labdhā mayā mānavadevatopamā mohādgatā sarvamidañca pārthiva /
GP12garup2_u:5854: gatiṃ na vīkṣeta sa vai vimūḍhadhīrdehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.30 //
GP12garup2_u:5856: muktiṃ samāyānti manuṣyaloke vasanti ye dharmaratāḥ sudeśe // GarP_2,48.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5858: hā daiva hā daiva iti smaran vai dhanaṃ na dattaṃ svayamarjitaṃ yat // GarP_2,48.32 //
GP12garup2_u:5859: na bhūmidānaṃ na ca gopradānaṃ na vāridānaṃ na ca vastradānam /
GP12garup2_u:5860: phalaṃ satāmbūlavilepanaṃ vā tvayā na dattaṃ bhuvi śocase katham // GarP_2,48.33 //
GP12garup2_u:5861: pitā mṛtaste ca pitāmahaḥ sā yayā dhṛto vāpyudare svakīye /
GP12garup2_u:5862: mṛto 'pyasau bandhujanaḥ samasto dṛṣṭaṃ tvayā sarvamidaṃ gatāyaḥ // GarP_2,48.34 //
GP12garup2_u:5863: kośaṃ tvadīyaṃ jvalitañca vahninā puttrairgṛhīto dhanadhānya sañcayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5864: subhāṣitaṃ dharmacayaṃ kṛtañca yattadeva gacchettava pṛṣṭhasaṃstham // GarP_2,48.35 //
GP12garup2_u:5865: na dṛśyate ko 'pi mṛtaḥ samāgato rājā yatirvā dvijapuṅgavo 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5866: yo vai mṛtaḥ sāhasikaḥ sa martyako nāśaṃ yo 'pi dharātale sthitaḥ // GarP_2,48.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5867: evaṃ gaṇāste bruvate sakinnarā dhairyaṃ samālambya vipādapūritaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5868: śrutvā gaṇānāṃ vacanaṃ mahādbhutaṃ bravīti pakṣīndra manuṣyatāṃ gataḥ // GarP_2,48.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5870: vāṇī kalatraṃ madhurārthabhāṣiṇī snānaṃ sutīrthe ca subandhavargaḥ // GarP_2,48.38 //
GP12garup2_u:5871: karārpitaṃ yatsukṛtaṃ samastaṃ svargastadā syāttava kiṅkaropamaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5872: yo dharmavān prāpsyati so 'tisaukhyaṃ pāpī samastaṃ vividhañca duḥkham // GarP_2,48.39 //
GP12garup2_u:5873: yo dharmaśīlo jitamānaroṣo vidyāvinīto na paropatāpī /
GP12garup2_u:5874: svadāratuṣṭaḥ paradāradūraḥsa vai naro no bhuvi vandanīyaḥ // GarP_2,48.40 //
GP12garup2_u:5876: māsopavāsī ca pativratā caṣaḍ jīvaloke mama vandanīyāḥ // GarP_2,48.41 //
GP12garup2_u:5877: evaṃ samācārayuto naro 'pi vāpīṃ sakūpāṃ sajalaṃ taḍāgam /
GP12garup2_u:5878: prapāśubhaṃ hṛdgṛhadevamandiraṃ kṛtaṃ nareṇaiva sa dharmauttamaḥ // GarP_2,48.42 //
GP12garup2_u:5879: varṣāśanaṃ vedavide ca dattaṃ kanyāvivāhastvṛṇamocanaṃ dvije /
GP12garup2_u:5880: bhūmiḥ sukṛṣṭāpi tṛṣārtihetostadevametaṃ sukṛtat samastam // GarP_2,48.43 //
GP12garup2_u:5881: adhyāyamenaṃ sukṛtasya sāraṃ śṛṇoti gāyatyapi bhāvaśuddhyā /
GP12garup2_u:5882: sa vai kulīnaḥ sa ca dharmayukto viśvālayaṃ yāti paraṃ sa nūnam // GarP_2,48.44 //
GP12garup2_u:5883: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde manuṣyasya sukhaduḥ khaprāpakadharmādharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5891: jāyante ca mriyante ca teṣāmanto na vidyate // GarP_2,49.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5892: sadā duḥ khāturā eva na sakhī vidyate kkacit /
GP12garup2_u:5893: kenopāyena mokṣeśa mucyante vada me prabho // GarP_2,49.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5895: śṛṇu tārkṣya pravakṣyāmi yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi /
GP12garup2_u:5898: sarvajñaḥ sarvakartā ca sarveśo nirmalo 'dvayaḥ // GarP_2,49.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5910: sukṛtānmā navo bhūtvā jñānī cenmokṣamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5912: na mānuṣaṃ vinānyatra tattvajñānantu labhyate // GarP_2,49.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5916: yastāra yati nātmānaṃ tasmātpāpataro 'tra kaḥ // GarP_2,49.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5918: na vettyātmahitaṃ yastu sa bhavedbrahmaghātakaḥ // GarP_2,49.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5919: vinā dehena kasyāpi puruṣārtho na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:5924: punaḥ śubhāśubhaṃ karma na śarīraṃ punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,49.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5932: gatvā nirauṣadhaṃ deśaṃ vyādhimthaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati // GarP_2,49.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5940: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jano hanta na vetti hitamātmanaḥ // GarP_2,49.27 //
GP12garup2_u:5942: loko mohasurāṃ pītvā na bibheti kadācana // GarP_2,49.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5948: viśvastaśca bhayasthāne hā naraḥ ko na hanyate // GarP_2,49.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5952: anarthe cārthavijñānaḥ svamarthaṃ yo na vetti saḥ // GarP_2,49.33 //
GP12garup2_u:5958: āmakuṃbha ivāṃbhaḥ stho viśīrṇo na vibhāvyate // GarP_2,49.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5962: śuṣyate sāgarajalaṃ śarīrasya ca kā kathā // GarP_2,49.38 //
GP12garup2_u:5963: apatyaṃ me kalatraṃ me dhanaṃ me bāndhavāśca me /
GP12garup2_u:5964: jalpantamiti martyājaṃ hanti kālavṛko balāt // GarP_2,49.39 //
GP12garup2_u:5968: na hi mṛtyuḥ pratīkṣeta kṛtaṃ vāpyatha vākṛtam // GarP_2,49.41 //
GP12garup2_u:5970: adhiṣṭhito mṛtyuśatruṃ trātāraṃ kiṃ na paśyati // GarP_2,49.42 //
GP12garup2_u:5977: duḥ khamūlaṃ hi saṃsāraḥ sa yasyāsti sa duḥ khitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5978: tasya tyāgaḥ kṛto yena sa sukhī nāparaḥ kvacit // GarP_2,49.46 //
GP12garup2_u:5987: māṃsalubdho yathā matsyo lohaśaṅkuṃ na paśyati /
GP12garup2_u:5988: sukhalubdhastathā dehī yamavādhāṃ na paśyati // GarP_2,49.51 //
GP12garup2_u:5990: kukṣipūraṇaniṣṭhā ye te narā nārakāḥ khaga // GarP_2,49.52 //
GP12garup2_u:5992: jñānavānmānavaḥ prokto jñānahīnaḥ paśuḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,49.53 //
GP12garup2_u:5996: jāyante ca mriyante ca hā hantājñānamohitāḥ // GarP_2,49.55 //
GP12garup2_u:5997: tasmātsaṅgaḥ sadā tyājyaḥ sacettyaktuṃ na śakyate /
GP12garup2_u:5998: mahadbhiḥ saha kartavyaḥ santaḥ saṅgasya bheṣajam // GarP_2,49.56 //
GP12garup2_u:6000: yasya nāsti naraḥ so 'ndhaḥ kathaṃ na syādamārgagaḥ // GarP_2,49.57 //
GP12garup2_u:6002: na jānanti paraṃ dharmaṃ vṛthā naśyanti dāmbhikāḥ // GarP_2,49.58 //
GP12garup2_u:6016: caranti gardabhādyāśca viraktāste bhavanti kim // GarP_2,49.65 //
GP12garup2_u:6018: mṛdbhasmavāsī nityaṃ śvā sa kiṃ mukto bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,49.66 //
GP12garup2_u:6024: na pibanti mahītoyaṃ vratinaste bhavanti kim // GarP_2,49.69 //
GP12garup2_u:6037: anyathā paramaṃ tattvaṃ janāḥ kliśyanti cānyathā /
GP12garup2_u:6038: anyathā śāstrasadbhāvo vyākhyāṃ kurvanti cānyathā // GarP_2,49.76 //
GP12garup2_u:6042: na jānanti paraṃ tattvaṃ darvī pākarasaṃ yathā // GarP_2,49.78 //
GP12garup2_u:6043: śiro vahati puṣpāṇi gandhaṃ jānāti nāsikā /
GP12garup2_u:6046: gopaḥ kakṣāgate cchāge kūpaṃ paśyati durmatiḥ // GarP_2,49.80 //
GP12garup2_u:6050: ataḥ prajñāvatāṃ śāstraṃ tattvajñānasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_2,49.82 //
GP12garup2_u:6058: tattvajñasya tathā tārkṣya na śāstreṇa prayojanam // GarP_2,49.86 //
GP12garup2_u:6060: jñānādeva hi kaivalyaṃ nānyathā vinatātmajaḥ // GarP_2,49.87 //
GP12garup2_u:6062: tathaiva sarvakarmāṇi jñānameva hi kāraṇam // GarP_2,49.88 //
GP12garup2_u:6070: samaṃ tattvaṃ na jānanti dvaitāddvaitavivarjitam // GarP_2,49.92 //
GP12garup2_u:6071: dve pade bandhamokṣāya namameti mameti ca /
GP12garup2_u:6073: tatkarma yanna bandhāya sā vidyā yā vimuktidā /
GP12garup2_u:6092: chindyādasaṃgaśastreṇa spṛhāṃ dehe 'nu yā ca tam // GarP_2,49.103 //
GP12garup2_u:6099: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma brahmāhaṃ paramaṃ padam /
GP12garup2_u:6102: yaḥ prayāti tyajandehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_2,49.108 //
GP12garup2_u:6104: sudhiyastāṃ gatiṃ yānti tānahaṃ kathayāmi te // GarP_2,49.109 //
GP12garup2_u:6106: dvandvairvimuktāḥ sukhaduḥ khasaṃjñairgacchantyamūḍhāḥ padamavyayaṃ tat // GarP_2,49.110 //
GP12garup2_u:6108: yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.111 //
GP12garup2_u:6110: pūrṇadṛṣṭiḥ prasannātmā sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.112 //
GP12garup2_u:6112: muktikṣetreṣu mriyate sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.113 //
GP12garup2_u:6113: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantika /
GP12garup2_u:6114: purī dvāravatī jñeyāḥ saptaitā mokṣadāyikāḥ // GarP_2,49.114 //
GP12garup2_u:6115: iti te kathitaṃ tārkṣya mokṣadharmaṃ sanātanam /
GP12garup2_u:6117: mokṣaṃ gacchanti tattvajñā dhārmikāḥ svargatiṃ narāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:6118: pāpino durgatiṃ yānti saṃsaranti khagādayaḥ // GarP_2,49.116 //
GP12garup2_u:6123: ityuktvā viṣṇumāmantrya sa gataḥ kaśyapāśramam // GarP_2,49.118 //
GP12garup2_u:6124: sadyo dehāntaraṃ yāti yathā yāti vilambataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:6127: mārīco 'pi mudaṃ lebhe śrutvā vākyaṃ ramāpateḥ // GarP_2,49.120 //
GP12garup2_u:6133: mayā tu bhavatāṃ proktaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ hareridam // GarP_2,49.123 //
GP12garup2_u:6134: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānmartyo yo vāpyabhidadhāti ca /
GP12garup2_u:6135: ihāmutra ca loke sa sarvatra sukhamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.124 //
GP12garup2_u:6137: asya śravaṇataḥ puṇyaṃ tanmukto jāyate tataḥ // GarP_2,49.125 //
GP12garup2_u:6140: bhajata jitahṛṣīkāḥ kṛṣṇamenaṃ munīśaṃ samajani bata yasmādgīḥ sudhāsāradhārā /
GP12garup2_u:6141: pṛṣatamapi yadīyaṃ varṇarūpaṃ nipīya śrutipuṭaculukena prāpnuyādātmanaikyam // GarP_2,49.127 //
GP12garup2_u:6148: sa munirapi niśamya śaunakendro bahutaramānayati sma cātmani svam // GarP_2,49.130 //
GP12garup2_u:6152: śṛṇvatāṃ kāmanāpūraṃ śrotavyaṃ sarvadaiva hi // GarP_2,49.132 //
GP12garup2_u:6160: vihāya yātanāṃ ghorāṃ dhūtapāpo divaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,49.136 //
GP12garup2_u:6161: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe mokṣopāyanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:6162: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyo dharmakāṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ
